"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>功<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>achievement</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Construction, Power</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Completing a <font color=""#0af""><b>construction</b></font> project using <font color=""#0af""><b>power</b></font> tools is a great <font color=""#f0a""><b>achievement</b></font>. Construction projects aren’t always easy, even with power tools, but regardless, a job well done is a job well done. You should be proud of your achievement.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: I’m sure you’ve used or at least have seen someone use power tools before. Imagine constructing an entire house all by yourself using these power tools. You’d probably feel pretty powerful. A deity of construction. Your achievement knows no equal.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>成<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>become</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Sword, Drunkard</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>drunkard</b></font> with a <font color=""#0af""><b>sword</b></font> will never <font color=""#f0a""><b>become</b></font> a respected swordsman. Just because a drunkard possesses a sword, does not mean he’s a swordsman. There’s not even a good chance he’ll ever become one, either.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture some drunkard, stumbling around in the streets. Now imagine him with a sword. The sword doesn’t make him become any less of a drunkard. It does, however, make him become much more likely to be arrested.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>岸<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>coast</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Mountain, Antenna, Cliff</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">An <font color=""#0af""><b>antenna</b></font> atop a <font color=""#0af""><b>mountain</b></font> <font color=""#0af""><b>cliff</b></font> allows for communication with the <font color=""#f0a""><b>coast</b></font>. Way atop this mountain cliff rests an antenna that amplifies the signal of all mobile devices which allows for communication between those on the coast and those on the mountain. This Cliffside antenna is very useful and convenient.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: You know how frustrating it can be not getting a mobile signal when you’re out in the wilderness or at the beach or something. Imagine how convenient it would be if these mountain cliff antennas were more common. You’d never lose signal!&nbsp;</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>競<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>compete</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Stand, Older Brother</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text""><font color=""#0af""><b>Stand</b></font>ing next to your <font color=""#0af""><b>older brother</b></font> it's so hard not to <font color=""#f0a""><b>compete</b></font> with him on everything (he's your older brother, after all).</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: I don’t know if you have an older brother, but imagine that you do. Now imagine that they’re always being praised for everything and you aren’t It feels bad, you want to be recognized too. You're not only standing next to him, you're standing in his shadow too.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>争<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>conflict</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Barb, Enclosure, Wolverine</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">If you keep a <font color=""#0af""><b>wolverine</b></font> in a small <font color=""#0af""><b>enclosure</b></font> with <font color=""#0af""><b>barb</b></font>s, you’re likely to get into a <font color=""#f0a""><b>conflict</b></font> with animal rights groups. Wolverines aren’t meant to be kept as pets, especially not in barbed enclosures. There’s going to be some sort of conflict here, and animal activist groups are not going to be happy with you.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine you’re the wolverine in this barbed enclosure. There’s hardly enough room for you to even turn around in here. The barbs keep poking you as well. Have you ever ran into a barbed wire fence? It’s not pleasant.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>便<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>convenience</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Ground, Rice Paddy, Treasure, Leader</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>leader</b></font> stands upon the <font color=""#0af""><b>ground</b></font> of the <font color=""#0af""><b>rice paddy</b></font>. He is searching for <font color=""#0af""><b>treasure</b></font>. It is said that this treasure here in this rice field will make things much easier for the leader (that's what leaders really want, after all). If he gets this treasure, it will be a great <font color=""#f0a""><b>convenience</b></font> for him, because convenience is everything when you're the leader.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine the leader looking around the rice paddy. He keeps saying, 'Ugh, it would be convenient if I didn't have to walk around out here looking for the treasure that's going to make things more convenient for me. Ugh.' Go ahead and say this phrase out loud, too, pretending to be the leader in the rice paddy. Feel the cold and the wet, making it less convenient for you.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>老<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>elderly</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Spoon, Coffin</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">By the time you finish digging a&nbsp;<font color=""#0af""><b>coffin</b></font>&nbsp;hole with nothing but a&nbsp;<font color=""#0af""><b>spoon</b></font>, you’ll be an old&nbsp;<font color=""#f0a""><b>elderly</b></font>&nbsp;person. Digging with nothing but a spoon takes a long time, especially when the hole needs to be big enough for a coffin. You might as well be digging it for yourself at this rate. By the time you finish, you’ll be all wrinkled and elderly and just about ready to keel over.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine yourself digging a coffin hole with nothing but a spoon. Your hands get all cramped, your wrist starts to hurt, and you get painful blisters on your hands. It takes forever to dig a hole big enough for a coffin!</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>命<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>fate</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Mouth, Orders</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text""><font color=""#0af""><b>Orders</b></font> coming from your <font color=""#0af""><b>mouth</b></font> will determine the <font color=""#f0a""><b>fate</b></font> of your men. You are a commanding officer and orders from your mouth are law. Your orders alone determine the ultimate fate of your soldiers.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Pretend you are a high ranking officer and imagine yourself giving orders to your underlings. Imagine all the power and influence you have. It feels good.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>指<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>finger</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Sun, Spoon, Nailbat</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">If you try and use a <font color=""#0af""><b>nailbat</b></font> as a <font color=""#0af""><b>spoon</b></font> out in the hot <font color=""#0af""><b>sun</b></font>, you’re likely to damage a <font color=""#f0a""><b>finger</b></font>. Nailbats are not meant to be used as spoons, and if you’re using one as a utensil like this, there’s a good chance you’ll injure yourself. Your fingers are especially vulnerable.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine you’re out in the sun and trying to eat something using a nailbat. When you pick up the nailbat to eat, you poke your finger on one of the nails. It really hurts. Imagine how painful it would be to get stabbed in the finger with a nail.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>初<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>first</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Sword, Pelican</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>pelican</b></font> wielding a <font color=""#0af""><b>sword</b></font> would be the <font color=""#f0a""><b>first</b></font> bird warrior in all of history. Never before has a pelican, let alone a bird, wielded a sword. This pelican is the first of its kind.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: I’m sure you know what a pelican looks like, so I’m sure you can picture what this bird would look like brandishing a sword. Pretty menacing, no? Imagine this pelican squawking and waddling around waving a sword every which way, feathers flying in the wind.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>味<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>flavor</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Mouth, Jet</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">What is the <font color=""#0af""><b>jet</b></font> of your <font color=""#0af""><b>mouth</b></font>? It's <font color=""#f0a""><b>flavor</b></font>. It's what shoots your mouth off, which explains why it hurts so much when you eat something awesome.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine how your favorite food tastes. Imagine a jet taking off in your mouth because of it.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>追<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>follow</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Bear, Water Slide</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">If a <font color=""#0af""><b>bear</b></font> goes down a <font color=""#0af""><b>water slide</b></font>, you’re probably not gonna want to <font color=""#f0a""><b>follow</b></font> him. Once a bear goes down a water slide, he’s pretty much claimed it as his, and he won’t be happy if you follow him down it. He’ll be waiting at the end of the water slide just waiting to maul anyone silly enough to follow him down.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Bears are big and scary. Imagine how frightened you’d be just seeing one out in the woods. If you saw a bear go down a water slide at your local water park, do you think you would follow him down it? Heck no. Bears are terrifying.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>神<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>god</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Pelican, Say Humbly</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>pelican</b></font> can <font color=""#0af""><b>say humbly</b></font> the word of <font color=""#f0a""><b>God</b></font>. This pelican was religiously educated in a school with superb manners, but he's never forgotten his place in this world. As such, this pelican is able to say humbly to everyone the good works and glory of God.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture this pelican in religious vestments spreading the word of God. He is very proper, but speaking very humbly. Perhaps he has a British accent. And a monocle.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>良<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>good</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Drop, Good</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>good</b></font> <font color=""#0af""><b>drop</b></font> of water sure tastes <font color=""#f0a""><b>good</b></font>. Especially on a hot summer’s day. Good water isn’t always easy to come by, and when you’re thirsty, a good drop of water really does taste very good. So good, you find yourself wanting drop after drop of it.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine you’re dehydrated. All you want is a good number of water drops to drink. Picture how refreshing drinking these many drops of good water would be.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>意<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>idea</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Heart, Sound</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The <font color=""#0af""><b>sound</b></font> of your <font color=""#0af""><b>heart</b></font> gives me an <font color=""#f0a""><b>idea</b></font>. The methodic thump thump thumping of a heart puts me in a trance that gives me great ideas. It’s a very inspirational sound, the sound of a heart is. It gives me an idea. <br>Alternatively, you could look at this kanji and see a 'stand' radical and something that kind of (almost) looks like the kanji for 'think.' When you stand up and think, you come up with your very own <font color=""#f0a""><b>idea</b></font>s!</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Put your hand over your heart, or on your wrist, or somewhere you can feel your pulse. Your heart is pumping blood through your body, hear the sound of your heart beat and try to picture and get an idea for how all the blood flows through your body.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>労<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>labor</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Power, Viking</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>Viking</b></font> in a position of <font color=""#0af""><b>power</b></font> does not need to <font color=""#f0a""><b>labor</b></font> in the fields. Labor is for the weak! A Viking of power takes what he wants, and need not labor for it. A powerful Viking plunders all and takes what he wants!</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine yourself as a powerful Viking. You have the power to take anything you want, pillaging and plundering to your heart’s content. Imagine all the things you would acquire with this sort of power.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>好<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>like</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Woman, Child</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>woman</b></font> and a <font color=""#0af""><b>child</b></font>. What is there not to <font color=""#f0a""><b>like</b></font> about these kinds of people?</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine yourself liking women and children. They're nice folk, after all.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>昔<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>long ago</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Sun, Blackjack</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">You’ve been playing <font color=""#0af""><b>blackjack</b></font> in the <font color=""#0af""><b>sun</b></font> since <font color=""#f0a""><b>long ago</b></font>. This is the longest game of blackjack you’ve ever played and it feels like ages since you started. You’ve been sitting out in the sun playing blackjack since long, long ago.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine yourself playing a never-ending game of blackjack out in the hot sun. You’re sticky, sweaty, and tired. But all you can do is continue to play your game of blackjack. It’s miserable.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>低<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>low</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Ground, Leader, Duck</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>leader</b></font> who is at a '<font color=""#0af""><b>duck</b></font> at <font color=""#0af""><b>ground</b></font>' level is down pretty <font color=""#f0a""><b>low</b></font>. Ducks are short, after all.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine yourself trying to get to the height of a duck. Nice and low.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>育<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>nurture, raise</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Moon, Boob</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The <font color=""#0af""><b>boob</b></font> of Mother <font color=""#0af""><b>Moon</b></font> <font color=""#f0a""><b>nurture</b></font>s and nourishes its young. A mother’s boob provides milk for its children, and Mother Moon is no different. Mother Moon nurtures all of her children. <br>Alternatively you can remember this kanji to mean <font color=""#f0a""><b>raise</b></font> (as in 'to raise' a child). This is similar to nurture, of course, too, so remembering this shouldn't be too bad.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine what the moon would look like if it had boobs. It’d be a pretty wacky sight, don’t you think? Next time you see the moon in the night sky, imagine it with boobs.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>令<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>orders</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Orders</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The <font color=""#0af""><b>orders</b></font> radical and the <font color=""#f0a""><b>orders</b></font> kanji are exactly the same! Super!</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: </i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>拾<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>pick up</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Suit, Nailbat</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>nailbat</b></font> would <font color=""#0af""><b>suit</b></font> you nicely. Go ahead and <font color=""#f0a""><b>pick up</b></font> that nailbat that suits you so well.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine picking up this nailbat. Think how it suits you well. It's perfect for you, in fact.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>注<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>pour</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Master, Tsunami</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>tsunami</b></font> <font color=""#0af""><b>master</b></font> has the power to <font color=""#f0a""><b>pour</b></font> water wherever he pleases. Tsunami masters are masters over the most powerful water force in the universe, so it makes sense that they have the ability to pour water at will, wherever they please. Best not tick off the master, unless you want a tsunami poured on your head.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture yourself as this tsunami master. You’re like a water bender from Avatar, only more awesome. Feel the cold wet water pouring out of your fingertips as you create water out of nothing. Imagine what it would be like to have this power.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>利<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>profit, advantage</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Pine, Ribs</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Selling <font color=""#0af""><b>pine</b></font> smoked <font color=""#0af""><b>ribs</b></font> is a great way to make a <font color=""#f0a""><b>profit</b></font>. People love the smell and taste of pine, so if you sold ribs smoked over pine wood, you’d be sure to turn a quick profit in the ribs business.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine smelling the smell of a pine tree. Now imagine smelling the smell or fresh ribs together with the smell of pine. Is it making your mouth water?</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>位<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>rank</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Stand, Leader</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>leader</b></font> <font color=""#0af""><b>stand</b></font>s at the highest <font color=""#f0a""><b>rank</b></font> in an organization. The leader is of the highest rank and stands about all others.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture this great leader. Imagine him actually standing on the shoulders of his supporters who are a lower rank than he is. He’s standing atop this great pyramid as a fearless leader.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>級<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>rank, grade</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Thread, Escalator</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>thread</b></font> running up a set of <font color=""#0af""><b>escalator</b></font> can help keep soldiers in <font color=""#f0a""><b>rank</b></font> and file. These soldiers have trouble walking in a straight line, so the thread is there to guide them along in a straight line. The stairs are escalator because there are so many soldiers and they weigh a lot. You can also think of this kanji as <font color=""#f0a""><b>grade</b></font>, essentially the same thing as rank (will come up sometimes in vocab, so good to be familiar with this meaning, at least).</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture if these soldiers were marching rank and file in a building you were in. You can hear the clomp of their boots in unison on the escalator and each step they take causes the whole building to shake. Feel the rumble of the building as you hear them marching rank and file up the escalator.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>仲<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>relationship</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Middle, Leader</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>middle</b></font> of the road <font color=""#0af""><b>leader</b></font> is likely to have an average <font color=""#f0a""><b>relationship</b></font> with everyone. He doesn’t really take sides in matters, and just stays in the middle. This makes him seem like sort of a wishy washy people pleaser, and as such his relationships with people are rarely anything more than average.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: I’m sure you’ve heard of “flip-floppers” in politics, or people who try and take both sides of an issue, always staying in the middle ground and never really taking a stand. Imagine one of these people to represent this kanji.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>放<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>release</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Direction, Winter</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">When&nbsp;<b><font color=""#0af"">winter</font></b>&nbsp;comes your&nbsp;<b><font color=""#0af"">direction</font></b>, the trees must&nbsp;<b><font color=""#f0a"">release</font></b>&nbsp;their leaves for the coming cold.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture winter heading straight for you and frosting everything over. Now picture the leaves being released by the trees.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>秒<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>second</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Pine, Few</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">It takes a <font color=""#0af""><b>pine</b></font> tree just a <font color=""#0af""><b>few</b></font> <font color=""#f0a""><b>second</b></font>s to fall to the ground. After being chopped down, the pine falls to the ground very quickly. It only takes a few seconds for it to fall.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Pretend you are the one responsible for felling this tree. You just chopped the last chop and the tree is falling to the ground. It only takes a few seconds but you head the pine cracking and snapping as it falls to the ground, and once it does you get a strong whoosh of wind blown into your face smelling strongly of pine.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>別<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>separate</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Mouth, Sword, Ribs</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">If you eat a <font color=""#0af""><b>mouth</b></font>ful of <font color=""#0af""><b>ribs</b></font> using a <font color=""#0af""><b>sword</b></font> to <font color=""#f0a""><b>separate</b></font> the meat from the rib bones, it’s a bit overkill. To get these ribs from the plate to your mouth, a knife would work just fine, you really don’t need a sword. Heck, you could probably even separate the meat from the ribs with your hands alone.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine trying to eat a slab of ribs using a sword. It would be pretty awkward, right? You really don’t need that much blade to separate the meat from the rib bones. It’s ridiculous.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>特<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>special</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Cow, Temple</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A sacred <font color=""#0af""><b>cow</b></font> inside a <font color=""#0af""><b>temple</b></font> is a <font color=""#f0a""><b>special</b></font> thing. This cow is very important to the temple and has a special place in the heart of every temple worshipper. This cow is special indeed.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture this special cow inside of a temple with people showing their adoration for it. Hear the people singing their praise while the special cow just goes, “Mooo~ mooo~,” its moos reverberating off the temple walls.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>共<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>together</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Fins, Blackjack</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The only card game fish can be decent at is <font color=""#0af""><b>blackjack</b></font> because their <font color=""#0af""><b>fins</b></font> can’t hold their cards <font color=""#f0a""><b>together</b></font>. In blackjack, they don’t have to touch the cards, they just have to hit or stay. Fish fins weren’t designed with holding cards together in mind.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine a fish trying to hold a hand of cards together. Impossible! Fish don’t have fingers. They can’t hold things! Imagine a fish trying to hold cards together and failing miserably.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>努<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>toil</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Power, Woman, Stool</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>woman</b></font> of <font color=""#0af""><b>power</b></font> sits on a <font color=""#0af""><b>stool</b></font> while her servants <font color=""#f0a""><b>toil</b></font> away in the kitchen. They are toiling away preparing a feast for this woman of power while she kicks back on her cozy stool. She’s a queen and deserves to be pampered.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine you are in a position of power and can relax on a stool while your minions toil away in the kitchen to prepare you a feast. It’s good to have money! You’ve got it made. Imagine how smug you feel.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>伝<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>transmit, tell</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Leader, Boobs</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A fat <font color=""#0af""><b>leader</b></font> with huge man <font color=""#0af""><b>boobs</b></font> can <font color=""#f0a""><b>transmit</b></font> just the same sense of authority as a fit and in shape leader. regardless of the leader's looks, as long as he does his job well, he will be respected.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine this fat leader walking about with his man boobs. See them jiggle and sway back and forth like water balloons.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>戦<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>war</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Drunkard, Witch Doctor</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>witch doctor</b></font> who is also a <font color=""#0af""><b>drunkard</b></font> could be likely to start a <font color=""#f0a""><b>war</b></font>. If a witch doctor gets drunk, he might do some crazy witch doctor magic and inadvertently start a war between two factions. This drunkard witch doctor has no idea what he’s doing.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine what a witch doctor looks like. They’re usually viewed as being a bit eccentric and out there. Now imagine one that’s also a drunkard. This is a very annoying, bumbling and stumbling witch doctor.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>波<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>wave</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Skin, Tsunami</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>tsunami</b></font> crashes into your <font color=""#0af""><b>skin</b></font> like a <font color=""#f0a""><b>wave</b></font> of destruction. This mighty tsunami wave has struck the skin of your body and whisks you away with its powerful current.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: If you’ve ever been to the ocean or a large lake, you know what kind of forces even small waves can hit with. Now imagine the force with which a tsunami wave would strike you. You’d have the wind knocked out of you for sure. Imagine what this would feel like and picture it happening to you.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>洋<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>western style, ocean</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Sheep, Tsunami</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>sheep</b></font> rides a <font color=""#0af""><b>tsunami</b></font> in classic <font color=""#f0a""><b>Western style</b></font>. And by Western style I mean the sheep is dressed in a cowboy outfit and has put a saddle atop the tsunami wave to ride it. It’s a tsunami rodeo and this crazy sheep is riding that tsunami wave in classic Western style. <br>This kanji also means <font color=""#f0a""><b>ocean</b></font>, because presumably the people from the 'West' who have 'Western Style' came from across the ocean. They're the 'Ocean People' in this sense. You'll want to be familiar with this meaning for vocab later on.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine how ridiculous a sheep would look all decked out in Western style cowboy gear. Now imagine it riding a tsunami wave as it screams, “Baa~ baa~ baa~!”</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>働<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>work</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Power, Leader, Heavy</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>leader</b></font> with a lot of <font color=""#0af""><b>power</b></font> can move <font color=""#0af""><b>heavy</b></font> things with hardly any <font color=""#f0a""><b>work</b></font>. By power, I mean a lot of strength because this leader is very strong and moving heavy things is no problem for him. His power allows the leader to move heavy things with little to no work at all.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture this powerful leader, bare chested with a crown on his head. His muscles are bulging as he picks up heavy things and casually tosses them aside. How does he maintain so many muscles?</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>悪<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>bad</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Heart, Tie Fighter</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Having a <font color=""#0af""><b>tie fighter</b></font> where your <font color=""#0af""><b>heart</b></font> should be is a <font color=""#f0a""><b>bad</b></font> thing. A tie fighter can’t perform the same functions as a heart! Tie fighters are meant for battle, not pumping blood through bodies. Tie fighters are good for fighting, bad for sustaining blood flow.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine yourself with a tie fighter where you heart should be. You’d be in a lot of pain and you’d slowly die. Imagine this happening to you. What a bad way to go.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>息<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>breath</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Heart, Self</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Imagining one’s <font color=""#0af""><b>self</b></font> without a <font color=""#0af""><b>heart</b></font> can make it hard to draw <font color=""#f0a""><b>breath</b></font>. Without a heart, you’d have no blood pumping and you would start to die. This would make it increasingly harder to draw breath and get oxygen to stay alive.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine trying to live without a heart. You couldn’t. Your blood stops flowing and your body shuts down. You would no longer be able to draw breath.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>章<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>chapter</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Stand, Early</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">You have arrived <font color=""#0af""><b>early</b></font> to the podium where you <font color=""#0af""><b>stand</b></font> and practice reading the <font color=""#f0a""><b>chapter</b></font> from your latest book. You’re a bestselling author and you’re reading a chapter to an audience, but you got to the stand earlier so you could practice and rehearse.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine this happening to you. The chapter isn’t short so you better practice it. Picture yourself reading this chapter over and over until you’ve got your speech down pat.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>登<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>climb</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Tent, Beans</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Eating <font color=""#0af""><b>beans</b></font> and then getting in a <font color=""#0af""><b>tent</b></font> is a surefire way to get everyone else to <font color=""#f0a""><b>climb</b></font> right on out of said tent. Beans can make you flatulent, and nobody wants to be around that smelly bean flatulence smell, especially not in a small area like a tent. That being said, anyone else in that tent you went into is gonna climb out pretty quick.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine the smell of someone’s bean induced fart inside of a small tent. Smell the odor wafting up into your nostrils as it almost chokes you. Imagine yourself climbing out of the tent as you start to dry heave.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>寒<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>cold</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Helmet, Ice, Train</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">If you’re sitting on a <font color=""#0af""><b>train</b></font> wearing a <font color=""#0af""><b>helmet</b></font> of <font color=""#0af""><b>ice</b></font>, you’re gonna be pretty <font color=""#f0a""><b>cold</b></font>. Ice is cold, and you’re wearing a helmet of it on your head, so of course you’re going to be cold too. And you’re also riding on a train for some reason.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine yourself having a helmet made of ice on your head. It would make you so cold. Imagine the worst brain freeze you’ve ever had, but like, times a million. Imagine that feeling happening to your head with this ice helmet on it.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>深<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>deep</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Tree, Pi, Tsunami</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The force of a <font color=""#0af""><b>tsunami</b></font> is enough to put a gash in a <font color=""#0af""><b>tree</b></font> about <font color=""#0af""><b>pi</b></font> (3.14) feet <font color=""#f0a""><b>deep</b></font>. Tsunamis are pretty powerful, so the force of the water alone is enough to cut into a tree several feet deep.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture this tsunami wave hitting the tree. It’s like a lumberjack axe of water, cutting deep into the tree with the force of a thousand lumberjacks.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>倍<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>double, times</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Leader, Clown</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>leader</b></font> who hires his own personal <font color=""#0af""><b>clown</b></font> will likely <font color=""#f0a""><b>double</b></font> his entertainment. Clowns are funny and make people laugh, so the leader decided to hire one. Since that time, the leader’s amount of mirth has doubled. <br>This also means <font color=""#f0a""><b>times</b></font>, which makes sense when you think about the kind of math you'll need to double something. What is A * 2? It's A doubled, first of all, but you're using multiplication. You're 'timesing' something.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture a clown and all the ridiculous funny things they do. Imagine the clown throwing a pie at someone’s face and how funny that is. Chuckle to yourself and remember this kanji.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>勉<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>exertion</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Power, Excuse</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">You’ll have to <font color=""#0af""><b>excuse</b></font> me, having all this <font color=""#0af""><b>power</b></font> puts a lot of strain and <font color=""#f0a""><b>exertion</b></font> on my body. My power comes from exertion of muscle, so please excuse me if I start to perspire.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine yourself under great exertion. You’re attempting to use your power to move something and it’s really requiring a lot of exertion to move. Picture yourself doing this action and imagine how difficult it is.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>消<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>extinguish</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Moon, Triceratops, Tsunami</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A shift of the <font color=""#0af""><b>moon</b></font> causes a <font color=""#0af""><b>tsunami</b></font> that hits an unsuspecting <font color=""#0af""><b>triceratops</b></font> and <font color=""#f0a""><b>extinguish</b></font>es its life. The moon controls tides, so it controls tsunamis too. This poor triceratops didn’t know this information and was unprepared for the tsunami. Since the triceratops was hit by the tsunami in full force, the triceratops’ life energy was extinguished.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: I’m sure you’ve heard many theories on how dinosaurs went extinct. Well, this is the real story. Imagine this poor triceratops and all his friends being extinguished by this powerful tsunami of doom.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>祭<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>festival</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Tent, Jackhammer</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">If you try to use a <font color=""#0af""><b>jackhammer</b></font> outside of a <font color=""#0af""><b>tent</b></font> at a <font color=""#f0a""><b>festival</b></font>, you’re gonna have a bad time. Those people in the tent are camping overnight in preparation for the festival and trying to sleep. You turn on that jackhammer of yours and they are not going to be happy with you.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine yourself sleeping peacefully in a tent. Now imagine being rudely awakened by the sound of a jackhammer. Feel the vibrations and the noise pounding in your ears. It’s super annoying.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>野<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>field</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Sunflower, Beforehand</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">You're at a game but you picked a <font color=""#0af""><b>sunflower</b></font> <font color=""#0af""><b>beforehand</b></font> to give to a player on the <font color=""#f0a""><b>field</b></font>. The player on the field is your favorite, so you think he deserves a sunflower.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine the look on this guy's face when you give him the sunflower you picked beforehand. He's so happy that he starts running all over the field cheering!</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>階<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>floor</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">White, Compare, Butcher</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">If you want to <font color=""#0af""><b>compare</b></font> the skills of a <font color=""#0af""><b>white</b></font> <font color=""#0af""><b>butcher</b></font> with an Asian one, you'll have to make the entire <font color=""#f0a""><b>floor</b></font> available to them. They need a ton of space to work, flinging their knives around, and such.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine being at this butcher competition. Hear everyone on the floor cheering as the competition to compare their butcher styles commences.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>庭<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>garden</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">King, Mullet, Big Bird</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">If <font color=""#0af""><b>Big Bird</b></font> had a <font color=""#0af""><b>mullet</b></font>, he’d be <font color=""#0af""><b>king</b></font> of the <font color=""#f0a""><b>garden</b></font>. Right now, no one in the garden respects Big Bird because he lacks a manly mullet. If only Big Bird had such a mullet, everyone in the garden would adore him and make Big Bird their king.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture Big Bird. Now picture Big Bird with a mullet and a kingly crown sitting atop a lavish throne in a garden. Picture yourself in King Big Bird’s presence, bowing before him in respect.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>港<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>harbor</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Fins, Cobra, Tsunami, Blackjack</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A wild <font color=""#0af""><b>tsunami</b></font> made up of <font color=""#0af""><b>blackjack</b></font> cards, fish <font color=""#0af""><b>fins</b></font>, and <font color=""#0af""><b>cobra</b></font>s crashes into the <font color=""#f0a""><b>harbor</b></font>. You're standing there, at the harbor. You look up and see this crazy tsunami coming down on you. Why did you have to take a trip to the harbor on this day?</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Try to create a vivid imagination of the harbor in your head. What does it look like? Then, imagine the weird tsunami washing through it. Really focus on the fact that it's a harbor, of course.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>暑<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>hot weather</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Sun, Someone</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">When <font color=""#0af""><b>someone</b></font> goes out in the <font color=""#0af""><b>sun</b></font>, they get <font color=""#f0a""><b>hot</b></font>. That’s just how it is. Someone standing out in the sun for a long time will inevitably get hot. The sun is hot, and it makes you get hot too.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine you are this someone, standing out in the hot sun. Feel the sun’s hot rays beating down on you as you stand outside. The hot sun makes you start to sweat and you get all sweaty and sticky from the heat. Note that this usually refers to the hot weather or the heat of an area you're in and doesn't refer to a hot 'thing.'</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>湯<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>hot water</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Gravity, Tsunami</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">If you find yourself under the wave of a <font color=""#0af""><b>tsunami</b></font>, <font color=""#0af""><b>gravity</b></font> is going to have its way and you’ll be in <font color=""#f0a""><b>hot water</b></font>. Literally. You’re in the tropics and this tsunami water is hot.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Gravity makes things fall down. Imagine this tsunami wave of hot water towering over you, just waiting for gravity to pull it back down on top of you. Feel this looming fear and anxious anticipation for the inevitable, drops of hot water sprinkling down onto your face.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>島<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>island</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Mountain, Bird</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>bird</b></font> sits upon a <font color=""#0af""><b>mountain</b></font>. If you look at the radicals, the bird is quite large and the mountain quite small. Think of this in the mnemonic as well. The reason the mountain is small is because you can only see the top of it, sticking out of the water. On it is the bird. This small mountain with the bird on it is an <font color=""#f0a""><b>island</b></font>.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine the mountain as small as you'd like. Maybe it's only barely sticking out of the sea, and the bird is having trouble standing on it. Whatever you do, make sure you think of it as an island, possibly owned by the bird.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>童<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>juvenile</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Stand, Sunflower</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">If you just <font color=""#0af""><b>stand</b></font> there with a <font color=""#0af""><b>sunflower</b></font> in your hair, you’re gonna look pretty <font color=""#f0a""><b>juvenile</b></font>. Flowers are for kids, especially sunflowers. So don’t just stand there with a sunflower in your hair, looking all juvenile and such – grow up and get a job, you sunflower child, you.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine being a juvenile little kid, playing with sunflowers. Imagine holding one and smelling its fragrance with your nose.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>員<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>member</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Mouth, Clam</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>clam</b></font> with a <font color=""#0af""><b>mouth</b></font> is a <font color=""#f0a""><b>member</b></font> of the invertebrate family. Yes, clams do have mouths. They are also proud members of the invertebrate family and are probably the most nationalistic of all invertebrates.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine a clam opening and closing its mouth, talking to you and telling you what a proud member of his family he is. It’s a strange sight, but picture it in your mind.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>商<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>merchandise</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Legs, Stand, Mustache</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>mustache</b></font> with <font color=""#0af""><b>legs</b></font> has the ability to set up a <font color=""#0af""><b>stand</b></font> to sell <font color=""#f0a""><b>merchandise</b></font>. Most mustaches can’t stand because they don’t have legs. This mustache, however, does. It also has a keen business sense, which is why it’s selling merchandise.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine this mustache entrepreneur, at his merchandise stand, selling his wares. He looks quite dignified, legs and all. Imagine your surprise when you see this mustache walking around his stand, advertizing his merchandise.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>都<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>metropolis</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Someone, Butcher</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text""><font color=""#0af""><b>Someone</b></font> has to be a <font color=""#0af""><b>butcher</b></font> in this <font color=""#f0a""><b>metropolis</b></font>. "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>動<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>move</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Power, Heavy</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">When something is <font color=""#0af""><b>heavy</b></font>, you need a lot of <font color=""#0af""><b>power</b></font> to <font color=""#f0a""><b>move</b></font> it. It’s not going to move unless you use a lot of power. That thing is heavy and unless you use all the power you got, it’s not moving.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture a massive 1 ton weight. It’s heavy. You can’t even begin to move it without some sort of powerful machine to help you. Imagine yourself trying to move it with just your bare hands.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>第<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>ordinal number prefix</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Bamboo, Younger Brother</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The <font color=""#0af""><b>younger</b></font> <font color=""#0af""><b>bamboo</b></font> comes 2nd in line, no <font color=""#f0a""><b>ordinal number prefix</b></font> needed. In English, there is no ordinal number prefix with numbers like this 1st, 2nd, 3rd. So the younger bamboo comes 2nd after the older bamboo and that’s that.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine a line of bamboo shoots arranged from oldest to youngest. They look like pipe organ pipes, or a xylophone or something.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>期<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>period of time</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Moon, Crab</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>crab</b></font> left on the <font color=""#0af""><b>moon</b></font> for a <font color=""#f0a""><b>period of time</b></font> will surely die. Crabs aren’t meant for the moon, let alone outer space. Why would you take a crab to the moon? You take it outside the spaceship for any period of time and it will surely die.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: I’m sure you’ve seen movies where people go out in space with no spacesuit. Now imagine this happening to the poor crab. It only takes a small period of time for the dark reaches of space to kill him.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>植<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>plant</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Tree, Lion, Pope</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>lion</b></font> has chased the <font color=""#0af""><b>pope</b></font> up into a <font color=""#0af""><b>tree</b></font>, which is a very large <font color=""#f0a""><b>plant</b></font>. Trees are one of the largest plants around, so it’s a good place for a pope to hide from a lion. This particular lion isn’t so good at climbing plants like trees, so the pope should be safe for a while.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture this scene in your mind. The pope is trapped up in a tree and the lion is waiting below, pacing back and forth. Imagine if you were the pope. This would be terrifying!</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>根<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>root</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Tree, Good</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>good</b></font> <font color=""#0af""><b>tree</b></font> has strong <font color=""#f0a""><b>root</b></font>s. All trees need good strong roots to live long lives. This particular tree has really good roots and is rooted in the ground very good like.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine this tree rooted in the ground. It’s very sturdy and won’t budge no matter how much you shove it. Imagine yourself straining and struggling at trying to push this tree over. It’s impossible!</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>悲<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>sad</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Heart, Injustice</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">When you experience <font color=""#0af""><b>injustice</b></font>, it makes your <font color=""#0af""><b>heart</b></font> <font color=""#f0a""><b>sad</b></font>. Your heart has no tolerance for injustice, so you get really sad when you see injustices in the world.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine all the injustices in the world and how they make you feel. Hunger, famine, oppression. They all probably make you feel sad and have a heavy heart. Remember these feelings.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>短<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>short</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Arrow, Beans</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">If you shoot a tall stalk of <font color=""#0af""><b>beans</b></font> with an <font color=""#0af""><b>arrow</b></font>, the bean plant will go from tall to <font color=""#f0a""><b>short</b></font>. When the beans are hit with that arrow, it severs the plant in two, and you are left with a stalk of beans that is much shorter than before.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture yourself shooting this arrow. Imagine yourself nocking the arrow to the bow, and pulling the string back. That bean plant is not <font color=""#f0a""><b>short</b></font> enough, and you’re going to do something about it.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>球<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>sphere</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Lid, King, Water</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">If the <font color=""#0af""><b>water</b></font> <font color=""#0af""><b>king</b></font> doesn’t put a <font color=""#0af""><b>lid</b></font> on that <font color=""#f0a""><b>sphere</b></font>, something could escape from it. The sphere is meant for containing things, and without a lid, things won’t be contained properly. Therefore it is up to the water king to put a lid on that container sphere.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine yourself inside of this sphere. It’s congested and you’re claustrophobic. Now imagine the water king putting a lid on top of the sphere to seal you in for good. It’s scary.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>泉<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>spring</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Water, White</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text""><font color=""#0af""><b>White</b></font> <font color=""#0af""><b>water</b></font> shoots out from a <font color=""#f0a""><b>spring</b></font> in the ground. Due to the force the water shoots from the spring, the water looks white with all the air bubbles.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine these geysers and the white water shooting from the springs under the ground. Now imagine yourself standing over one when the water shoots out. You’d get super wet and probably knocked over due to the force of the spring water. Imagine this happening to yourself.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>流<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>stream</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">River, Tsunami, Boob</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">You’d look like a <font color=""#0af""><b>boob</b></font> in <font color=""#0af""><b>tsunami</b></font> weather if you went out and played in a <font color=""#0af""><b>river</b></font> or a <font color=""#f0a""><b>stream</b></font>. There’s a tsunami on the way, you boob! Why would you play in a stream of water!?</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine yourself playing in a stream. It’s nice and cool. Imagine how nice the water sounds running over the pebbles in the stream. And then a tsunami wave crests over you and you drown. Not so nice anymore, now is it?</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>陽<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>sunshine</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Gravity, Butcher</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>butcher</b></font> uses <font color=""#0af""><b>gravity</b></font> to help swing his knife down as he carves meat out in the <font color=""#f0a""><b>sunshine</b></font>. Gravity pulls everything down, so it makes work easier for the butcher. "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>歯<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>tooth</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Stop, Rice, Box</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">If you start to eat a <font color=""#0af""><b>box</b></font> of uncooked <font color=""#0af""><b>rice</b></font>, you should <font color=""#0af""><b>stop</b></font> because you might chip a <font color=""#f0a""><b>tooth</b></font>. Uncooked rice can be very hard and can damage a tooth quite easily, especially if you’re eating a whole box of it. You wouldn’t want to chip a tooth, would you?</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine chipping a tooth from a grain of rice. Chipping a tooth is bad news. First of all, it hurts, and second of all, it makes you look silly. Imagine the pain and shame you feel from this chipped tooth of yours. Why would you ever try to eat a whole box of it?</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>族<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>tribe</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Arrow, Direction, Gun</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">If someone with a <font color=""#0af""><b>gun</b></font> is headed your <font color=""#0af""><b>direction</b></font>, nock an <font color=""#0af""><b>arrow</b></font> in your bow and gather your <font color=""#f0a""><b>tribe</b></font> behind you because it’s about to get real! This cretin with a gun is headed your direction and he doesn’t even know what you and your tribe are gonna do to him. If he gets any closer, you’re likely to shoot that arrow right at him.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: This guy headed your direction with his gun doesn’t look friendly at all.
