"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>旅<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>trip</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Direction, Gun, Tofu</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">If your friendly neighborhood <font color=""#0af""><b>tofu</b></font> takes a <font color=""#0af""><b>gun</b></font> and points it in your <font color=""#0af""><b>direction</b></font>, you might want to take a <font color=""#f0a""><b>trip</b></font>. This tofu obviously has something wrong with it. If it’s taking a gun and pointing it in your direction, now’s probably a good time to get away and take that trip you’d been talking about.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine this menacing block of tofu threatening you with a gun. Guns are scary so you want to get away. Use images of your trip to make the thoughts of the big bad tofu and his gun fade away.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>温<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>warm</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Sun, Plate, Tsunami</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">After a <font color=""#0af""><b>tsunami</b></font>, any <font color=""#0af""><b>plate</b></font> left out in the <font color=""#0af""><b>sun</b></font> will be sure to get <font color=""#f0a""><b>warm</b></font>. The tsunami knocked this plate out of the kitchen, and now it’s just sitting outside in the sun. The sun heats things, so the plate is getting really warm.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Right after the tsunami, this plate was wet, but the sun is warming and drying the plate. Imagine looking at the plate and seeing the beads of water evaporate off it as it warms up. Feel the warm steam on your face as this happens.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>着<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>wear, arrive</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Slide, Eye, King, Horns</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A cyclops <font color=""#0af""><b>king</b></font> with one <font color=""#0af""><b>eye</b></font> and great big <font color=""#0af""><b>horns</b></font> slides down a <font color=""#0af""><b>slide</b></font> because he wanted to <font color=""#f0a""><b>wear</b></font> special slide pants. Even though this horned one eyed king is royalty, he still has to wear the proper safety equipment while on a slide. Luckily, the king enjoys wearing them, so all is well. <br>This word also means <font color=""#f0a""><b>arrive</b></font>, too (for who knows what reason). Just imagine the king from the mnemonic <font color=""#f0a""><b>arriv</b></font>ing in his weird clothes to court, and everyone thinking 'why did he arrive dressed like that??'</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine this one eyed king sliding down the slide wearing all this safety equipment. He’s wearing padded pants, elbow guards, the whole shebang. He looks ridiculous wearing all these things.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>皆<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>all</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">White, Compare</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">If you <font color=""#0af""><b>compare</b></font> <font color=""#0af""><b>white</b></font> to the other colors you'll realize... white consists of <font color=""#f0a""><b>all</b></font> the colors in one. It contains all the colors in the spectrum in one color. It is the one color that is <font color=""#f0a""><b>everything</b></font>.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Just look at the color white. Compare it to other colors. Now look at white again. Split it up into all the colors, creating a beautiful spectrum. Wow, it's <font color=""#f0a""><b>all</b></font> the colors!</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>謝<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>apologize</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Measurement, Say, Somebody</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">You <font color=""#0af""><b>say</b></font> something to <font color=""#0af""><b>somebody</b></font> about the <font color=""#0af""><b>measurement</b></font> of their coat. It's a terrible insult about how it's way too small or something along those lines. This guy is pissed. he grabs your face and yells until you <font color=""#f0a""><b>apologize</b></font>.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Feel the fear you'd feel if someone did this to you. Just think 'all I need to do is apologize as quickly as possible. Apologize! Apologize!'</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>整<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>arrange</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Winter, Ent, Correct</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The <font color=""#0af""><b>ent</b></font> is hanging around in the <font color=""#0af""><b>winter</b></font>. He is trying to <font color=""#0af""><b>correct</b></font> this problem (that it is winter), though he can't do it on his own. So, he goes and talks to his Wizard friend, asking if there's any way to <font color=""#f0a""><b>arrange</b></font> for a weather change.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine the ent talking to the wizard about this. He keeps saying 'if you can <font color=""#f0a""><b>arrange</b></font> this I'd be very grateful' in a gangster sort of voice. Focus in on the 'arrange' portion.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>橋<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>bridge</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Mouth, Tree, Heaven, Mustache</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A&nbsp;<font color=""#0af""><b>tree</b></font>&nbsp;from&nbsp;<font color=""#0af""><b>heaven</b></font>&nbsp;with a&nbsp;<font color=""#0af""><b>mustache</b></font>&nbsp;above his&nbsp;<font color=""#0af""><b>mouth</b></font>&nbsp;valiantly crosses a&nbsp;<font color=""#f0a""><b>bridge</b></font>. This holy tree from heaven was sent down to earth to cross this very bridge. It is the tree’s angelic mission. Also the tree has a mouth and a mustache.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture this majestic tree as it crosses the bridge. Its mustache is very distinguished. Hear its roots and branches swaying, creaking, and cracking in the wind.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>選<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>choose</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Cobra, Fins, Water Slide, Blackjack</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">You are presented with a&nbsp;<b><font color=""#0af"">water slide</font></b>, two&nbsp;<b><font color=""#0af"">cobra</font></b>s, some swim&nbsp;<b><font color=""#0af"">fins</font></b>, and a game of&nbsp;<b><font color=""#0af"">blackjack</font></b>&nbsp;– you may only&nbsp;choose&nbsp;one. Will you&nbsp;<b><font color=""#f0a"">choose</font></b>&nbsp;the fun of a water slide, the exotic pet cobras, the useful swim fins, or the game of blackjack where you have the potential to win lots of money? You may only choose one.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Think about this choice. Which would you choose? A fun slide, cool pet, practical swimwear, or gamble on riches?</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>想<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>concept</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Tree, Eye, Heart</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">If you don’t understand a painting of a <font color=""#0af""><b>tree</b></font> with an <font color=""#0af""><b>eye</b></font> holding a <font color=""#0af""><b>heart</b></font>, you’re not really getting the <font color=""#f0a""><b>concept</b></font>. The eye sees the world as it is, the tree grows strong and stable, and holds the heart of mankind. It’s a pretty simple concept, you just don’t get art very well.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Conceptualize this painting in your mind. Imagine the tree with its eye, holding a heart. Try and imagine what concept the artist was going for.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>器<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>container</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Big, Products</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text""><font color=""#0af""><b>Big</b></font> <font color=""#0af""><b>products</b></font> need to be put in a big <font color=""#f0a""><b>container</b></font>. A small container just won’t do. These products are big and they need a big container to be contained in.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine having all these big products. How will you contain them all!? Imagine yourself stuffing all of these big products into their respective containers.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>暗<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>dark</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Sun, Stand</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">If you yourself are a <font color=""#0af""><b>sun</b></font>, and you <font color=""#0af""><b>stand</b></font> next to another <font color=""#0af""><b>sun</b></font>, no area around you will be <font color=""#f0a""><b>dark</b></font>. The two suns are very bright and standing right next to each other, so all the area will be lit up and nothing will be dark.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Think of how bright the sun is. Now multiply that by two. Suns are especially bright right after you come out of a dark area. Imagine yourself looking at these suns and feeling the pain as your eyes are blinded by the bright light.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>疑<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>doubt</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Arrow, Spoon, Mama, Coat Rack</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">When you get home from school your&nbsp;<b><font color=""#0af"">mama</font></b>&nbsp;says to hang your&nbsp;<b><font color=""#0af"">spoon</font></b>&nbsp;and&nbsp;<b><font color=""#0af"">arrow</font></b>s on the&nbsp;<font color=""#0af""><b>coat rack</b></font>. That doesn't sound like something your mama would say, and you begin to&nbsp;<b><font color=""#f0a"">doubt</font></b>&nbsp;that she's your mama at all! She usually takes them and washes them in the sink. You doubt you can even hang them on the coat rack even if you tried.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Your mama is acting weird. You doubt she's really your mama. What are you going to do?</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>感<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>feeling</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Heart, Drunkard, Creeper</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>drunkard</b></font> with the <font color=""#0af""><b>heart</b></font> of a <font color=""#0af""><b>creeper</b></font> is going to leave you <font color=""#f0a""><b>feeling</b></font> pretty uncomfortable. His creeper heart shows its true nature whenever he’s drunk, and since he’s a drunkard, he is drunk a lot. He’s a serial creeper and leaves everyone feeling violated.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine this creepy drunkard hitting on you, feeling your shoulders and touching your hair. You’re feeling incredible uncomfortable. Imagine what this would be like and how you’d be feeling.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>情<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>feeling, emotion</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Blue, Fish Stick</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">If you eat a <font color=""#0af""><b>blue</b></font> <font color=""#0af""><b>fish stick</b></font>, you may end up <font color=""#f0a""><b>feeling</b></font> sick. Fish sticks aren’t supposed to be blue, so there’s obviously something very wrong with this fish stick. You’ll be feeling very ill if you eat this blue fish stick.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine the <font color=""#f0a""><b>feeling</b></font> of eating this mutated blue fish stick. It tastes… odd. Imagine feeling it on your tongue as you taste its blue fish stickiness.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>料<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>fee</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Rice, Chopsticks</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">If you don’t eat your <font color=""#0af""><b>rice</b></font> with <font color=""#0af""><b>chopsticks</b></font>, you will be charged a <font color=""#f0a""><b>fee</b></font>. Yes, there is a fee for not using chopsticks to eat rice. The fee is very strictly enforced in Japan, so be sure to eat your rice with chopsticks if you don’t want to be charged a fee.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine having to pay a fee for not using chopsticks to eat rice. You’d use chopsticks all the time, wouldn’t you? Picture yourself using chopsticks to eat the rice to avoid paying a fee.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>様<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>formal name title</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Tree, Water, Sheep</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>sheep</b></font> in the <font color=""#0af""><b>water</b></font> by a <font color=""#0af""><b>tree</b></font> has the <font color=""#f0a""><b>formal name title</b></font> of Sir Wilburt Coddington III. When he’s not in his castle, Sir Wilburt Coddington III enjoys playing in water and by trees. He’s a royal sheep. <br>This can also mean <font color=""#f0a""><b>manner</b></font>, as in 'manner' of doing things. Someone who has a formal name title has a different manner of doing things.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture how Sir Wilburt Coddington III obtained his formal name title. He must have done some pretty amazing things, even for a sheep. Just imagine the feats he must have accomplished.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>養<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>foster</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Fins, Sheep, Good</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text""><font color=""#0af""><b>Sheep</b></font> <font color=""#0af""><b>fins</b></font> are <font color=""#0af""><b>good</b></font> for <font color=""#f0a""><b>foster</b></font> children. The sheep have been genetically combined with fish, so the sheep have fins. These sheep fins are very rich in nutrients and as such are very good for foster children that need to grow up big and strong.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine eating a fish fin with sheep wool on it. It tastes fishy like the ocean but the wool tastes like clothes. It’s probably the worst thing ever. Imagine eating something like this and taste its flavor on your tongue.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>緑<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>green</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Water, Thread, Wolverine</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">If you see a <font color=""#0af""><b>wolverine</b></font> in the <font color=""#0af""><b>water</b></font> playing with a piece of <font color=""#0af""><b>thread</b></font>, there’s no doubt that it’s <font color=""#f0a""><b>green</b></font>. Wolverines love green thread. Almost as much as they love the water.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture this wolverine playing with the green thread. It’s like a little kitten with yarn. That wolverine loves that green thread. Picture how cute it is as it plays with the thread and coos in happiness.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>熱<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>heat, fever</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Circle, Fish Tail, Womb</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Swimming in a <font color=""#0af""><b>circle</b></font> <font color=""#0af""><b>womb</b></font>, a <font color=""#0af""><b>fish tail</b></font> gathers <font color=""#f0a""><b>heat</b></font> from the mother. All this heat is concentrating, though, causing the fish to get a <font color=""#f0a""><b>fever</b></font>.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine this fish swimming around and picture it gathering heat every time it moves. You can see the red hot heat radiating off of the fish as it starts to glow.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>億<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>hundred million</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Leader, Idea</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A cult <font color=""#0af""><b>leader</b></font> has a great <font color=""#0af""><b>idea</b></font> to recruit a <font color=""#f0a""><b>hundred million</b></font> new members. Since he’s the guy with all the ideas, he is the leader of the cult. His idea is to give every new member a free puppy. He’ll have a hundred million new recruits in no time.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine a hundred million free puppies. That’s a lot. Imagine playing with all of them. You’d be pretty happy. Unless you hate puppies. Then you’d be pretty unhappy, I imagine.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>殺<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>kill</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Tree, Treasure, Ikea</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text""><font color=""#0af""><b>Ikea</b></font> can make a <font color=""#0af""><b>treasure</b></font> out of a <font color=""#0af""><b>tree</b></font> by instructing its workers to <font color=""#f0a""><b>kill</b></font> the tree. Once the tree has been killed, the tree can then be used to create a treasure that Ikea will sell to fashionable young people.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine Ikea as a killer of trees. Hear the tree wood snap and splinter as the tree cries out to Ikea for mercy, “Don’t kill me! Don’t kill meee~!”</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>宿<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>lodge</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Helmet, Leader, Hundred</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>leader</b></font> wearing a <font color=""#0af""><b>helmet</b></font> requests housing for himself and a <font color=""#0af""><b>hundred</b></font> of his men at a local <font color=""#f0a""><b>lodge</b></font>. The leader is the only one wearing a helmet, so that way you know he is the leader. He leads a hundred men, but they need to rest. That’s why they’ve stopped at this lodge.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine one hundred soldiers all in a lodge at the same time. It’s going to be mighty loud and mighty crowded. Hear the noisy din of the soldiers as you try and make your way through the crowded lobby at the lodge.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>福<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>luck</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Rice Paddy, Pelican, Creeper</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>pelican</b></font> followed all the way to a <font color=""#0af""><b>rice paddy</b></font> by a <font color=""#0af""><b>creeper</b></font> has no <font color=""#f0a""><b>luck</b></font>. This pelican has been trying to get away from this creeper since he started creeping on him by the ocean. Now the pelican has traveled all the way to an inland rice paddy and the creeper is still creeping. What terrible luck.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine how unlucky you are to get followed by a creepy creeper. It really creeps you out. Picture the creeper with his lecherous stares and heavy breathing. You feel a very strong lack of luck.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>鏡<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>mirror</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Stand, See, Gold</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">You can <font color=""#0af""><b>see</b></font> <font color=""#0af""><b>gold</b></font> if you <font color=""#0af""><b>stand</b></font> in front of a <font color=""#f0a""><b>mirror</b></font>. Yes, you are made of gold. You’re so great and valuable, standing in front of that mirror. It’s not hard to see, especially in a mirror – you’re golden.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine looking at yourself in the mirror only to see you’re made of gold. It would be pretty shocking. Imagine how surprised you would be.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>然<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>nature</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Dog, Moon, Fish Tail</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The <font color=""#0af""><b>moon</b></font>, a <font color=""#0af""><b>dog</b></font>, and a <font color=""#0af""><b>fish tail</b></font> are all things that can be found in <font color=""#f0a""><b>nature</b></font>. The moon in the sky, dogs in lots of homes, and fish tails on, you guessed it, fish. Nature is amazing!</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine yourself out in nature looking up at the moon. It’s a beautiful sight and makes you think of how small you really are compared to everything else in nature.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>詩<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>poem</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Say, Temple</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">If you go to a <font color=""#0af""><b>temple</b></font> and <font color=""#0af""><b>say</b></font> a <font color=""#f0a""><b>poem</b></font>, all the gods will hear it. They live in the temple so they hear everything you say. Even poems.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Saying prayers is like saying poems in a temple. Picture yourself saying these poems inside of a temple and hearing your voice reverberate off the ceiling of the temple creating a slight echo.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>練<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>practice</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Thread, East</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Pointing a <font color=""#0af""><b>thread</b></font> to the <font color=""#0af""><b>east</b></font>, you <font color=""#f0a""><b>practice</b></font> your navigation skills. You’ve discovered a method to tell direction using just a thread, so you point it to the east in order to find your way. The method takes practice though, so you’re sure to practice every day.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: East is the land of the rising sun, so imagine yourself practicing this method, pointing the thread to the east as the sun rises up. Feel the heat of the sun’s rays and see the bright light as the sun shines up over the horizon.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>賞<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>prize</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Mouth, Clam, Viking</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">If a <font color=""#0af""><b>Viking</b></font> shoots a <font color=""#0af""><b>clam</b></font> in the <font color=""#0af""><b>mouth</b></font> at a fair, the Viking will win a <font color=""#f0a""><b>prize</b></font>. The game is to shoot the clam in the mouth to knock it over, and that is how the prize is won.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: You’ve probably seen those fair games where you have to shoot something over to win a prize. Imagine yourself doing this and concentrating really hard on hitting the target. Don’t be distracted by all the fair noises you hear around you.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>問<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>problem</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Mouth, Gate</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">If you run into a <font color=""#0af""><b>gate</b></font> <font color=""#0af""><b>mouth</b></font> first, you’re going to have a <font color=""#f0a""><b>problem</b></font>. Smashing your mouth into a gate is going to hurt. A lot. The problem you’re now in is one of getting to a hospital and having your mouth sewn back on.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine having your mouth bashed into a gate. It’s going to hurt. Imagine how painful this would be and how problematic it is.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>館<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>public building</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Helmet, Eat, Bear</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">If you give a <font color=""#0af""><b>bear</b></font> your <font color=""#0af""><b>helmet</b></font> to <font color=""#0af""><b>eat</b></font>, don’t do it in a <font color=""#f0a""><b>public building</b></font>. Bears aren’t meant to be inside public buildings, people would be concerned. Who cares why you gave the bear a helmet to eat, just keep him out of public buildings.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine seeing this helmet eating bear the next time you went to work or school. How did he get into this public building? Imagine how scared you would be face to face with this bear as he roars a blood curdling bear roar.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>映<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>reflect</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Sun, Central</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">In the <font color=""#0af""><b>central</b></font> part of the <font color=""#0af""><b>sun</b></font>, there are thousands of mirrors all pointed outward bouncing off light. I bet you didn't know this was what the sun was made up of. A ton of mirrors all trying to <font color=""#f0a""><b>reflect</b></font> light. If there's enough, there will be a lot of brightness. Reflect, reflect!</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: The sun can reflect off a lot of things. Glare from the sun is annoying. Imagine the sun’s light being reflected into your eyes. The light hurts and you have to squint.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>願<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>request</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Diamond, Geoduck</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>geoduck</b></font> presents a <font color=""#0af""><b>diamond</b></font> in <font color=""#f0a""><b>request</b></font> for marriage. The geoduck is proposing to you with a diamond ring. This geoduck is requesting you to be its partner in life!</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Geoducks are disgusting, but this one has enough confidence to request you be its lifelong partner. It even got you a diamond!</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>士<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>samurai</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Samurai</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The <font color=""#0af""><b>samurai</b></font> radical and the <font color=""#f0a""><b>samurai</b></font> kanji are exactly the same! Tubular!</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: </i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>課<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>section</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Say, Fruit</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">I always <font color=""#0af""><b>say</b></font> the <font color=""#0af""><b>fruit</b></font> <font color=""#f0a""><b>section</b></font> at the grocery should be at the front of the store. It’s the perfect place for the fruit section, I say.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Think about it. Every grocery store has the fruit section right at the front, wouldn’t you say?</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>標<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>signpost</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Tree, &nbsp;Jackhammer, Helicopter</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">You see a&nbsp;<b><font color=""#0af"">tree</font></b>&nbsp;with a&nbsp;<b><font color=""#0af"">helicopter</font></b>&nbsp;and a&nbsp;<b><font color=""#0af"">jackhammer</font></b>&nbsp;tied to it. You look closer, because this is an odd sight, and realize that there is a sign here too. It's telling you to beware of helicopters and jackhammers in this woods. It's a poorly made&nbsp;<b><font color=""#f0a"">signpost</font></b>!</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: This is not the best signpost you've ever seen, but it's better than nothing at all, you suppose.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>銀<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>silver</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Gold, Good</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Okay, so <font color=""#0af""><b>good</b></font> <font color=""#0af""><b>gold</b></font> is great and all, but let me tell you about this new thing that's hitting the streets. It's <font color=""#f0a""><b>silver</b></font>, and it's way more silvery than gold is. Check this out.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine yourself having gold and silver. Which is better? Think it's the silver, even though you have some good gold.</i></span><p> "

They are both at the train <font color=""#f0a""><b>station</b></font>, waiting for a train to come and take them home.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine the horse and the shrimp sitting next to each other on a small bench. There is nobody else at the station, it is awkward.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>像<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>statue</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Leader, Pig, Excuse</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A good <font color=""#0af""><b>leader</b></font> has no <font color=""#0af""><b>excuse</b></font> to <font color=""#0af""><b>pig</b></font> out on a ton of food before someone comes to paint his or her <font color=""#f0a""><b>image</b></font> and then make a <font color=""#f0a""><b>statue</b></font> from it. If you do that, you won't look good for the image / statue that's being made of you, so no pigging out and no excuses, okay leader?</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine the pigging out on a statue sized amount of food. That’s a lot to eat. Now the leader is disgustingly full and the image / statue made of him/her isn't very representative.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>題<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>topic</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Sun, Coat Rack, Geoduck</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A&nbsp;<b><font color=""#0af"">coat rack</font></b>&nbsp;was found in the&nbsp;<b><font color=""#0af"">sun</font></b>&nbsp;with a&nbsp;<b><font color=""#0af"">geoduck</font></b>&nbsp;hanging on it. Oh, and it is starring you!</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine yourself acting along with the other members of the cast. Incorporate the three radicals (sun, coat rack, geoduck) into the skit.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>輪<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>wheel, ring</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Car, Books, Roof</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">If you drive your <font color=""#0af""><b>car</b></font> off the <font color=""#0af""><b>roof</b></font> and into a pile of <font color=""#0af""><b>books</b></font>, you’ll probably lose a <font color=""#f0a""><b>wheel</b></font> and maybe blow an o-<font color=""#f0a""><b>ring</b></font>. Cars aren’t meant to drive on roofs, and books definitely aren’t soft enough to cushion the fall of the car. There’s going to be damage done. Your wheels will get busted up, and you’ll blow an o-ring or something for sure.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture yourself at the wheel of your car as you drive it off the roof. Imagine how scared you would be. You’re going to be injured. Imagine how terrifying this would be, falling off the roof in a car.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>能<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>ability</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Moon, Pile, Spoon</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">If you can <font color=""#0af""><b>pile</b></font> the <font color=""#0af""><b>moon</b></font> onto a <font color=""#0af""><b>spoon</b></font> you have an amazing <font color=""#f0a""><b>ability</b></font>. The moon shouldn’t fit on a spoon, but you’ve somehow managed to pile it on there. What a strange and unique ability you have there.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine yourself holding a spoon with the moon on it. It’s very heavy, and you have to strain to keep it on there, but your ability is superhuman so you can do it.</i></span><p> "

You're obviously in the <font color=""#f0a""><b>acting</b></font> biz. This can also mean <font color=""#f0a""><b>art</b></font> as well. Acting is an art, if you're any good at it.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine a scene that requires these two things. Act out the scene in the reading.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>術<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>art</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Angel, Drop, Go</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">You see an&nbsp;<b><font color=""#0af"">angel&nbsp;go&nbsp;drop</font></b>&nbsp;something outside your house. "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>雰<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>atmosphere</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Rain, Part</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text""><font color=""#0af""><b>Part</b></font> <font color=""#0af""><b>rain</b></font>, part other stuff. I imagine this is what people thought the <font color=""#f0a""><b>atmosphere</b></font> was made out of thousands of years ago.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine looking up into the sky, trying to figure out what the atmosphere up there is made out of. Your only lead: It's raining, a lot. So, the atmosphere must be partly made of rain, and it's just falling down.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>骨<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>bone</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Moon, Forehead, Mustache</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">If you have a&nbsp;<b><font color=""#0af"">mustache</font></b>&nbsp;and you hit your&nbsp;<b><font color=""#0af"">forehead</font></b>&nbsp;on the&nbsp;<b><font color=""#0af"">moon</font></b>, you’re probably going to break a&nbsp;<b style=""color: rgb(226, 0, 150);"">bone</b>. Ok, so it doesn’t matter so much if you have a mustache, but if you’re travelling fast enough to make it to the moon, you’re definitely breaking a bone if you run into it.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine the force and mass of the moon hitting you right in the boney part of your forehead. Whomp! It sure would hurt.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>束<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>bundle</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Ent</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">This kanji looks the same as the radical <font color=""#0af""><b>ent</b></font>, though obviously it doesn't share the same meaning. Imagine taking this ent and cutting it up (horrific!) into smaller pieces. Carry the ent away in a nice <font color=""#f0a""><b>bundle</b></font>.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: How horrible is it that you're cutting apart Treebeard?? And, you leave most of him behind, because you can only carry one bundle.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>周<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>circumference</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Ghost</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>ghost</b></font> can fit through anything, regardless of its <font color=""#f0a""><b>circumference</b></font>. Ghosts pass through all objects so it doesn’t really matter what the circumference is since the ghost will just pass through it anyway.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture a ghost pouring in through a window with a small circumference. You wouldn’t be able to squeeze through that window, but the ghost passes through just fine. It’s creepy.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>協<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>cooperation</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Cross, Power</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Under the <font color=""#0af""><b>cross</b></font> we combine our <font color=""#0af""><b>power</b></font> into one so that we may have <font color=""#f0a""><b>cooperation</b></font> with each other to defeat our mutual enemy!</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Probably some kind of crusade thing going on here. Just imagine the powers combining together to become a greater power. A power of cooperation!</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>例<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>example</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Leader, Bad, Ribs</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>leader</b></font> with <font color=""#0af""><b>bad</b></font> <font color=""#0af""><b>ribs</b></font> sets a poor <font color=""#f0a""><b>example</b></font> for his men to follow. The men, wanting to be like their leader, follow his example and also acquire bad ribs. Now everyone has bad ribs. Way to go, Mr. Leader.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine yourself following this bad leader's example. Break your own ribs and make them bad like his. Feel your bones crack as you inflict this injury upon yourself.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>折<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>fold</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Axe, Nailbat</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">If you hit a <font color=""#0af""><b>nailbat</b></font> enough with an <font color=""#0af""><b>axe</b></font>, it will <font color=""#f0a""><b>fold</b></font>. It’s entirely possible to use an axe to fold a nailbat in half. You just have to know what you’re doing.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture yourself using this axe to get this nailbat to fold. Feel the axe handle in your hands are you swing it down. Chop, chop, chop.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>基<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>foundation</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Grave, Crab</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>crab</b></font> <font color=""#0af""><b>grave</b></font> has become the <font color=""#f0a""><b>foundation</b></font> for a seaside hut. It's right on the seashore, where all the crabs washed up after they died so it's become a grave. But now that area of the beach is a foundation for a new house.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine yourself living in this house that was founded on an area that used to be a crab grave. Hear the sound of the ocean waves breaking on the beach. You can smell the fresh seaside air. And also the dead bodies of crabs.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>性<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>gender</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Life, Fish Stick</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>fish stick</b></font> goes through <font color=""#0af""><b>life</b></font> without <font color=""#f0a""><b>gender</b></font>. Is that fish stick you’re eating made from a fish of the female gender? The male gender? Both genders? You have no idea. Such is the life of a fish stick.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine yourself eating a fish stick. It’s all crunchy and fish like. Taste the fish taste on your tongue. Do fish of different genders taste different? Probably not, but it’s something to think about while you eat your fish stick. <br>This can also mean <font color=""#f0a""><b>nature</b></font> as well.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>妥<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>gentle</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Woman, Cleat</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A&nbsp;<b><font color=""#0af"">woman</font></b>&nbsp;with&nbsp;<b><font color=""#0af"">cleat</font></b>s is walking on someone's back, but she doesn't want to hurt him. She has to be very&nbsp;<b style=""color: rgb(226, 0, 150);"">gentle</b>. Cleats are sharp and pointy, and not designed for back walking, so she's being extra, special gentle right now.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture a woman walking gently over someone's back. She's hardly moving.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>卒<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>graduate</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Cross, Lid, Person</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>person</b></font> puts a <font color=""#0af""><b>lid</b></font> on their <font color=""#0af""><b>cross</b></font> after they <font color=""#f0a""><b>graduate</b></font>. It’s a symbolic gesture, putting the lid over the cross, but it’s just what you do when you graduate around these parts.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine a wooden cross and picture yourself putting a lid over it. Visualize this motion in your mind and imagine having to do something like this at your graduation.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>固<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>hard</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Mouth, Old</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Your <font color=""#0af""><b>mouth</b></font> is <font color=""#0af""><b>old</b></font>. Give it a feel. You touch it and it's so <font color=""#f0a""><b>hard</b></font>, like stone.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine yourself touching your stone hard mouth. You try to move it, but it crackles and doesn't budge. This is what happens when you get old: A hard mouth.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>望<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>hope</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">King, Moon, Death</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Causing <font color=""#0af""><b>death</b></font> at every turn, the <font color=""#0af""><b>moon</b></font> <font color=""#0af""><b>king</b></font> sits inside his moon, getting ready to cause death on anything in his sights. Sounds a lot like the death star from a certain movie. One of which is 'Star Wars: A New <font color=""#f0a""><b>Hope</b></font>.'</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Now picture the death moon king as the Emperor, sitting in his death star. There is no hope, except for that little opening you can shoot through to destroy the whole thing. That's hope, I guess!</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>私<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>i</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Pile, Pine</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">No one can <font color=""#0af""><b>pile</b></font> <font color=""#0af""><b>pine</b></font> branches better than <font color=""#f0a""><b>I</b></font>. I am the best at putting pine branches into a pile. And don’t you forget it.<br>This kanji also means <font color=""#f0a""><b>private</b></font>, too. Why? Well, if you think about it anything that has to do with you (I) is only about you. Other people shouldn't know about this kind of thing, it's all I, I, I, and very private to yourself.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Say this to yourself as you imagine piling pine branches in a most excellent fashion, “I pile pines!” Smell the pine smell as you pile them.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>材<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>lumber</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Tree</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">This kanji is made up of a <font color=""#0af""><b>tree</b></font> and another (slightly modified) <font color=""#0af""><b>tree</b></font>, though the second one is partway cut down. This is because it's about to all be cut down and used for <font color=""#f0a""><b>lumber</b></font>.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture yourself chopping this tree down for lumber. You’re a lumberjack. Feel the axe in your hand and hear the chop chop noise as you turn this tree into lumber.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>参<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>participate</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Big, Hair, Pile</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">If you have a <font color=""#0af""><b>pile</b></font> of <font color=""#0af""><b>big</b></font> <font color=""#0af""><b>hair</b></font> atop your head, you can <font color=""#f0a""><b>participate</b></font> in the big hair competition.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture yourself as one of the guys from a hair metal band. They have big hair. If you participated in a big hair contest like this, you’d certainly win. Picture yourself winning the big hair contest with your big hair. Feel it move as the air blows through it.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>完<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>perfect</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Origin, Helmet</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>helmet</b></font> is the <font color=""#0af""><b>origin</b></font> of a <font color=""#f0a""><b>perfect</b></font> soldier. No soldier is perfect without his helmet. The helmet is the origin of all things perfect in a soldier.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture this perfect helmet as the origin of this soldier. See the pristine helmet shining in the sun. It is magnificent.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>松<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>pine</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Tree, Public</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">When climbing a <font color=""#0af""><b>tree</b></font> in <font color=""#0af""><b>public</b></font>, it’s best to choose a <font color=""#f0a""><b>pine</b></font>. Pine trees offer the most coverage, so you’ll be able to hide, even out in public.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine climbing up a pine tree. The pine needles are prickly, so your hands get pricked as you climb. Smell the pine tree smell and feel the pine sap on your hands.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>約<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>promise</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Thread, Pool</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">You tie a <font color=""#0af""><b>thread</b></font> on your finger before jumping in the <font color=""#0af""><b>pool</b></font> to remind yourself of the <font color=""#f0a""><b>promise</b></font> you made to your mother. The thread represents the promise you made to mow the lawn after you finished swimming in the pool.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: The promise reminding thread on your finger was tied too tight. You can feel the thread starting to cut off your circulation as your finger starts to turn purple and go numb. It’s really uncomfortable.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>残<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>remainder</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Bad, Bar</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Being at a <font color=""#0af""><b>bar</b></font> is <font color=""#0af""><b>bad</b></font> for the <font color=""#f0a""><b>remainder</b></font> of your liver. You have a drinking problem so your liver is in a pretty bad way. It’s bad for you to be drinking at a bar when the remainder of your liver is in such bad shape.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine being at a bar and drinking the remainder of your liver to death. You’re bad. Feel the pain in your liver as you drink more and more.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>求<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>request</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Drop, Ground, Water</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">If you spill a <font color=""#0af""><b>drop</b></font> of <font color=""#0af""><b>water</b></font> on the <font color=""#0af""><b>ground</b></font>, I <font color=""#f0a""><b>request</b></font> you wipe it up. I don’t like my ground to be wet, so any drops of water must be cleaned up. It’s a simple request, really.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Don’t you hate when people spill water or make a mess around the sink and don’t clean it up? Then you have to go and request that they wipe up the mess they made. Such a hassle. How inconsiderate.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>季<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>seasons</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Child, Pine</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>child</b></font> watching a <font color=""#0af""><b>pine</b></font> tree will have trouble observing the <font color=""#f0a""><b>seasons</b></font> change. Through the seasons, pines look largely the same, so it would be hard for a child to tell what season it was by looking at a pine.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Maybe you have a pine tree in your yard. Remember how it stays the same throughout the seasons? Imagine smelling the pine of a Christmas tree, feeling the pine needles in your hands and stepping on pine needles with your bare feet. You can do this in all the seasons of the year.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>技<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>skill</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Frog, Nailbat</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Becoming proficient at hitting a <font color=""#0af""><b>frog</b></font> with a <font color=""#0af""><b>nailbat</b></font> is a <font color=""#f0a""><b>skill</b></font> that doesn’t take much practice to master. Nailbats are deadly weapons, and frogs aren’t very fast. It doesn’t take much skill to hit a frog with a nailbat.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Pretend your best skill is hitting frogs with a nailbat. Imagine yourself hitting a frog with a nailbat. Using your skill, you smash the frog with your nailbat and guts come flying back, spraying onto your face. It’s disgusting.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>格<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>status</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Tree, Kiss</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">If you <font color=""#0af""><b>kiss</b></font> a <font color=""#0af""><b>tree</b></font>, your <font color=""#f0a""><b>status</b></font> will change to, “In a relationship with a tree.”</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: You know Facebook relationship statuses. If you kiss a tree, your status will be that you’re in a relationship with said tree. Imagine how silly that would be.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>頑<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>stubborn</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Origin, Geoduck</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The <font color=""#0af""><b>origin</b></font> of the <font color=""#0af""><b>geoduck</b></font> is a pretty <font color=""#f0a""><b>stubborn</b></font> one. The geoduck race is so stubborn that it refused to evolve into an animal that made any sense. Hence, the origin of the geoduck is one of stubbornness.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: You know what a geoduck looks like, right? Does that look like a creature that was looking to change and evolve and be awesome? No, geoducks are weird and stubborn. Imagine how stubborn you’d have to be to not want to evolve into a more attractive animal.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>囲<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>surround</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Mouth, Well</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The <font color=""#0af""><b>mouth</b></font> of a <font color=""#0af""><b>well</b></font> will <font color=""#f0a""><b>surround</b></font> you if you fall into it. The mouth of a well is the opening of the well, and if you fall into that well, the mouth as well as the rest of the well will surround you.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture yourself surrounded by this well on all sides. You look up and you can barely see the mouth of the well where you fell in and now you are trapped. Imagine how scared you are. Imagine trying to claw your way up the sides of the well but all you do is break your nails on the walls.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>的<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>target</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">White, Pool</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>white</b></font> guy jumps into a <font color=""#0af""><b>pool</b></font> with a <font color=""#f0a""><b>target</b></font> painted on the bottom. "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>念<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>thought</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Heart, Now</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">If you live in the <font color=""#0af""><b>now</b></font>, there’s a good chance your <font color=""#0af""><b>heart</b></font> controls your <font color=""#f0a""><b>thought</b></font> process. What was it? Use these emotions to remember this kanji.</i></span><p> "
