"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>歴<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>continuation</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Tree, Stop, Cliff</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">You <font color=""#0af""><b>stop</b></font> at a <font color=""#0af""><b>cliff</b></font> with a <font color=""#0af""><b>tree</b></font> on it, realizing that <font color=""#f0a""><b>continuation</b></font> is impossible unless you find some way to bridge the gap to the other side of the cliff. The tree seems long enough to reach to the other side, but how are you going to chop it down?</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine yourself on this cliff. You desire a continuation for your journey, not wanting to stop here. Feel the strong wind on your body, blowing your hair about as you stand on the edge of the cliff. "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>続<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>continue</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Thread, Sell</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">You have to&nbsp;<b><font color=""#0af"">sell&nbsp;thread</font></b>&nbsp;if you want to&nbsp;<b style=""color: rgb(226, 0, 150);"">continue</b>&nbsp;to live. Make sure you continue to sell that thread every single day!</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine selling thread so you can continue living your life.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>減<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>decrease</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Tsunami, Feeling</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">You see a&nbsp;<b><font color=""#0af"">tsunami</font></b>&nbsp;and get the&nbsp;<b><font color=""#0af"">feeling</font></b>&nbsp;that it's actually going to&nbsp;<b style=""color: rgb(226, 0, 150);"">decrease</b>&nbsp;in size. Probably because the heart is missing from the feeling you're having. If it was a normal, huge tsunami you'd feel a lot of things (scared, excited, jiggly). But this one is different. You just feel like it's going to decrease until there's nothing left of it. How convenient!</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine looking at a tsunami and feeling in the missing spot where your heart should be that it's going to decrease in size. You know deep down you're gonna be alright!</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>昆<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>descendants</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Sun, Compare</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">If you <font color=""#0af""><b>compare</b></font> the <font color=""#0af""><b>sun</b></font> to its <font color=""#f0a""><b>descendants</b></font>, you’ll notice that the descendants don’t quite shine as brightly as the sun does. You don’t like to compare them, because each sun is special in its own way, but the descendants just aren’t quite as shiny as the original.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Look at the sun and its many descendant stars. Their light burns your eyes, making them water. Picture yourself squinting while you look at these many suns.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>困<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>distressed, troubled</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Mouth, Tree</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">If you put your <font color=""#0af""><b>mouth</b></font> on a <font color=""#0af""><b>tree</b></font> and try to eat it, you’re probably a <font color=""#f0a""><b>distressed</b></font> and <font color=""#f0a""><b>troubled</b></font> individual (unless you’re a woodchuck). You don’t need to eat this tree, you have plenty of food at home. Get your mouth off that tree you strange, distressed, troubled child.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine yourself as this distressed and troubled person. Things go up, then they come down. It doesn’t get much easier than that.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Feel gravity pulling on you now. This poor sheep lost his horns and now feels quite sad. Sheep don’t have hands, so the sheep had to pick the horns up off the ground with his mouth. Now a stone.&nbsp;<b style=""color: rgb(226, 0, 150);"">Certain</b>.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>械<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>contraption</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Tree, Twenty, Drunkard</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Under a&nbsp;<b><font color=""#0af"">tree</font></b>&nbsp;a&nbsp;<b><font color=""#0af"">drunkard</font></b>&nbsp;sits with&nbsp;<b><font color=""#0af"">twenty</font></b>&nbsp;things. These things are all manner of&nbsp;<font color=""#f0a""><b>contraption</b></font>s.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: There's little electronic ones, little bopping ones, little walking ones... twenty of them. Twenty weird and interesting&nbsp;<font color=""#f0a""><b>contraption</b></font>s. If it helps, imagine them all individually, thinking about how each one is a weird&nbsp;<font color=""#f0a""><b>contraption</b></font>.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>犯<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>crime</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Snake, Animal</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">In the <font color=""#0af""><b>animal</b></font> kingdom, a <font color=""#0af""><b>snake</b></font> is the most likely to commit a <font color=""#f0a""><b>crime</b></font>. Remember the Garden of Eden? The snake was the bad guy. Ever since then, snakes are the animal most known for committing crime.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture a snake as a hardened criminal. See this snake with many prison tattoos and muscles from working out in his jail cell. Hear the snake hissing as it slithers about to commit yet another crime.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>害<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>damage, injury</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Mouth, Life, Helmet</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">You must wear a&nbsp;<b><font color=""#0af"">helmet</font></b>&nbsp;to protect your&nbsp;<b><font color=""#0af"">life</font></b>. But when you crash things like your&nbsp;<b><font color=""#0af"">mouth</font></b>&nbsp;will still get&nbsp;<b style=""color: rgb(226, 0, 150);"">damage</b>&nbsp;and&nbsp;<b><font color=""#f0a"">injury</font></b>&nbsp;to them.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Only so much a helmet can protect. Sure, your life is saved, but your mouth got banged up. Imagine yourself on a bike, flying off, and banging your mouth on the ground. At least you're alive, right?</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>議<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>deliberation, discussion</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Say, Righteousness</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">What you&nbsp;<font color=""#0af""><b>say</b></font>&nbsp;is&nbsp;<font color=""#0af""><b>righteousness</b></font>, at least that is what you believe. This is your style of&nbsp;<b><font color=""#f0a"">deliberation</font></b>&nbsp;and&nbsp;<b><font color=""#f0a"">discussion</font></b>.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture yourself in a deliberation with some other people. "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>余<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>surplus</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Jackhammer, Hat</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Regardless of whether or not you wear a <font color=""#0af""><b>hat</b></font> while you <font color=""#0af""><b>jackhammer</b></font>, you’re going to have a <font color=""#f0a""><b>surplus</b></font> of noise. "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>尾<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>tail</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Flag, Fur</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">You see a <font color=""#0af""><b>flag</b></font> stuck in the ground with a little bit of <font color=""#0af""><b>fur</b></font> coming out from it and on closer inspection you realize it’s actually a <font color=""#f0a""><b>tail</b></font>. All that’s visible now is some fur and part of the tail.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: What kind of animal could it be? You start to feel the soft fur with your hand and then the stench of death hits your nostrils. Ew.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>論<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>theory</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Say, Books, Roof</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">They <font color=""#0af""><b>say</b></font> that a <font color=""#0af""><b>roof</b></font> can hold over one bazillion <font color=""#0af""><b>books</b></font> – it’s just a <font color=""#f0a""><b>theory</b></font> though. This theory hasn’t actually been tested, it’s just something they say. Can a roof really hold over one bazillion books? Is the roof strong enough to support that many books? We may never know.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: See yourself trying to prove this theory. You’ve gathered up one bazillion books and now you’re stacking them atop the roof. Feel the bindings as you stack them on the roof, breeze causing the pages to flap and flutter in the wind.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>厚<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>thick</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Sun, Child, Cliff</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Hanging off the edge of a&nbsp;<b><font color=""#0af"">cliff</font></b>&nbsp;is a&nbsp;<b><font color=""#0af"">sun</font></b>&nbsp;worshipping&nbsp;<b><font color=""#0af"">child</font></b>&nbsp;with a&nbsp;<b style=""color: rgb(226, 0, 150);"">thick</b>&nbsp;unibrow. Hanging off the cliff, the child cries at the sun for cursing him to this cruel fate. Even the thickness of his unibrow is not enough to give the child the strength to pull himself back up.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: I mean, this unibrow is really, really thick. So thick it doesn’t even look real. But it is. It’s really real and really thick.</i></span><p> "

You’re playing hide and seek with your wife and she chose to hide on the ground. "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>責<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>blame</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Life, Clam</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The modified <font color=""#0af""><b>life</b></font> of a <font color=""#0af""><b>clam</b></font> is to <font color=""#f0a""><b>blame</b></font> for the current generation. "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>条<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>clause</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Tree, Winter</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">In <font color=""#0af""><b>winter</b></font>, a <font color=""#0af""><b>tree</b></font> writes up a governing <font color=""#f0a""><b>clause</b></font> for how the tree federation should behave in the winter. "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>挙<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>raise</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Fins, Ground, Hand, Grass</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">If there’s <font color=""#0af""><b>grass</b></font> on the <font color=""#0af""><b>ground</b></font> and <font color=""#0af""><b>fins</b></font> in your <font color=""#0af""><b>hand</b></font>, you need to <font color=""#f0a""><b>raise</b></font> that hand up to the sky. You’re in the middle of a fisherman’s ritual, which can only be performed on grassy ground. You take fish fins from the previous year, and raise them up to the sky in order to ensure a good fishing harvest.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Feel the grass in your toes and the fins in your hand as you raise them up to the sky. See the sun glistening off the fins as you raise them up in the air.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>認<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>recognize</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Drop, Sword, Heart, Say</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">They <font color=""#0af""><b>say</b></font> a <font color=""#0af""><b>sword</b></font> will cause <font color=""#0af""><b>drop</b></font> upon drops of blood to spill from your <font color=""#0af""><b>heart</b></font> once you <font color=""#f0a""><b>recognize</b></font> you’ve been stabbed. Getting shanked in the heart by a sword will surely cause at least one drop of blood to spill from you, but first you must recognize that you’ve actually been stabbed.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Look down at your chest. Recognize that you’ve been stabbed in the chest with a sword. It hurts a lot. See the first drop of blood eke out of your heart and down your chest.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>資<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>resources</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Clam, Next</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The <font color=""#0af""><b>next</b></font> <font color=""#0af""><b>clam</b></font> will be yours, but this clam will be mine. These are the <font color=""#f0a""><b>resources</b></font> we have to share and distribute. If we don't distribute them this way (next one is yours, this one is mine) we may all starve to death. Would you want that?</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine a pile of clams. Above them is a sign that says resources on it. You are thinking, why do I get the next one and not this current one? What's up with that? The guy distributing them is obviously corrupt and greedy, so feel upset about that and his way with resources.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>義<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>righteousness</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Righteousness</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The kanji and the word are exactly the same. That means they share meanings as well.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: If you know the radical, you will know the kanji as well!</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>権<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>rights</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Tree, Arrow, Turkey</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Under the <font color=""#0af""><b>tree</b></font> lays a <font color=""#0af""><b>turkey</b></font> with a broken <font color=""#0af""><b>arrow</b></font> in it. The police finally have stopped this evil turkey by shooting it with an arrow. Before it dies, the last thing they do is read it its <font color=""#f0a""><b>rights</b></font>.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture the police officer reading this turkey its rights. In fact, say the rights out loud (make something up) to the turkey in your head. You are the police officer who shot this dying turkey, so you have to read it its rights.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>派<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>sect</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Cliff, Tsunami, Tofu</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>tsunami</b></font> hits the <font color=""#0af""><b>cliff</b></font> on which the <font color=""#0af""><b>tofu</b></font> <font color=""#f0a""><b>sect</b></font> is living. The sect chose to live on this cliff to be closer to the tofu deity in the sky, but now their lives are in danger from the tsunami.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture this sect of tofu lovers up on their cliff. "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>務<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>task</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Power, Winter, Soldier</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>soldier</b></font> in <font color=""#0af""><b>winter</b></font> gains <font color=""#0af""><b>power</b></font> when he completes a <font color=""#f0a""><b>task</b></font>. Each task he completes grants him experience points which in turn grant him power. Currently, the soldier is fighting a winter battle, so he can use all the power he can get.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine yourself as this soldier, running around doing task after task. You need all that experience to level up! Feel the cold winter air around you and hear the crunch of snow beneath your feet.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>税<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>tax</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Pine, Guard</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">You're climbing a&nbsp;<b><font color=""#0af"">pine</font></b>&nbsp;tree when a&nbsp;<b><font color=""#0af"">guard</font></b>&nbsp;comes up and tells you that you have to pay a&nbsp;<b style=""color: rgb(226, 0, 150);"">tax</b>. "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>解<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>untie</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Cow, Sword, Angle</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Look at it from this <font color=""#0af""><b>angle</b></font> – if we stick the <font color=""#0af""><b>sword</b></font> in the <font color=""#0af""><b>cow</b></font>, and <font color=""#f0a""><b>untie</b></font> the rope around the door, we’ll be able to <font color=""#f0a""><b>solve</b></font> this puzzle. You’re in a strange room and there is a cow blocking the exit. There’s a sword on the ground, and the handle on the door is tied shut with a rope. I think the only way to solve this problem is to kill the cow with the sword to get it out of the way, and then untie the rope holding the door shut.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine yourself walking through the steps of this puzzle you must solve. Feel the cold steel of the sword as you plunge it into the cow’s heart to kills it. Feel the coarseness of the rope as you untie it from the door.</i></span><p> "

You’re a hero! Someone suffered a broken heart in the middle of a public gathering, and you’re the only doctor available. Taking action, you use a thread to sew the heart back up and make it whole once again.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine yourself wrist deep in someone’s chest cavity as you sew their heart back up to make it whole. "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>営<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>manage</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Bathtub, Viking</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">If a <font color=""#0af""><b>Viking</b></font> is in a <font color=""#0af""><b>bathtub</b></font>, there’s no way you’ll <font color=""#f0a""><b>manage</b></font> to get him out. There’s no way you’re ever going to manage to move this stubborn Viking.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture yourself standing on the edge of the bathtub, struggling to get this Viking out of the bathtub. It’s impossible. You’ll never manage to get him out of there! Make sure to really feel your muscles tense as you try with all your might to move this Viking. You need to really get into this one, so that you don’t get it screwed up with “Shinto Shrine” (宮). Imagine the three lines on the top of this kanji representing sweat and stress lines from how hard you’re working to pull this Viking out of the bathtub.</span></i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>坊<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>monk</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Grave, Direction</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The <font color=""#0af""><b>grave</b></font> is in the same <font color=""#0af""><b>direction</b></font> as the <font color=""#f0a""><b>monk</b></font>. If you’re looking for the grave, just follow the monk, they’re in the same direction.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Monks are religious people, and graves usually stir up some spiritual feelings. "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>罰<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>penalty</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Say, Ribs, Sauron</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">One day, <font color=""#0af""><b>Sauron</b></font> will <font color=""#0af""><b>say</b></font> that he wants to remove your <font color=""#0af""><b>ribs</b></font> as a <font color=""#f0a""><b>penalty</b></font>. I’m not sure what you’re going to do to earn this penalty, but you’ll do it eventually. "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>案<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>plan</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Tree, Cheap</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The <font color=""#0af""><b>cheap</b></font> <font color=""#0af""><b>tree</b></font> has a <font color=""#f0a""><b>plan</b></font>. A plan to reduce the budget deficit. The cheap tree lives cheap and has led a life of cheapness so it knows how to make a cheap plan. The cheap tree is going to reduce spending and improve life. What a great plan.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture this tree in a TV advertisement. Hear the tree detailing its cheap plan and how its plan is the best plan.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>策<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>plan</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Tree, Head, Bamboo</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">With a <font color=""#0af""><b>bamboo</b></font> <font color=""#0af""><b>tree</b></font> resting atop your <font color=""#0af""><b>head</b></font>, you devise a <font color=""#f0a""><b>plan</b></font>. The plan is actually for getting the bamboo tree off of your head. You’re trapped under it.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine being trapped under this bamboo tree that is resting on your head. You’re stuck. Feel the weight of the bamboo tree pressing on your head as you try and devise a plan to get out from under it.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>提<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>present, submit</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Sun, Correct, Nailbat</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Launching a <font color=""#0af""><b>nailbat</b></font> at the <font color=""#0af""><b>sun</b></font> with a catapult is not exactly the <font color=""#0af""><b>correct</b></font> way to <font color=""#f0a""><b>present</b></font> a gift and <font color=""#f0a""><b>submit</b></font> it to the sun. You wish to appease the sun, so you want to submit a gift to gain its approval. As such, you present it with this nailbat, but do so in a manner which isn’t quite correct.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: See yourself loading this nailbat into this catapult. Hear the twang as the nailbat gets launched into the air and towards the sun. This is not quite the correct way to submit a gift to the sun, so remember that the radical for correct in this kanji is modified, not quite correct.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>置<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>put</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Lion, Sauron, Pope</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text""><font color=""#0af""><b>Sauron</b></font> became a <font color=""#0af""><b>pope</b></font> in order to have a <font color=""#0af""><b>lion</b></font> <font color=""#f0a""><b>put</b></font> in the Vatican. Sauron loves lions and always believed that at least one lion belonged inside the Vatican. However, in order to have one put in, he had to first become a pope.&nbsp;</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine Sauron all decked out in pope garb as his sits in his mighty pope chair and pets the lion he put in the Vatican. Pope Sauron sure is one bad dude.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>域<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>region</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Ground, Mouth, Grave, Drunkard</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Under a <font color=""#0af""><b>grave</b></font> in the <font color=""#0af""><b>ground</b></font> is a <font color=""#0af""><b>drunkard</b></font> with something in his <font color=""#0af""><b>mouth</b></font> from a <font color=""#f0a""><b>region</b></font> in North America. He died from whatever it is that’s in his mouth. That’s how this drunkard ended up in this grave in the ground. His whole face region is disfigured from whatever he ate. I wonder what region of North America the strange object came from.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Try and imagine yourself unearthing this dead drunkard and trying to figure out what’s in his mouth. Smell the decay of flesh as you poke around in his mouth, trying to figure out what this thing is in his drunkard mouth. Think of an object and what region of North America it comes from.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>応<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>respond</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Heart, Mullet</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">If you have a <font color=""#0af""><b>mullet</b></font>, regardless of how good a <font color=""#0af""><b>heart</b></font> you have, I’m not going to <font color=""#f0a""><b>respond</b></font> to anything you say. "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>宮<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>shinto shrine</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Helmet, Bathtub</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Wearing a <font color=""#0af""><b>helmet</b></font> in the <font color=""#0af""><b>bathtub</b></font> of a <font color=""#f0a""><b>Shinto Shrine</b></font> is nothing strange. Shinto Shrines are home to many odd things, and the ritual of wearing a helmet in the Shinto Shrine bathtub in one such event. So don’t be afraid to take your helmet the next time you get in the bathtub at a Shinto Shrine.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine yourself wearing this helmet as you soak in the warm waters of the bathtub, hearing the chanting all around you in the Shinto Shrine. Make sure to really feel the hot water of the bathtub, the helmet on your head, and the sounds of the Shinto Shrine around you. You need to really get into this one, so that you don’t get it screwed up with “manage” (営). Imagine the helmet as a German war helmet from World War I - the ones that have a single spike coming out of the top. Vividly use that image to remember this kanji.</span></i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>吸<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>suck, inhale</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Mouth, Escalator</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">In your <font color=""#0af""><b>mouth</b></font> you take an <font color=""#0af""><b>escalator</b></font> and <font color=""#f0a""><b>suck</b></font> and <font color=""#f0a""><b>inhale</b></font> it into your body. You’re incredibly hungry so you’re eating everything in sight. The first thing that your mouth finds to eat is an escalator. You suck it down, practically inhaling it in your feeding frenzy.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine yourself as you inhale a whole escalator. You go down a water slide in your bathing suit, so you really need to show off your stuff by using facial hair. The mustache is the most manly thing you can wear on your face, so to be the most manly, it makes sense to grow two of them. You’ll easily surpass all others using this strategy.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture yourself with two mustaches, one over the other. You really have to pee, so you follow the thread over to the outhouse. The campsite you’re at is united with the outhouse by this piece of thread.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: You really have to pee. "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>価<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>value</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Leader, Helicopter</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The&nbsp;<b><font color=""#0af"">helicopter</font></b>&nbsp;the&nbsp;<b><font color=""#0af"">leader</font></b>&nbsp;is in has the most&nbsp;<b style=""color: rgb(226, 0, 150);"">value</b>! "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>値<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>value</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Lion, Leader, Pope</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">As a <font color=""#0af""><b>leader</b></font> of a <font color=""#0af""><b>lion</b></font>, the <font color=""#0af""><b>pope</b></font> has great <font color=""#f0a""><b>value</b></font>. Not many can lead a lion as the pope does, so this grants him a higher value than most people. It’s part of the reason he was made pope, actually.<br>Note: By the way, this word is also used for the other type of ""value"" - the mathematical kind (a value). You may not come across this definition as often, but keep it in mind!</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: See this pope, leader of lions. To show everyone how much value he has, the pope parades around leading a lion. See him walking through the streets with the lion behind him. "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>藤<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>wisteria</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Moon, Water, Flowers, Horns, Train</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text""><font color=""#0af""><b>Flowers</b></font> from the <font color=""#0af""><b>moon</b></font> adorned with <font color=""#0af""><b>horns</b></font> riding a <font color=""#0af""><b>train</b></font> over <font color=""#0af""><b>water</b></font> are known as <font color=""#f0a""><b>wisteria</b></font> flowers. Wisteria includes ten species of woody climbing vines native to the Eastern United States and to China, Korea, and Japan. They are an aquatic flowering plant, so they got a snack when they rode that train over the water. Their petals look like little purple horns and they look kind of strange too so they must be from the moon.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Google this flower if you don’t know what it is. Now that you have the image or a wisteria in your mind. Picture it and its journey from the moon riding a train in water. It’s a very strange journey, but this is a strange flower. This kanji is most commonly used in names, so you can remember that by keeping in mind that it’s not a very commonly known flower, and people want to have unique names so they use this kanji in them or something.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>庁<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>agency</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Nail, Mullet</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Armed with nothing but a <font color=""#0af""><b>mullet</b></font> and a <font color=""#0af""><b>nail</b></font>, you command an <font color=""#f0a""><b>agency</b></font> of the highest regard in the <font color=""#f0a""><b>government office</b></font>. "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>額<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>amount</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Guest, Geoduck</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">This word has three really important meanings. It's probably best if you remember them all. Let's do this!<br>When you're a&nbsp;<b><font color=""#0af"">guest</font></b>&nbsp;somewhere it's important to bring&nbsp;<b><font color=""#0af"">geoduck</font></b>s. But more than that, the&nbsp;<b><font color=""#f0a"">amount</font></b>&nbsp;of geoducks you bring is really what matters. If you don't have any live geoducks go ahead and bring any amount of&nbsp;<b><font color=""#f0a"">framed picture</font></b>s of geoducks instead. If you can't even do that, well, then you're going to have to tattoo geoducks on your&nbsp;<b><font color=""#f0a"">forehead</font></b>.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: If you're a guest you either have to have the right amount of geoducks, geoducks in framed pictures, or geoducks on your forehead. "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>燃<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>burn</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Fire, Nature</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text""><font color=""#0af""><b>Fire</b></font> in <font color=""#0af""><b>nature</b></font> will <font color=""#f0a""><b>burn</b></font> down everything in its path. You’re out in nature – the middle of a forest fire. Hear the woods burn and crackle as you feel the heat around you.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>担<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>carry, bear</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Sunrise, Nailbat</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">You hold a&nbsp;<b style=""color: rgb(10, 156, 230);"">nailbat</b>&nbsp;and watch the&nbsp;<b style=""color: rgb(10, 156, 230);"">sunrise</b>. It is a long time to have to&nbsp;<b><font color=""#f0a"">carry</font></b>&nbsp;a weight such as this.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Carry the nailbat. Bear its weight. Feel it pressing down on your body as the sun rises in the distance.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>祝<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>celebrate</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Pelican, Older Brother</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A&nbsp;<font color=""#0af""><b>pelican</b></font>&nbsp;and your&nbsp;<font color=""#0af""><b>older brother</b></font>&nbsp;get together to&nbsp;<font color=""#f0a""><b>celebrate</b></font>.&nbsp;You know when these two get together it's going to be a crazy celebration.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Indeed, these two throw a wild party. Imagine the craziest celebration you can, thrown by your older brother and this pelican. They're cheering, drinking, and jumping into pools from the roof.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>届<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>deliver</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Flag, Reason</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The American <font color=""#0af""><b>flag</b></font> is the <font color=""#0af""><b>reason</b></font> you need to <font color=""#f0a""><b>deliver</b></font> this package. The flag is inside the package, and you need to deliver it to the president. He lost his old flag, so now it’s up to you to deliver this new one to him. What more of a reason do you need?</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: You need to deliver this flag to the president. Imagine yourself running as fast as you can while carrying the parcel in order to get it to him. Your lungs are tired and your legs burn, but you must deliver the flag as soon as possible!</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>違<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>different</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Water Slide, Cow God</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>water slide</b></font> and a <font color=""#0af""><b>cow god</b></font> are two completely <font color=""#f0a""><b>different</b></font> things. While both are fun to ride, a cow god and a water slide are very different and should not be confused with one another.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine sliding down a water slide. Now imagine riding around the world on a cow god. Both experiences are fun. But they’re also different. Think about what makes each experience different.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>差<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>distinction</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Construction, Slide, Sheep</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>sheep</b></font> with no legs that goes down a <font color=""#0af""><b>slide</b></font> with any knowledge of <font color=""#0af""><b>construction</b></font> lacks the <font color=""#f0a""><b>distinction</b></font> necessary to get new legs. This sheep is missing its bottom half, so it often gets to places by using slides. However, the sheep doesn’t know anything about construction, so it’s pretty clueless how to make slides or even how they work. Lacking distinction, no one really cares about this sheep enough to get it that leg transplant it so desperately wants.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: The sheep radical is missing its bottom, so keep that in mind as to why this sheep has no legs. See this legless sheep zooming around town in the slides, baa-baa-ing all the way.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>象<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>elephant, phenomenon</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Pig, Excuse</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">If you make too many&nbsp;<b><font color=""#0af"">excuse</font></b>s around a&nbsp;<b><font color=""#0af"">pig</font></b>&nbsp;it will turn into an&nbsp;<b><font color=""#f0a"">elephant</font></b>. All those excuses build up in the pigs body and it transforms. Elephants remember everything, you know? And now it’s stuck remembering all the excuses you made. It exists to remind you of them. This is a special&nbsp;<b><font color=""#f0a"">phenomenon</font></b>&nbsp;that only happens when you make excuses around pigs. You can lie around other animals and pigs that have already turned into elephants. I can’t say they won’t judge you though.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture it in your mind. Make a bunch of excuses in front of your pet pig. About how you don’t have time to study your kanji. You have previous plans, you can’t go out. You have to wash your hair, so you can’t clean the pig’s pen this week. WOMWOMWOMWOM - what’s the sound?! YOUR PIG IS AN ELEPHANT NOW!</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>展<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>expand</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Flag, Kick, Blackjack</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">There’s a <font color=""#0af""><b>flag</b></font> under the <font color=""#0af""><b>blackjack</b></font> table that you can <font color=""#0af""><b>kick</b></font> in order to <font color=""#f0a""><b>expand</b></font> the table. Sometimes you only have a few people playing blackjack so you don’t need to kick the flag at all, and sometimes  there are many people playing blackjack so you need to kick the flag many times in order to expand it to a proper size.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine yourself kicking this flag to see the blackjack table expand. Feel your foot kicking the flag. You’ve kicked it so many times that your leg is sore, but you need to expand the table some more so you keep kicking it. Imagine the blackjack table making that sound Mario makes whenever he gets a mushroom and expands in size.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>層<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>layer</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Flag, Mask</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Behind the <font color=""#0af""><b>flag</b></font> lies a <font color=""#0af""><b>mask</b></font> – yet another <font color=""#f0a""><b>layer</b></font> of secrecy. You’re standing in front of a crowd, giving a rousing speech. Hiding your face is the flag of your country, and behind that flag you’re also wearing a mask, just in case the flag falls down. The extra layer of secrecy is just to be safe. You don’t want your identity to be revealed.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Behind the flag is a mask, and underneath that mask is another layer. It’s another mask. Picture yourself removing mask after mask – it’s a never-ending stream of masks. Layer after layer, you can’t be unmasked.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>視<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>look at</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Pelican, See</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>pelican</b></font> can <font color=""#0af""><b>see</b></font> you are nothing to <font color=""#f0a""><b>look at</b></font>. The pelican might look at you, and you can see that the pelican is looking at you, but the pelican asserts that you aren’t much to look at.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Look at the pelican looking at you. See its beady pelican eyes and wonder what’s going on in that head of its.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>環<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>loop</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Ground, King, Sauron, Zombie</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text""><font color=""#0af""><b>King</b></font> <font color=""#0af""><b>Sauron</b></font> raises from the <font color=""#0af""><b>ground</b></font> <font color=""#0af""><b>zombie</b></font> after zombie in an infinite <font color=""#f0a""><b>loop</b></font>. Sauron, king of all the lands, has decided to raise an army of zombies from the ground to keep everything in order. However, he’s gotten stuck in a loop and can’t stop raising zombies from the ground.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture King Sauron raising zombies from the ground. He can’t stop, no matter how much he wants to. No time for eating or sleeping, King Sauron is all gaunt and sickly looking. He also smells pretty foul.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>製<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>manufacture</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Clothes, Control</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">In an attempt to <font color=""#0af""><b>control</b></font> your <font color=""#0af""><b>clothes</b></font>, you <font color=""#f0a""><b>manufacture</b></font> a mind control device. This mind control device will allow you to control the mind of your clothes and all that they do. You just need to manufacture it.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine being able to control your clothes with your mind. What would you have them do? Imagine what you would do with your clothes if you could manufacture something to control them and move them around at will with your mind.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>述<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>mention</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Drop, Angel, Water Slide</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">After sliding down a <font color=""#0af""><b>water slide</b></font>, an <font color=""#0af""><b>angel</b></font> steps in a <font color=""#0af""><b>drop</b></font> of blood, because I forgot to <font color=""#f0a""><b>mention</b></font> that he’s gravely wounded. Since I forgot to mention it earlier, I’ll tell you now. On the water slide, the angel got stabbed in the gut, so the drop of blood on the ground that he stepped in actually came from his own body.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: See the angel slide down the water slide all filled with joy and such, only to get to the bottom and realize he’s been stabbed, standing in a big drop of blood. Did I mention he’s screaming? Listen to the angel scream as he continues to bleed.</i></span><p> "

They stop the ground from moving forward and taking over the lands. As the military they have to protect the people, and that involves stopping the ground.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine yourself in this military as well, stopping the ground.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>型<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>model</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Grave, Lantern, Ribs</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">If you get hit with a <font color=""#0af""><b>lantern</b></font> in the <font color=""#0af""><b>ribs</b></font> and end up in a <font color=""#0af""><b>grave</b></font>, you’re the <font color=""#f0a""><b>model</b></font> image of the <font color=""#f0a""><b>type</b></font> of person who is very unlucky. Getting hit in the ribs with a lantern is usually not enough to kill you, but you ended up in a grave. You’re an unfortunate type of person.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Dying from a lantern blow to the ribs is not model behavior. Feel the lantern crashing into your body and snapping your ribs on impact. Hear the crack of bone as you fall into the grave where you die.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>狭<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>narrow</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Husband, Horns, Animal</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">You have an <font color=""#0af""><b>animal</b></font> for a <font color=""#0af""><b>husband</b></font> with <font color=""#0af""><b>horns</b></font> that are <font color=""#f0a""><b>narrow</b></font>. This animal husband of yours is a goat. A goat with narrow horns. Why is this animal your husband? You’re weird, that’s why.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine yourself married to this animal husband with horns that are narrow. It’s a strange marriage. Listen to the goat making its goat noises as it clomps around your home. Now hug your goat husband and feel its soft fluffy coat against your skin.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>管<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>pipe</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Bamboo, Helmet, Bear</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>bamboo</b></font> <font color=""#0af""><b>helmet</b></font> protects the head of a <font color=""#0af""><b>bear</b></font> as he travels through a large <font color=""#f0a""><b>pipe</b></font>. This bear is going on a dangerous expedition through this pipe, so it needs a helmet for safety. The only helmet available in the bear’s size was a bamboo one, so that is what the bear wears as it traverses the pipe.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: See this bear in his bamboo helmet, bumbling along through the pipe. Hear the bear’s claws clink on the pipe as he walks through, roaring and growling all the way.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>載<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>publish</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Cross, Car, Drunkard</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">If a holy <font color=""#0af""><b>cross</b></font> is hanging in the <font color=""#0af""><b>car</b></font> of a <font color=""#0af""><b>drunkard</b></font>, they’ll still <font color=""#f0a""><b>publish</b></font> the details of his accident if he gets in one. Not even a holy cross can protect a drunkard from having the details of his unsafe car driving published.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture yourself as the drunkard driving this car. You just got into an accident. Hold the cross in your hand and pray that your accident won’t get published in the newspaper. You don’t want everyone to know what a drunkard you are, so really imagine yourself praying and holding the cross while you do so.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>質<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>quality</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Clam, Axe</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">You have to use two&nbsp;<b><font color=""#0af"">axe</font></b>s to open a&nbsp;<b><font color=""#0af"">clam</font></b>. That seems like overkill, but it is necessary. This clam is of very high&nbsp;<b style=""color: rgb(226, 0, 150);"">quality</b>&nbsp;meaning it won't open so easily.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine the highest quality clam you've ever seen. It is hard, smooth, and basically impenetrable.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>量<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>quantity</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Sunflower, Sunrise</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">When the <font color=""#0af""><b>sunrise</b></font> touches a <font color=""#0af""><b>sunflower</b></font> field, it will increase their <font color=""#f0a""><b>quantity</b></font>. A sunflower needs the sun to grow, so when a sunflower is exposed to the sunrise and all the sun thereafter, the quantity of sunflowers in the area will surely increase.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: See the sunrise coming over the horizon, causing you to squint your eyes. See the sunflowers sprouting up all around you. Smell the vast quantity of flowers, breathing in their sunflowery smell.</i></span><p> "

All he talks about is how he wants you to&nbsp;<b style=""color: rgb(226, 0, 150);"">sell</b>&nbsp;your soul to him.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine a clam devil being really obnoxious about your soul. Since they play together all the time, the leader has no time to fetch his own food but makes his servant get it for him. The leader also really likes shark fins, so that’s what he’s eating.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture this leader playing while the servant brings him a big bowl of shark fins. You can smell their fishy smell from all the way across the room.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>肩<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>shoulder</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Moon, Door</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The <font color=""#0af""><b>door</b></font> leading to the <font color=""#0af""><b>moon</b></font> can be broken down with one’s <font color=""#f0a""><b>shoulder</b></font>. It’s not a very sturdy door to the moon, so it’s quite easy to drop your shoulder and ram down the door to the moon.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: See yourself smashing through this door using your shoulder and seeing the moon on the other side. Hear the splintering of wood as your shoulder crashes through the door and feel the impact with your body.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>株<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>stocks, shares</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Slide, Tree, Jet</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">What might cause a <font color=""#0af""><b>tree</b></font> to <font color=""#0af""><b>slide</b></font> down a <font color=""#0af""><b>jet</b></font> would be if its <font color=""#f0a""><b>stocks</b></font> and <font color=""#f0a""><b>shares</b></font> took a dive in the market. This tree was on a jet for an important investor meeting when it got the news that its stocks and shares had just plummeted. Being very upset, the tree got up and got on the emergency slide out of the jet and plummeted into the ground just like his stocks and shares.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Visualize this tree sliding out of the jet and falling to his doom. As he falls, visualize red lines falling alongside him to represent the stocks and shares. Hear the shrill whistle of them speeding through the air to the ground.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>触<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>touch</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Insect, Angle</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">If, at a certain <font color=""#0af""><b>angle</b></font>, you approach an <font color=""#0af""><b>insect</b></font>, you’ll be able to <font color=""#f0a""><b>touch</b></font> it without it noticing. Most of the time, insects will run away from you when you try and touch them, but if you do so from the right angle, the insect will have no idea.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine yourself approaching this insect from a sneaky and stealthy angle. Now touch it. What does it feel like? Smooth? Hard? Fuzzy? Feel the insect in your mind as you touch it.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>輸<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>transport</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Car, Death Star</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>car</b></font> pales in comparison to the <font color=""#0af""><b>Death Star</b></font> as far as <font color=""#f0a""><b>transport</b></font> goes. Do you think you would look cooler driving a car, or the Death Star? The Death Star, obviously. The Death Star is the best means of transport. Far superior to a car.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine yourself using the Death Star in lieu of a car as your means of transport. Imagine how cool you feel rolling up somewhere in your Death Star. See yourself plowing through rush hour traffic and attending drive-in movies.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>腰<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>waist</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Woman, Moon, Helicopter</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">You're flying a&nbsp;<b><font color=""#0af"">helicopter</font></b>&nbsp;and you see a&nbsp;<b><font color=""#0af"">woman</font></b>&nbsp;in the&nbsp;<b><font color=""#0af"">moon</font></b>&nbsp;light touching her&nbsp;<b style=""color: rgb(226, 0, 150);"">waist</b>. She has both hands on her waist, like she's Wonder Woman or something. But it's the middle of the night. What is she doing?</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine flying your helicopter closer to the woman, it's not so hard because you have lots of moon light to see in, and try to see why she's touching her waist.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>慣<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>accustomed</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Rice Paddy, Clam, Fish Stick</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">There’s a <font color=""#0af""><b>fish stick</b></font> in the <font color=""#0af""><b>rice paddy</b></font>, but the <font color=""#0af""><b>clam</b></font> is <font color=""#f0a""><b>accustomed</b></font> to this sort of disorganization. The clam is the owner of the rice paddy, and his workers are prone to leaving fish sticks out in it. Therefore, the clam is accustomed to there being fish sticks out in his rice paddy.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Most clams would be upset to find a fish stick in their rice paddy. This clam is accustomed to it though, so it’s not as big of a deal to him. Imagine the clam looking at the fish stick and shaking his head while he tsk tsks at it.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>居<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>alive</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Flag, Old</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The <font color=""#0af""><b>flag</b></font> is <font color=""#0af""><b>old</b></font> but that doesn't mean it's not still <font color=""#f0a""><b>alive</b></font>. This is a living flag, and it gets old just like other living things.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine the old flag with a face and mouth and eyes and nose... it talks and listens and everything else. It's a flag that's <font color=""#f0a""><b>alive</b></font> D:</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>逮<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>apprehend</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Water, Brush, Water Slide</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Atop a <font color=""#0af""><b>water slide</b></font>, you use a shortened <font color=""#0af""><b>brush</b></font> and some <font color=""#0af""><b>water</b></font> to <font color=""#f0a""><b>apprehend</b></font> a criminal. The criminal you’re about to apprehend has been sabotaging water slides all over the nation and you’ve just caught him red handed. Taking your shortened brush (shortened for maneuverability), you splash him in the eyes with water and stab him into submission.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: See yourself about to apprehend this villain. Feel the splash from the water you just tossed on him and hear him shriek as you jab him with the short brush. It’s a shortened brush, because the brush radical is shortened in the kanji. Remember that.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>票<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>ballot</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Jackhammer, Helicopter</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">You have to fly in a&nbsp;<b><font color=""#0af"">helicopter</font></b>&nbsp;and use a&nbsp;<b><font color=""#0af"">jackhammer</font></b>&nbsp;to punch your&nbsp;<b style=""color: rgb(226, 0, 150);"">ballot</b>. The helicopter gets you far away from prying eyes, and the jackhammer makes you really try for whoever you're voting for on that thing. It's foolproof!</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine trying to fill out your ballot while flying in a helicopter and using only a jackhammer to do it. Do you think you could do it? Do you think you could do it AND vote for the right person?</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>属<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>belong</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Flag, Mantis</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">You see a&nbsp;<b><font color=""#0af"">mantis</font></b>&nbsp;sitting on a&nbsp;<b><font color=""#0af"">flag</font></b>&nbsp;and you know for a fact that it does not&nbsp;<b style=""color: rgb(226, 0, 150);"">belong</b>&nbsp;there. Insects should be in trees and on the ground. Not on flags. Insects belong in the wild!</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Look at that mantis, pretending it belongs here. What are you gonna do about it?</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>捕<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>catch</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Wedding, Nailbat</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">You throw a <font color=""#0af""><b>nailbat</b></font> at a <font color=""#0af""><b>wedding</b></font> in the hope that someone will <font color=""#f0a""><b>catch</b></font> it. You’re evil, and you love ruining weddings. What better way than to throw a nailbat and hope someone catches it with their face?</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine throwing this nailbat at someone, or even having the nailbat thrown at you. You’re at a wedding, so you’re not expecting a nailbat to come flying at you. It’s a natural reflex to catch things thrown at you, so you catch the nailbat and the nails pierce your hands. It really hurts.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>候<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>climate, candidate</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Arrow, Leader, Hook, Stick</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>leader</b></font> with a <font color=""#0af""><b>stick</b></font>, a <font color=""#0af""><b>hook</b></font>, and an <font color=""#0af""><b>arrow</b></font> can create the perfect <font color=""#f0a""><b>climate</b></font> to determine a <font color=""#f0a""><b>candidate</b></font> to be his successor. The stick, hook, and arrow are all weapons to be used in a battle royal. Many will fight to the death with these tools to be considered as candidates for the next leader.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: See all of the people fighting with these weapons to become candidates for leader. Hear the screams and grunts as they fight bitterly to the death.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>輩<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>comrade</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Car, Injustice</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">You’ve just committed an <font color=""#0af""><b>injustice</b></font> to a <font color=""#0af""><b>car</b></font> that belongs to your <font color=""#f0a""><b>comrade</b></font>. You accidently hit your comrade’s car with your own car and now your comrade is reconsidering if he still wants to be your comrade or not after such an injustice.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine hitting the car of a comrade with your own car. Hear the screech of the tires and the crash of metal. You feel really bad about this injustice you’ve committed.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>況<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>condition</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Older Brother, Tsunami</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">There’s a <font color=""#0af""><b>tsunami</b></font> coming and your <font color=""#0af""><b>older brother</b></font> is in no <font color=""#f0a""><b>condition</b></font> to escape. Your older brother has brittle bone syndrome so there’s no way he’ll be able to escape the tsunami in time in his condition.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine your poor brother and the condition he is in. His brittle bones make it impossible for him to move very fast at all. Imagine the sad face he makes when he realizes his fate.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>響<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>echo</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Poop, Good, Sound, Butcher</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">If you <font color=""#0af""><b>poop</b></font> next to a <font color=""#0af""><b>good</b></font> <font color=""#0af""><b>butcher</b></font>, the <font color=""#0af""><b>sound</b></font> will <font color=""#f0a""><b>echo</b></font> and he will know that you have pooped in his presence. This butcher is very in tune with poop, especially if the sound is echoing.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Hear the poop echo. You know what a poop usually sounds like, now imagine that sound again, but with an echo. How could anyone not notice?</i></span><p> "

Power is very effective for killing people, so if you throw power into the mix, you’ll be unstoppable.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Power is very effective in battle. Imagine yourself flexing and swinging your arms around. Feel the weight of them and hear the sound of your powerful arms whooshing and cutting through the air.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>抜<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>extract</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Friend, Nailbat</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Taking a <font color=""#0af""><b>nailbat</b></font> and hitting your <font color=""#0af""><b>friend</b></font> with it will surely <font color=""#f0a""><b>extract</b></font> blood from their body. It’s not nice to hit your friend with a nailbat, but if you choose to do so, you will definitely extract blood. And pain. Lots and lots of pain.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture yourself hitting your friend with a nailbat. What could your friend have done to make you so angry? Hear the bat bashing into your friend’s body as the blood splashes onto your face.</i></span><p> "

This is a great place to get fresh fish and fresh sheep. I kid you not.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine eating this fresh fish and fresh sheep. It’s the freshest you’ve ever tasted. Taste it on your tongue and experience how fresh it is.</i></span><p> "

Tsunamis bring lots of water anywhere they go, so this tsunami will be sure to soak both the flowers and their leaves.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine being one of these flowers. You’re a bit thirsty so at first you’re excited about the tsunami. You can’t wait to be full of water. Imagine soaking up all the water you want until you’re full.</i></span><p> "

"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>掛<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>hang</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Toe, Grave, Nailbat</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Taking a <font color=""#0af""><b>nailbat</b></font>, you decide to create one <font color=""#0af""><b>grave</b></font> and another <font color=""#0af""><b>grave</b></font>, take two people by the <font color=""#0af""><b>toe</b></font>, and <font color=""#f0a""><b>hang</b></font> them upside-down to beat them to death. Once the two people are dead, you can put them in the new graves you just made.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine hanging two people up by their toes and beating them with a nailbat. Hear their screams and pleas for mercy as you beat them over and over again.</i></span><p> "

Wolverine doesn’t usually hide, so you can imagine how scary this cleat wearing butcher is. The imitation greenhouse tree wants to be big and impressive like the tree outside, so it does its very best imitation of a real tree.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Look at this greenhouse tree struggle to grow big and strong like the wild tree outside. Hear its leaves shake and timber creak. How cute.</i></span><p> "
