"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>訟<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>lawsuit</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Say, Public</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Be careful what you <font color=""#0af""><b>say</b></font> in <font color=""#0af""><b>public</b></font>, otherwise you might face a <font color=""#f0a""><b>lawsuit</b></font>. People will sue you for just about anything these days, so you really need to watch what you say in public, otherwise you might find yourself with a lawsuit on your hands.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: What could you say in public that would get a lawsuit brought on against you? Think of something really offensive you could say and imagine yourself saying this in public and getting slapped with a lawsuit as consequence.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>限<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>limit</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Good, Butcher</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>butcher</b></font> who is <font color=""#0af""><b>good</b></font> knows no <font color=""#f0a""><b>limit</b></font>. A butcher who is not good will have a limit – a point at which they can butcher no longer. However, a good butcher knows no such things, and has no limits.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Witness this good butcher doing his thing endlessly and without limit. He can butcher for years and never feel fatigue. Hear his knives slicing and chopping on the cutting board with expert precision.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>肥<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>obese</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Moon, Bed</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>moon</b></font> who stays in <font color=""#0af""><b>bed</b></font> all day every day will soon become <font color=""#f0a""><b>obese</b></font>. A healthy moon needs movement and exercise to stay fit and not become obese. If a moon stays in bed all day, they’ll be sure to grow obese over time.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine this moon in bed, slowly getting bigger and bigger, becoming more obese every day. Hear the sound of the bed creaking and cracking as the moon grows larger and larger.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>豊<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>plentiful</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Beans, Music</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text""><font color=""#0af""><b>Music</b></font> and <font color=""#0af""><b>beans</b></font> are very <font color=""#f0a""><b>plentiful</b></font> here. The beans make you want to dance to the music and the music makes you want to eat beans. It’s a vicious cycle, so the beans and music must both be plentiful.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine yourself dancing to the music while you gorge on beans. Both are so plentiful, how could you not enjoy them? Hear the music as you taste every variety of bean on your tongue.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>替<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>replace</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Sun, Husband</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>husband</b></font> marries a <font color=""#0af""><b>husband</b></font> while the <font color=""#0af""><b>sun</b></font> goes down and the men <font color=""#f0a""><b>replace</b></font> their solitary lives with one of everlasting companionship. Instead of one husband and one wife, we have two husbands here. They shed their lives of bachelorhood and replace it with one of monogamy.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: See these two husbands as the sun sets under them. Listen to them each saying their vows, expressing how they could never replace one another.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>景<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>scene</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Sun, Capital</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The <font color=""#0af""><b>sun</b></font> rises over the <font color=""#0af""><b>capital</b></font> building, creating a breathtaking <font color=""#f0a""><b>scene</b></font>. The sun is so bright and warm as it crests over the capital building. It’s quite the scene to behold.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture this scene in your mind. Squint as the sun shines in your eyes and feel its warmth as it rises up and over the capital building.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>巻<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>scroll</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Cobra, Horns, Train</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A&nbsp;<b><font color=""#0af"">cobra</font></b>&nbsp;with&nbsp;<b><font color=""#0af"">horns</font></b>&nbsp;on a&nbsp;<b><font color=""#0af"">train</font></b>&nbsp;coils around a sacred&nbsp;<b style=""color: rgb(226, 0, 150);"">scroll</b>, protecting it. This cobra has horns so it looks pretty intimidating. The scroll it's protecting is in transit on the train, and the cobra is doing a good job of safeguarding it so far.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine this horned cobra coiled around the scroll. It certainly acts as a deterrent to thievery. Hear the cobra hiss as you walk past the scroll.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>捜<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>search</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Stool, Say Humbly, Nailbat</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">While holding a <font color=""#0af""><b>nailbat</b></font> you <font color=""#0af""><b>say humbly</b></font>, “<font color=""#0af""><b>Stool</b></font>, I don’t know where you are, but I’m going to <font color=""#f0a""><b>search</b></font> for you and I am going to kill you. I’m not doing it for fame or fortune and I do not think I am better than you. All I want is to murder you with this nailbat.”</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: This stool has wronged you, so say the previous statement aloud. Imagine yourself holding a nailbat and visualize what you will do to this stool once you find it.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>構<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>set up, care</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Tree, Circus</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Up in a <font color=""#0af""><b>tree</b></font> you start your very own <font color=""#0af""><b>circus</b></font> and you <font color=""#f0a""><b>set up</b></font> and <font color=""#f0a""><b>care</b></font> for everything all by yourself. This tree top circus is quite impressive, even more so since you set up all the tents and stuff all yourself. Also, you care for all the circus animals all on your own as well.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine this grandiose circus in the trees. See the bright colors and circus music and sounds way up in the tree as you admire your handiwork.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>影<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>shadow</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Sun, Hair, Capital</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The <font color=""#0af""><b>sun</b></font> rises over the <font color=""#0af""><b>capital</b></font>, shining down on you and your long <font color=""#0af""><b>hair</b></font>, casting a large <font color=""#f0a""><b>shadow</b></font> on the ground behind you. You’re standing in front of your capital city, watching the sunrise. You have very long hair, so the shadow you cast is pretty impressive.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Feel the sun shining down on you, warming your body as you turn around to view your shadow. Picture yourself dancing about and waving your long hair around and watching your shadow do as you do.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>絞<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>strangle</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Thread, Mix</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">If you toss a <font color=""#0af""><b>thread</b></font> into the <font color=""#0af""><b>mix</b></font>, someone is bound to get <font color=""#f0a""><b>strangle</b></font>d. Mix a few threads in with a few people and that thread is going to wrap itself around someone’s neck and strangle them. For sure.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine using a thread to strangle someone. It’s not pleasant. Imagine yourself getting strangled by a thread. Feel it wrapped around your windpipe. You’re dying slowly.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>訴<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>sue</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Drop, Axe, Say</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text""><font color=""#0af""><b>Say</b></font>, if you have an <font color=""#0af""><b>axe</b></font> with a <font color=""#0af""><b>drop</b></font> of blood on it, you probably hit someone with it, which probably means someone is going to <font color=""#f0a""><b>sue</b></font> you for this heinous act. No one wants to be hit with an axe, and it would probably cause a lot of harm. I really wouldn’t be surprised if they say they want to sue you.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine being hit with an axe. Feel the splitting pain in your skull from such an injury. You’re going to sue them for all of their money! And more!</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>補<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>supplement</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Pelican, Wedding</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">There is a&nbsp;<b><font color=""#0af"">pelican</font></b>&nbsp;at your&nbsp;<b><font color=""#0af"">wedding</font></b>. He is there as a&nbsp;<b style=""color: rgb(226, 0, 150);"">supplement</b>&nbsp;to the guests because not enough people came.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: It's weird that you didn't hire more people to supplement as extra guests, but pelicans are much cheaper.</i></span><p> "

"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>独<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>alone</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Insect, Animal</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">There once was an <font color=""#0af""><b>animal</b></font> with an <font color=""#0af""><b>insect</b></font> friend who felt very <font color=""#f0a""><b>alone</b></font> unless he was around. "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>討<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>chastise</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Measurement, Say</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">They <font color=""#0af""><b>say</b></font> using <font color=""#0af""><b>measurement</b></font> device (like a ruler) is a good way to <font color=""#f0a""><b>chastise</b></font> someone. They say the uses for measurement devices are pretty much unlimited when it comes to chastising people.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine being chastised with a measurement device. "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>故<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>circumstance, reason</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Old, Winter</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">You become <font color=""#0af""><b>old</b></font> in the <font color=""#0af""><b>winter</b></font> due to <font color=""#f0a""><b>circumstance</b></font>. In the winter, your body gets cold and your joints get all stiff and rickety. This is also what happens when you get old. Due to circumstance, your body gets old in the winter.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture yourself standing outside in winter time. You’re very cold so your movement is stiff and awkward and your joints hurt. It’s just like being old.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>較<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>contrast</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Car, Mix</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Your new <font color=""#0af""><b>car</b></font> doesn’t <font color=""#0af""><b>mix</b></font> well with the other cars in your garage because its color is in stark <font color=""#f0a""><b>contrast</b></font> to the others. Such a contrast.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine this garage of yours with a sea of white cars. Now there is a new car that really sticks out like a sore thumb. "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>創<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>create</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Mouth, Flag, Ribs, Roof</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">On a <font color=""#0af""><b>roof</b></font>, while holding a <font color=""#0af""><b>flag</b></font> in your <font color=""#0af""><b>mouth</b></font>, you crack your <font color=""#0af""><b>ribs</b></font> trying to <font color=""#f0a""><b>create</b></font> a majestic looking house. "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>往<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>depart</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Loiter, Master</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">You <font color=""#0af""><b>loiter</b></font> around, waiting for your <font color=""#0af""><b>master</b></font> to <font color=""#f0a""><b>depart</b></font>. You have a lot more freedom to do things after your master has departed, so until that time you just loiter about looking busy and staying out of his way.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture yourself loitering around your master’s fancy mansion. "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>励<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>encourage</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Power, Cliff, Ten Thousand</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">On the edge of a <font color=""#0af""><b>cliff</b></font>, <font color=""#0af""><b>ten thousand</b></font> people use their <font color=""#0af""><b>power</b></font> of persuasion and <font color=""#f0a""><b>encourage</b></font> you to jump off. "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>激<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>fierce, violent</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">White, Direction, Winter, Tsunami</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>tsunami</b></font> that is <font color=""#0af""><b>white</b></font>, traveling in the <font color=""#0af""><b>direction</b></font> of <font color=""#0af""><b>winter</b></font> is a <font color=""#f0a""><b>fierce</b></font> and <font color=""#f0a""><b>violent</b></font> force of nature. This white tsunami is chasing after winter, and that’s why the tsunami is white – it’s a winter tsunami. It’s the most fierce and most violent kind of tsunami in existence.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine this white tsunami, more violent and fierce than any other tsunami you’ve ever seen. It’s very frightening. Feel the cold wetness it brings to your skin.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>占<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>fortune, occupy</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Fortune</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The <font color=""#0af""><b>fortune</b></font> radical and the <font color=""#f0a""><b>fortune</b></font> kanji are exactly the same! But it also means <font color=""#f0a""><b>occupy</b></font> as well, so don’t forget that. Fortune and occupy both occupy the same radical.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Just remember that his kanji also means occupy and you’ll be just fine.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>障<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>hinder</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Stand, Early, Butcher</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>butcher</b></font> who tries to <font color=""#0af""><b>stand</b></font> too <font color=""#0af""><b>early</b></font> will <font color=""#f0a""><b>hinder</b></font> his ability to stay standing. Did you feel dizzy? Maybe, maybe not. Either way, focus on this action and this feeling of dizziness and how it can hinder your ability to function. Also imagine you’re a butcher.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>我<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>i, me</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Ego</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Your <font color=""#0af""><b>ego</b></font>... it's totally out of control. <font color=""#f0a""><b>I</b></font> mean, my ego isn't out of control. I'm the greatest. That's <font color=""#f0a""><b>me</b></font>. But your ego? Ugh, so out of control unlike my amazing ego.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Just keep going with this sentence about the ego. You can't stop, because really it's your ego that's out of control. That's <font color=""#f0a""><b>I</b></font> when you're saying it.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>徴<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>indication, sign</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Mountain, King, Winter, Loiter</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">If you <font color=""#0af""><b>loiter</b></font> on a <font color=""#0af""><b>mountain</b></font> with a <font color=""#0af""><b>king</b></font> in the <font color=""#0af""><b>winter</b></font>, it’s a good <font color=""#f0a""><b>indication</b></font> that this is a <font color=""#f0a""><b>sign</b></font> he favors you. The king doesn’t let just anyone loiter around with him atop a mountain in winter. You should be proud.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine yourself atop this mountain with the king in winter. It’s very cold and windy, but you feel very happy as this is the first sign of affection the king has shown you.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>授<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>instruct</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Accept, Nailbat</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Holding a bloody <font color=""#0af""><b>nailbat</b></font>, you <font color=""#0af""><b>accept</b></font> it as a means to <font color=""#f0a""><b>instruct</b></font> students. The nailbat is very effective at disciplining students that aren’t paying attention when you instruct.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine yourself as an instructor, attempting to instruct and enlighten your students. One of them is being a nuisance and distracting all the others. So, you take your nailbat and beat the crap out of him until he behaves. Imagine yourself doing this.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>鉛<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>lead</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Fins, Mouth, Gold</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">You hold <font color=""#0af""><b>gold</b></font> <font color=""#0af""><b>fins</b></font> in your <font color=""#0af""><b>mouth</b></font> while shopping for pencil <font color=""#f0a""><b>lead</b></font> at the store. This pencil lead store only accepts gold fins as payment, and your fins don’t fit in your pockets and you need your hands to carry the lead so the gold fins go in your mouth.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine having these gold fins in your mouth. Taste the metal as your tongue runs over them. At least you don’t have lead in your mouth – wouldn’t wanna get lead poisoning.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>郵<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>mail</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Car, Butcher</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>car</b></font> had to go to the <font color=""#0af""><b>butcher</b></font> so it could be sent in the <font color=""#f0a""><b>mail</b></font>. The car was too big for the shipping box, so the butcher had to chop it up so it was shorter on the tips. Now it can fit in the mail.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Pretend you are the butcher chopping this car up for the mail. Feel the cleaver in your hand and hear the sound of metal being butchered away. Keep in mind that the car radical in this kanji is shorter on the tips, and that’s because you butchered it for the mail.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>針<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>needle</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Cross, Gold</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">In a <font color=""#0af""><b>gold</b></font> <font color=""#0af""><b>cross</b></font>, you see a <font color=""#f0a""><b>needle</b></font> sticking out of it. Right in the middle of the gold cross, there’s a needle. If Jesus were on there, the needle would be sticking him right in the chest.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture this golden cross in your head. Why do you suppose there’s this needle stuck in it. You try to pull it out but you can’t. Envision yourself straining and stressing trying to get the thing out.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>従<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>obey</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Loiter, Correct, Horns</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">If you <font color=""#0af""><b>loiter</b></font> around a demon lord with <font color=""#0af""><b>horns</b></font>, the demon would be <font color=""#0af""><b>correct</b></font> to assume that you’ll <font color=""#f0a""><b>obey</b></font> his every command. This horned creature is the devil and he wants you to obey him.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Entranced by the devil’s power, you’ve been loitering around him for a while. Now you are completely under his spell and have no choice to obey him. Imagine yourself being forced to carry out the commands of the devil whether you like it or not. What do you think he’d have you do?</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>豚<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>pork</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Moon, Pig</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">On the <font color=""#0af""><b>moon</b></font>, it’s easy to turn a <font color=""#0af""><b>pig</b></font> into <font color=""#f0a""><b>pork</b></font>. The low gravity of the moon makes the whole process much easier and cost efficient. Soon, all the pig farming will be done on the moon and there will never be a pork shortage ever again.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine going to a pig farm/restaurant on the moon. You’re in a space suit, eating some space pork. It’s delicious. Imagine the best pork you’ve ever had. This is better than that.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>復<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>restore</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Loiter, Black Hole</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">You <font color=""#0af""><b>loiter</b></font> around a <font color=""#0af""><b>black hole</b></font>. You're waiting for the black hole to finish its process of sucking everything up, because when it's done, you'll hit a button and the black hole will shoot all its sucked in data back out and you'll be able to <font color=""#f0a""><b>restore</b></font> everything to the way it was before.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine yourself waiting and waiting. You want to hurry up and restore things to the way they were before because it's really boring when there's nothing but a black hole.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>河<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>river</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Lip Ring, Tsunami</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">During a <font color=""#0af""><b>tsunami</b></font>, your <font color=""#0af""><b>lip ring</b></font> is ripped off while you’re trying to cross a <font color=""#f0a""><b>river</b></font>. There was no other path to safety, you had to cross the raging river, but you lost your footing and smashed your face on a rock and lost your lip ring.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine how painful this would be, having your lip ring ripped from your lip. It would hurt a lot. Touch your lip and imagine missing half of it. Yikes.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>貯<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>savings</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Nail, Clam, Helmet</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>clam</b></font> takes a <font color=""#0af""><b>helmet</b></font> and by hammer and <font color=""#0af""><b>nail</b></font>, fastens it over his life <font color=""#f0a""><b>savings</b></font>. The helmet acts as a makeshift safe for the savings, protecting them from any would be thieves. The nails aren’t totally immovable, but it’s better than nothing.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture this miserly clam, putting all his savings in a helmet and nailing it to the ground. Hear the tink of hammer on nail as he secures his savings.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>印<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>seal</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Stamp, Egg</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Taking an <font color=""#0af""><b>egg</b></font>, you <font color=""#0af""><b>stamp</b></font> your official <font color=""#f0a""><b>seal</b></font> of approval onto the document. Your seal is like a normal seal, but with an egg. It’s kind of a messy stamping process, actually.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine you have an envelope that you need to seal. Now get an egg, put it down and take a wax stamp and press it into the egg and onto the envelope. Sealed! Except now you have egg and wax all over your hands. Sticky.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>振<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>shake</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Nailbat, Superman</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">You take a <font color=""#0af""><b>nailbat</b></font> and you hit <font color=""#0af""><b>Superman</b></font> with it, causing the ground to <font color=""#f0a""><b>shake</b></font> while you <font color=""#f0a""><b>wave</b></font> goodbye to Superman. The nailbat that you have is actually made out of kryptonite, so hitting Superman with it causes his body to shake, in turn causing the ground to rumble and shake. Wave bye-bye Superman, bye-bye.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Feel the ground shake beneath you as you wave goodbye to Superman. Hear him screaming out in pain as his body falls apart in front of you.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>刺<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>stab</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Tree, Head, Ribs</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>tree</b></font> with a human <font color=""#0af""><b>head</b></font> wants to find some <font color=""#0af""><b>ribs</b></font> to <font color=""#f0a""><b>stab</b></font>. "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>怪<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>suspicious</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Tombstone, Fish Stick</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">You see a <font color=""#0af""><b>fish stick</b></font> poking out of a <font color=""#0af""><b>tombstone</b></font> looking <font color=""#f0a""><b>suspicious</b></font>. "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>汗<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>sweat</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Antenna, Tsunami</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">During a <font color=""#0af""><b>tsunami</b></font>, your <font color=""#0af""><b>antenna</b></font>&nbsp;start to <font color=""#f0a""><b>sweat</b></font> you’re so nervous. You’re just a little tiny bug with antenna, how are you supposed to escape with your life when a tsunami is headed right for you. Those are sweating too.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>筆<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>writing brush</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Bamboo, Brush</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Out of <font color=""#0af""><b>bamboo</b></font>, you make a <font color=""#0af""><b>brush</b></font> – a <font color=""#f0a""><b>writing brush</b></font>. This is no ordinary brush, mind you. It is a brush specifically designed for writing elegant characters. And it’s made from bamboo!</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine yourself using this bamboo writing brush. Do you know many kanji? Of course you do! Imagine yourself writing them all with this nice writing brush. It’s actually fun to write things with it!</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>怒<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>angry</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Woman, Stool, Heart</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>woman</b></font> sitting on a <font color=""#0af""><b>stool</b></font> with a broken <font color=""#0af""><b>heart</b></font> is very <font color=""#f0a""><b>angry</b></font>. She had her heart broken by some jerk and now she’s sitting on the stool, just stewing over the guy and how angry she is with him.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: This woman is so angry! Pretend you are the woman. Sit on your stool and feel your heart, painful in your chest, as you fume and think about how angry you are.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>昇<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>ascend</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Slide, Sun, Twenty</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">In the summer <font color=""#0af""><b>sun</b></font>, you <font color=""#0af""><b>slide</b></font> down <font color=""#0af""><b>twenty</b></font> stories only to <font color=""#f0a""><b>ascend</b></font> stairs back up and do it all over again. The sun is pretty hot, so sliding down twenty stories on the slide feels really good with the fresh air and everything. Ascending the twenty stories back up? Not as much fun.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Feel the air blowing against your body, cooling you down as you slide on the slide. What a fun ride. Now imagine climbing up twenty floors or stairs in the hot sun. Is it worth it?</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>迷<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>astray</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Rice, Water Slide</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">If you go down a <font color=""#0af""><b>water slide</b></font> filled with <font color=""#0af""><b>rice</b></font>, all the kernels are going to be thrown <font color=""#f0a""><b>astray</b></font>. If you go flying down that water slide and run into that rice, it’s definitely going to fly out of the water slide from the impact. Rice will be flying astray all over the place.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine yourself rocketing down this water slide and running into a pile of rice. Bam! Rice flies everywhere.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>招<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>beckon</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Mouth, Sword, Nailbat</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Threatening to hit you with a <font color=""#0af""><b>nailbat</b></font> and a <font color=""#0af""><b>sword</b></font> in the <font color=""#0af""><b>mouth</b></font>, the shogun and his council <font color=""#f0a""><b>beckon</b></font> you. "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>腹<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>belly, abdomen</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Moon, Black Hole</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Next to the <font color=""#0af""><b>moon</b></font> is a <font color=""#0af""><b>black hole</b></font> about to suck the moon into its <font color=""#f0a""><b>belly</b></font>, its <font color=""#f0a""><b>abdomen</b></font> of despair and nothingness. The black hole is hungry and wants the moon inside its abdomen. “Get in my belly!” the black hole shouts.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture this black hole as a self-aware, hungry creature. The black hole is really hungry for that moon and wants it in his belly. See the black hole smacking and licking his lips as he rubs his abdomen in anticipation.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>睡<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>drowsy</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Eye, Car</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Your <font color=""#0af""><b>eye</b></font>s start to close as you drive your <font color=""#0af""><b>car</b></font> because you’re getting <font color=""#f0a""><b>drowsy</b></font>. This is a very dangerous way to drive your car, especially since your car is missing its top and its bottom. This is no time to be getting drowsy. Keep your eyes open and drive for your life!</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Feel yourself getting drowsy as you drive this goofy car. You’re so tired. Struggle to keep your eyes open. Also visualize this car missing its top and its bottom because the car radical is modified.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>端<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>edge</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Mountain, Stand, Rake</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Setting up a <font color=""#0af""><b>stand</b></font> on the top of a <font color=""#0af""><b>mountain</b></font>, you <font color=""#0af""><b>rake</b></font> all the rocks to the <font color=""#f0a""><b>edge</b></font> of it. You want to clear the area around your stand, so you get your rake out and you rake all the stones and debris away from the stand and toward the edge of the mountain top. It also creates a small barrier around the edge as well.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine yourself at the top of the mountain, holding the rake in your hands. Look over the edge. Feel the sinking feeling in your stomach as you realize how high up you really are.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>極<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>extreme</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Ground, Mouth, Tree, Stool, Beggar</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>tree</b></font> with a <font color=""#0af""><b>mouth</b></font> eats a <font color=""#0af""><b>beggar</b></font> and his <font color=""#0af""><b>stool</b></font>, which were on the <font color=""#0af""><b>ground</b></font> next to him, which seems to be a bit <font color=""#f0a""><b>extreme</b></font>, don't you think?</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: The beggar was just sitting there on a stool! Why so extreme?</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>郎<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>guy</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Good, Butcher</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Every&nbsp;<font color=""#0af""><b>good</b></font>&nbsp;<font color=""#0af""><b>butcher</b></font>&nbsp;is a&nbsp;<font color=""#f0a""><b>guy</b></font>. Guys make the best butchers. A guy butcher is a good butcher.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Is this sexist? Maybe. Use that to remember this kanji.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>康<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>health</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Water, Mullet, Brush</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Having a <font color=""#0af""><b>mullet</b></font>, you take a <font color=""#0af""><b>brush</b></font> and stroke it with <font color=""#0af""><b>water</b></font> for your <font color=""#f0a""><b>health</b></font>. Mullets take lots of care to remain healthy, so it is important to brush it every day and keep it moisturized with water.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine yourself with a mullet. Take your brush and brush your luxurious mane and then splash some water on it. You are the epitome of health.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>健<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>healthy</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Leader, Brush, Big Bird</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The <font color=""#0af""><b>leader</b></font> you know as <font color=""#0af""><b>Big Bird</b></font> uses a <font color=""#0af""><b>brush</b></font> to make sure his feathers stay <font color=""#f0a""><b>healthy</b></font>. Big Bird is your leader, and Big Bird wants to look his best for his followers so he uses a brush to keep his feathers healthy and shiny.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture your leader Big Bird brushing his body with a brush. Hear the sound of the brush running over his yellow feathers and see them gleam with shine.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>誘<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>invite</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Say, Pine, Stairs</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">They <font color=""#0af""><b>say</b></font> <font color=""#0af""><b>pine</b></font> <font color=""#0af""><b>stairs</b></font> like to <font color=""#f0a""><b>invite</b></font> people to walk on them. They say that pine stairs enjoy being stepped on, so it makes sense that the pine stairs would invite people to do so.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine hearing a set of pine stairs invite you to walk on them. They coax you over in haunting voices that you can’t resist. Feel the pine under your feet as you ascend the stairs.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>貸<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>lend</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Clam, Substitute</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">You <font color=""#0af""><b>substitute</b></font> a <font color=""#0af""><b>clam</b></font> for collateral so your friend will <font color=""#f0a""><b>lend</b></font> you some money. Normally he would ask for something more valuable, but you’ve convinced him to substitute a clam for what he would normally take as collateral when lending to people.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine this exchange. Your friend is going to lend you money in exchange for a clam. Hand your friend the clam and take the money he’s lending you. Feel the clam and the lent money in your hands.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>惑<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>misguided</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Heart, Drunkard, Creeper</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>drunkard</b></font> <font color=""#0af""><b>creeper</b></font> has a <font color=""#0af""><b>heart</b></font> that is terribly <font color=""#f0a""><b>misguided</b></font>. To make matters worse, the creeper is upside down. This creeper is also a drunkard, and his heart has a misguided love for alcohol. He’s so drunk right now that he thinks down is up and up is down and that’s why he is upside down.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine this creeper creeping on some alcohol. See him stroking a bottle of alcohol as he expresses his misguided love for it.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>痛<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>pain</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Elephant, Mama, Sick</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>sick</b></font> <font color=""#0af""><b>mama</b></font> needs an <font color=""#0af""><b>elephant</b></font> doctor to treat her <font color=""#f0a""><b>pain</b></font>. The sick mama has a strange sickness that had been forgotten by most doctors, but not the elephant doctors, because elephants never forget. This elephant doctor will know how to alleviate the sick mama’s pain.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine this elephant treating the sick mama and getting rid of the pain that ails her. See the elephant in a little doctor outfit with like a stethoscope and everything. Hear the elephant trumpet his trunk as he treats the sick mama’s pain.</i></span><p> "

It’s fast, efficient, and super fun. What better way to retreat from anything than by using a good ol’ water slide?</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine using this water slide to retreat. See yourself speeding down the wet water slide as you shout, “See ya, suckers!”</i></span><p> "

Having a surplus of water allows you to use the water slide since you don’t have to feel bad about wasting any, and a water slide is a fast and fun route to get where you’re going.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine yourself taking this water slide route. Where are you going? Imagine your destination and the scenery you’ll see along the route as you feel the surplus of water all around you.</i></span><p> "

Having a salary this high means you can afford the most expensive thread in the world. This thread suits you well since you’re so wealthy.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine how much something sewn out of this expensive thread would cost. Now imagine wearing that expensive thing. Would it suit you? Of course it would, your salary is outrageous.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>就<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>settle in</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Dog, Capital</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">In the <font color=""#0af""><b>capital</b></font> city, a broken <font color=""#0af""><b>dog</b></font> begins to <font color=""#f0a""><b>settle in</b></font>. This dog used to live in the country, but he kept getting caught in bear and fox traps which busted the poor dog up. The dog didn’t want to live like this, so he decided to settle in the capital city where there aren’t pesky animal traps to get caught in.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine this dog going to the capital and settling in. The poor dog looks pretty messed up though. The radical for dog in this kanji is a bit modified, so just remember that the dog in this story is all messed up.</i></span><p> "

The peoples can’t sleep with both eyes open and they can’t sleep with just one eye open either. Since you’re in a cage, you actually fashioned this comb yourself, so it’s a little messed up, missing a prong. You’re working on improving it in your spare time, and you also use it to style your mop.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine yourself in your spare time, sitting on this stool in a cage in the sun. The comb radical is a little modified, so be sure to remember that you made this comb yourself and it’s a little wonky.</i></span><p> "

You have thick boots, thick clothes, and thick gloves on – even a thick hat. Tsunamis are very hard though, so even with all this thick gear on, farming will still be much more difficult than usual.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture yourself all bundled up in this thick outfit. The stand looks a little messed up, but that’s probably due to how many times you’ve thrown it out the window.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine Two Face with this thread tightening around his neck. I mean, what else would you do on a water slide? Everyone who gets to the top of a water slide has the urge to go down it. Duh.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine yourself at the top of this water slide. See the white water foaming at the top and hear it gushing and splashing. You wanna go down it don’t you? Feel the overwhelming urge to go down this awesome water slide.</i></span><p> "

Lots of power tools and sharp things, destruction everywhere, construction is pretty violent to start with. Then add in the snow and cold weather, and people are even more angry than ever. People with a lot of aggression make for good construction workers.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine these construction workers in the winter. Imagine them all doing their jobs, but as violently as possible. Hear them all screaming loudly while they work. It’s actually pretty frightening.</i></span><p> "

"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>浜<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>beach</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Fins, Ground, Axe, Tsunami</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">After a <font color=""#0af""><b>tsunami</b></font>, you find an <font color=""#0af""><b>axe</b></font> on the <font color=""#0af""><b>ground</b></font> next to some <font color=""#0af""><b>fins</b></font> on the <font color=""#f0a""><b>beach</b></font>. The tsunami was pretty violent, and it looks like this axe got blown into some fish and cut off their fins and now those things are just on the ground by the beach.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: See these things on the beach. It makes sense to see fins, as fins are usually in the ocean, so seeing them on the beach is logical. Pick up the stuff you find as you feel the beach sand between your toes.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>綺<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>beautiful</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Big, Thread, Lip Ring</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Take this <font color=""#0af""><b>thread</b></font> and put it through your <font color=""#0af""><b>big</b></font> <font color=""#0af""><b>lip ring</b></font>. We're going to pull that lip ring out so that you can once again look <font color=""#f0a""><b>beautiful</b></font>. That big lip ring is covering up your face, so, you know, gotta get it out.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Obviously I'm a crazy person who's about to pull out your lip ring with a thread, so don't feel too beautiful about that. This is a horrible situation you're in, and you need to get out of it, because this guy obsessed with 'beautiful' non-lip ring faces is nuts.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>益<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>benefit</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Fins, Ground, Plate, Horns</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">There are <font color=""#0af""><b>horns</b></font> on the <font color=""#0af""><b>ground</b></font> next to some <font color=""#0af""><b>fins</b></font> and a <font color=""#0af""><b>plate</b></font> that <font color=""#f0a""><b>benefit</b></font> the horns. The fins and the plate on the ground benefit the horns, because the fins and the plate make the horns look better by comparison. Why would you want a stupid fin or a fragile plate when you can have awesome and powerful horns? These horns are much cooler than those fins.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine seeing some fins and a plate next to some horns on the ground. Which looks cooler? Which would benefit you more? Definitely the horns. Imagine picking them up and inspecting them.</i></span><p> "

"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>隊<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>squad</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Pig, Horns, Butcher</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">You’re a <font color=""#0af""><b>butcher</b></font> and you see a pair of <font color=""#0af""><b>horns</b></font> on a <font color=""#0af""><b>pig</b></font> in the back of a <font color=""#f0a""><b>squad</b></font> car. The pig put on the horns to escape you, since you are a butcher, and butchers like to butcher pigs.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine this pig with horns, pretending to be a bull. He looks ridiculous. Now imagine him in a squad car, with the squad standing outside guarding it.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>庫<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>storage</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Mullet, Car</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">If you have a <font color=""#0af""><b>mullet</b></font>, you should put your <font color=""#0af""><b>car</b></font> in <font color=""#f0a""><b>storage</b></font> if you aren’t using it. Since you have a mullet, people will hate you and want to destroy your car. The best way to keep it safe is to have it in storage while you’re not using it.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine you have a mullet and a car. Now imagine yourself putting the car into storage after you drive it. Look around the area as the storage door closes to make sure no one sneaks in to bash it.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>妙<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>strange</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Woman, Few</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>woman</b></font> is one of the <font color=""#0af""><b>few</b></font> <font color=""#f0a""><b>strange</b></font> things in the world. Everything but a woman can be explained and made sense of. The servant is supposed to disassemble the gun and place the parts on the plate on the ground. He’s been doing a poor job lately, so the master decided to oversee his work this time.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine yourself as this master. Oversee your servant working on this gun. Hear the clicks and snaps as it comes apart and hear the pieces clink and clatter on the plate.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>宗<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>religion</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Helmet, Jackhammer</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Wearing a <font color=""#0af""><b>helmet</b></font>, you <font color=""#0af""><b>jackhammer</b></font> your <font color=""#f0a""><b>religion</b></font> into others. This jackhammer is a holy one, and you use it to crack open the skulls of the people and force your religion into their brains. The helmet helps protect you from anyone else who might try to do the same to you.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine yourself in your helmet, using your jackhammer to get religion into people. Feel the jackhammer rumble as the skulls crack. Imagine yourself shoving religion into them by stuffing Bibles, scripture, and hymnals into their brains.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>請<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>request</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Blue, Say</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">They <font color=""#0af""><b>say</b></font> <font color=""#0af""><b>blue</b></font> is the best color anyone could <font color=""#f0a""><b>request</b></font>. When you request a color, if it’s not blue, it might as well not even be a thing. Blue is the best color, they say.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: What things would you request in the color blue? Imagine the things you might request that you would want to be blue. Think of these things when you see this kanji.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>怖<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>scary</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Narwhal, Two Face, Fish Stick</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>fishstick</b></font> gets caught in a battle between a <font color=""#0af""><b>narwhal</b></font> and <font color=""#0af""><b>Two Face</b></font> – how <font color=""#f0a""><b>scary</b></font>. This situation is very scary for the fishstick. The narwhal and Two Face are fighting over who gets to eat the fishstick, and it’s a very scary thing to be caught in the middle of.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine you are this fishstick. This is very scary for you. The battle itself is scary enough, but you know that no matter who wins you’re still getting eaten.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>索<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>search</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Cross, Forehead, Thread</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">There is a <font color=""#0af""><b>cross</b></font> in your <font color=""#0af""><b>forehead</b></font> with a <font color=""#0af""><b>thread</b></font> attached to it, forcing you to <font color=""#f0a""><b>search</b></font> where it leads. You’re not sure how the cross got stuck in your forehead, but you are interested in seeing where this piece of thread leads. The search is on.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: It hurts to have this cross stuck in your forehead, but try to ignore that as you search for where the thread leads. "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>臣<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>servant</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Servant</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The <font color=""#0af""><b>servant</b></font> radical and the <font color=""#f0a""><b>servant</b></font> kanji are exactly the same! Just remember that the kanji also means <font color=""#f0a""><b>retainer</b></font> and you’ll be fine.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Retainer and servant are basically the same thing, so remembering this one shouldn’t be too hard for you.</i></span><p> "

"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>系<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>lineage</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Lineage</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The <font color=""#0af""><b>lineage</b></font> radical and the <font color=""#f0a""><b>lineage</b></font> kanji are exactly the same! Brilliant!</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: </i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>覧<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>look at</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Ground, See, Servant, Gun</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>servant</b></font> holding a <font color=""#0af""><b>gun</b></font> sits on the <font color=""#0af""><b>ground</b></font> to <font color=""#0af""><b>see</b></font> if he can find something to <font color=""#f0a""><b>look at</b></font>. The servant is on watch duty and has the gun to protect the perimeter. He patrols the grounds to look at the distance to see if there are any trespassers.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Look at this servant. He’s doing a great job. Oops, look like he sees you. Yup, he’s pointing his gun at you. Imagine staring down the barrel of his gun as you slowly back away.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>婚<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>marriage</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Sun, Woman, Duck</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>woman</b></font> and a <font color=""#0af""><b>duck</b></font> are in the <font color=""#0af""><b>sun</b></font> preparing for <font color=""#f0a""><b>marriage</b></font>. Marriage to each other, that is. This woman is marrying a duck out in the sun. How odd.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine this marriage. Why would a woman marry a duck? Imagine the woman in her wedding gown and the duck in a little tuxedo, quacking up a storm.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>懐<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>nostalgia</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Cross, Clothes, Sauron, Fish Stick</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Seeing a <font color=""#0af""><b>fish stick</b></font>, a <font color=""#0af""><b>cross</b></font>, a <font color=""#0af""><b>Sauron</b></font> action figure, and some old <font color=""#0af""><b>clothes</b></font> brings up a great feeling of <font color=""#f0a""><b>nostalgia</b></font>. Fish sticks were your favorite food as a child, you were raised very Christian, and you used to love Lord of the Rings. Oh the nostalgia.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine all these things from your childhood. Pick them up and feel what they feel like. Imagine yourself all nostalgic as you examine them.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>撮<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>photograph</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Sun, Stool, Ear, Nailbat</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Holding a <font color=""#0af""><b>nailbat</b></font> on the <font color=""#0af""><b>sun</b></font>, you put your <font color=""#0af""><b>ear</b></font> to a <font color=""#0af""><b>stool</b></font> while someone takes a <font color=""#f0a""><b>photograph</b></font> of you then hands you the <font color=""#f0a""><b>photo</b></font>. You took the nailbat to the sun to defeat monsters there, and you put your ear to the stool because you thought you heard it say something. When you did so, one of the sun monsters you came to defeat snapped a photo of you, then handed you the photograph.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine doing all this. Feel the weight of the nailbat in your hand and the heat from the sun. Feel the wood of the stool on your face as you press your ear to it. Hear and see the flash of the camera as the photograph is taken of you.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>枕<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>pillow</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Big, Tree</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">That <font color=""#0af""><b>tree</b></font> is <font color=""#0af""><b>big</b></font>, but it looks like it needs to rest its head on a <font color=""#f0a""><b>pillow</b></font> or something. See, the tree, while big, looked really messed up, kind of smushed a bit. Something must be wrong with the tree. I think it needs a rest. Somebody get this tree a pillow to rest on.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Look at this big messed up tree. Now imagine the tree falling down, creaking all the way as it rests on the big pillow. Be sure to remember that the tree is big in a messed up way as the radical for big is also kind of messed up and mushed.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>遊<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>play</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Child, Direction, Gun, Water Slide</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">If you point a loaded <font color=""#0af""><b>gun</b></font> in the <font color=""#0af""><b>direction</b></font> of a <font color=""#0af""><b>child</b></font> on a <font color=""#0af""><b>water slide</b></font>, things will quickly turn from <font color=""#f0a""><b>play</b></font> time to potential jail time. You should never point a gun in anyone’s direction, let alone a helpless child on a water slide. He’s just trying to play and have a good time.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Pretend you’re the child on the waterslide and you see someone pointing a gun in your direction. How terrifying would that be? It’s not like you can run, or get off the water slide. You just have to hope the guy with the gun is a bad shot. You’re just trying to play, and here’s this guy pointing a gun in your direction. Rude!</i></span><p> "

Poor people can’t afford to waste anything, so they eat every single part of the clam.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine being poor and eating a whole clam. Imagine eating the good part, and then imagine crunching and cracking your teeth on the shell as you grind it up in your mouth. It’s wretched.</i></span><p> "

Big Bird is very stubborn and always believes he is correct. Arguing with him over it will only prolong the situation.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine what Big Bird could have done wrong. He believes he is correct. Imagine yourself yelling and arguing at Big Bird over it.</i></span><p> "

You want the turtle to come out of his turtle shell but you don’t want to damage the turtle shell too much, so you just push the nailbat into it instead of just smashing it.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine this poor little turtle in his turtle shell as you place the nailbat atop him and start pushing down. The mohawk is very aerodynamic, so it is highly suitable for a water slide where speed is important. This tsunami is inside an enclosure, and you are spooning the hot water out of it to drink. Chester is pretty messed up in the brain, so he likes to do things like dissolve insects in his spare time.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: See Chester the Molester dropping drops of acid onto this insect, dissolving pieces one by one. "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>均<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>equal</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Grave, Pool</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">This <font color=""#0af""><b>grave</b></font> is filled with a <font color=""#0af""><b>pool</b></font> of ice which will <font color=""#f0a""><b>equal</b></font> death for anyone who falls into it. If you fell into this grave filled with ice, you would certainly die. Ice grave equals death.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine yourself falling into this ice pool inside the grave. Remember that the pool radical is full of ice and not water since it has two drops which equal ice. Feel the cold embrace of the ice grave as you fall in.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>除<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>exclude</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Surplus, Butcher</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>butcher</b></font> has a <font color=""#0af""><b>surplus</b></font> of meat and if you <font color=""#f0a""><b>exclude</b></font> last year, this is the most meat he’s ever had. It’s not often that this butcher has a surplus, but these last two years have been years of surplus. If you exclude last year, this year is the largest surplus of meat this butcher has ever had.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Look at all the meat! Exclude last year, don’t even think about it. Just look at all the surplus this year! Smell and see all the meat around. There’s so much of it.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>貨<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>freight</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Clam, Change</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">You <font color=""#0af""><b>change</b></font> your attitude about a <font color=""#0af""><b>clam</b></font> being precious <font color=""#f0a""><b>freight</b></font> after you realize how expensive it is. This particular clam is incredibly valuable. It’s worth a lot of money. Before you didn’t think it was freight worthy of such a fuss, but you’ve changed your mind.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine what would make this clam so luxurious that it would be considered precious freight. Perhaps it’s made out of solid gold. Maybe it’s jewel encrusted. Who knows?</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>孫<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>grandchild</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Child, Lineage</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>child</b></font> shares his <font color=""#0af""><b>lineage</b></font> with a <font color=""#f0a""><b>grandchild</b></font>. The child passes his lineage down to his child and then that child’s child is the grandchild and between them all a lineage is shared.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Look at this family tree. See the child, and then the grandchild. Trace the lineage with your finger as you observe.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>墓<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>grave</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Grave, Greenhouse</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>greenhouse</b></font> being used as a <font color=""#0af""><b>grave</b></font> is still a <font color=""#f0a""><b>grave</b></font>, though it's kind of a crappy one.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Go into the greenhouse grave. It reeks of dead bodies because you didn't bury anything, plus, it's really warm. This was the worst idea ever.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>幾<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>how many</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Person, Poop, Drunkard</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">You <font color=""#0af""><b>poop</b></font> twice on a sleeping <font color=""#0af""><b>drunkard</b></font> <font color=""#0af""><b>person</b></font> and you find yourself wondering <font color=""#f0a""><b>how many</b></font> more times you can poop on them and wonder <font color=""#f0a""><b>how much</b></font> they can take before they realize what’s going on.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: You’ve already pooped twice on this drunkard, how many more times can you do it? How much do you think this person can take? Just imagine yourself doing this.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>尋<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>inquire</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Construction, Mouth, Measurement, Wolverine</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text""><font color=""#0af""><b>Wolverine</b></font> is doing a <font color=""#0af""><b>construction</b></font> job and he’s using his <font color=""#0af""><b>mouth</b></font> to <font color=""#0af""><b>measure</b></font> so he knows how many folks he needs to <font color=""#f0a""><b>inquire</b></font> about helping him with the job. Using one’s mouth is a strange way to measure something, but that’s just how Wolverine does things. Once he measures it all out, he’ll know how many construction workers he needs to inquire about working for him.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine Wolverine going around, measuring the construction site with his mouth. Look at him with his mouth wide open, wandering around the site deep in thought. What a weirdo.</i></span><p> "

"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>脈<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>vein</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Moon, Cliff, Tofu</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Under the <font color=""#0af""><b>moon</b></font> while you sit on a <font color=""#0af""><b>cliff</b></font>, you inject a syringe of <font color=""#0af""><b>tofu</b></font> right into your <font color=""#f0a""><b>vein</b></font>. You sneak out to the cliff at night to get your tofu fix, injecting it straight into your vein.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Feel the tofu running through your veins. Feel the tofu goodness spreading all over your body. It’s so intense you can even taste a little tofu in your mouth.</i></span><p> "

Sauron wants your heart because it is filled with virtue and Sauron needs a virtuous heart to complete his latest scheme. Luckily, this enchanted cross you have protects you from Sauron.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Feel your heart of virtue in your chest. It’s a good heart, full of virtue. Feel the weight of the cross in your hand as Sauron tries to approach you but can’t. The cross protects you.</i></span><p> "

"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>桜<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>sakura</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Tree, Woman, Grass</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Under a <font color=""#0af""><b>tree</b></font> sitting on the <font color=""#0af""><b>grass</b></font> is a <font color=""#0af""><b>woman</b></font> who loves <font color=""#f0a""><b>sakura</b></font>, or <font color=""#f0a""><b>cherry tree</b></font>, if you’re an English speaker.
