"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>笠<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>conical hat</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Stand, Bamboo</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>bamboo</b></font> thing you put on your head to <font color=""#0af""><b>stand</b></font> taller would probably be a hat. A bamboo hat is probably one of those hats you think of when you think of rice farmers, a <font color=""#f0a""><b>conical hat</b></font>.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: You know the ones I'm talking about? They're cone-shaped, sort of, and they go on your head, keeping the sun off your face.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>竜<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>dragon</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Dragon</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The <font color=""#0af""><b>dragon</b></font> radical is the same as this kanji, which is <font color=""#f0a""><b>dragon</b></font>.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Not to <font color=""#f0a""><b>dragon</b></font> with it, but make sure you know your radicals so you know your kanji!</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>縁<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>edge</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Thread, Wolverine, Pig</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>thread</b></font> is holding a <font color=""#0af""><b>wolverine</b></font> and a <font color=""#0af""><b>pig</b></font> to the ground, prevening them from going over the <font color=""#f0a""><b>edge</b></font>.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: You'd think someone would use a rope or something to prevent their prize animals from jumping over the edge, but this farmer doesn't seem to care.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>忍<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>endure</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Heart, Blade</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">If someone puts a <font color=""#0af""><b>blade</b></font> to your <font color=""#0af""><b>heart</b></font>, you're going to have a rough time. They leave it there, for a long long time. They aren't going to cut you, but you can't move. You have to <font color=""#f0a""><b>endure</b></font> the pain and uncomfortableness of the situation.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine your chest and ribs are open. There's a blade on your heart. Now try not to move, or your heart will be cut!</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>釣<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>fishing</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Gold, Pool</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>gold</b></font> <font color=""#0af""><b>pool</b></font> is where you're going to go <font color=""#f0a""><b>fishing</b></font>. Because, if the pool is gold, hopefully the fish are too.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine yourself fishing in a gold pool, catching golden fish. What a great <font color=""#f0a""><b>fishing</b></font> spot this is.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>吉<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>good luck</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Longcat</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>longcat</b></font> will bring you <font color=""#f0a""><b>good luck</b></font>.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine your longcat that you have hanging from your belt. People ask you why you have a long cat hanging from your belt. You say it's for <font color=""#f0a""><b>good luck</b></font>.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>粒<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>grains</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Stand, Rice</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The part of <font color=""#0af""><b>rice</b></font> that <font color=""#0af""><b>stand</b></font>s up tall in the air (at the end of the stalks) is the <font color=""#f0a""><b>grains</b></font>.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: If you think about this one it'll make good sense. Just imagine rice stalks standing up into the air.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>髪<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>hair</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Hair, Long, Friend</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Your <font color=""#0af""><b>long</b></font> <font color=""#0af""><b>hair</b></font> is your <font color=""#0af""><b>friend</b></font>. It's your <font color=""#f0a""><b>hair</b></font> and you're so proud of it.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Just feel your hair, it's such a good friend, and you wish it was longer.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>丘<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>hill</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Ground, Axe</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">An <font color=""#0af""><b>axe</b></font> lay in the <font color=""#0af""><b>ground</b></font>, atop a <font color=""#f0a""><b>hill</b></font>.&nbsp;</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: The axe in the ground on top of the hill really shines. The sun is coming up behind it, silhouetting the whole thing very nicely.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>俺<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>i</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Big, Rice Paddy, Leader, Umbrella</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The <font color=""#0af""><b>leader</b></font> of a <font color=""#0af""><b>big</b></font> <font color=""#0af""><b>rice paddy</b></font> is standing in the middle of said rice paddy with an <font color=""#0af""><b>umbrella</b></font>. Who is this wacky leader? Why, it is <font color=""#f0a""><b>I</b></font>. It is <font color=""#f0a""><b>me</b></font>.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine that this leader is you. Be rough about it, because 俺 is the 'rougher' version of 'I.' You should only use it in casual situations or if you're a badass.</span></i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>僕<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>i</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Leader, Business</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>leader</b></font> of <font color=""#0af""><b>business</b></font>? Ha! That's <font color=""#f0a""><b>me</b></font>! That's <font color=""#f0a""><b>I</b></font>!</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: This version of <font color=""#f0a""><b>I</b></font> is more boyish. It's a sort of young man / boy way of saying 'I,' though you'll hear women use it too sometimes (it's a teensy bit tomboyish though).</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>寸<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>measurement</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Measurement</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The <font color=""#0af""><b>measurement</b></font> radical and the <font color=""#f0a""><b>measurement</b></font> kanji are exactly the same.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: If you make sure to know the radicals, you'll also make sure to know the kanji too, automagically.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>桃<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>peach</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Tree, Omen</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The <font color=""#0af""><b>tree</b></font> has an <font color=""#0af""><b>omen</b></font> growing from it, one single <font color=""#f0a""><b>peach</b></font> that is the size of a house. Inside is a child who will save the village from demons.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Of course, this tree omen of a <font color=""#f0a""><b>peach</b></font> refers to momotaro, the little boy who was born from a peach (you should look it up if you don't know this children's story).</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>梨<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>pear</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Tree, Pine, Ribs</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>pine</b></font> tree with <font color=""#0af""><b>ribs</b></font> on it that is a <font color=""#0af""><b>tree</b></font>... well, of course it is a tree. That's pretty dumb. But, it is fascinating this pine tree has ribs. What is hidden in those ribs? Perhaps a tree's heart? You pull the ribs back and the tree screams in terror, but it can't go anywhere because it's a tree. Inside is a beating... not heart... but a <font color=""#f0a""><b>pear</b></font>. A beating pear.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: You grab the beating pear and take it out of the tree, which screams some more. Take a bite out of this pear-heart thing and think about how it tastes.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>姫<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>princess</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Woman, Servant</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The <font color=""#0af""><b>woman</b></font> <font color=""#0af""><b>servant</b></font> is the lower ranking <font color=""#f0a""><b>princess</b></font>. The queen is no servant. Hecks no. Just the princess, because she's a servant to what her parents tell her to do.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Just imagine a princess saying 'UGH, I'm just like a servant, I have to do all the crap you tell me.' Then, all the servants roll their eyes, because, really, she's a princess, lucky duck.</i></span><p> "

She says, she goes out and shoots her catapult.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>謎<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>riddle</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Rice, Say, Water Slide</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Here's what I <font color=""#0af""><b>say</b></font>: What's the difference between a <font color=""#0af""><b>water slide</b></font> and <font color=""#0af""><b>rice</b></font>? That is my <font color=""#f0a""><b>riddle</b></font>, and if you can figure it out you're pretty smart.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Try to think of the riddle as a riddle, and then try to figure out the riddle (hint: I don't know the answer either).</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>侍<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>samurai</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Leader, Temple</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The <font color=""#0af""><b>leader</b></font> of the <font color=""#0af""><b>temple</b></font> isn't a monk like you'd expect. It's a <font color=""#f0a""><b>samurai</b></font>, who protects the monks in return for prayers that keep him safe.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: You walk up to a temple and you'er surprised to find that there's a samurai guarding it. "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>叱<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>scold</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Mouth, Seven</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">From my <font color=""#0af""><b>mouth</b></font> I have told you <font color=""#0af""><b>seven</b></font> times not to do that. Now I have to <font color=""#f0a""><b>scold</b></font> you.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: SEVEN TIMES! You'd think you'd learn.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>棚<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>shelf</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Tree, Moon</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>tree</b></font> with two <font color=""#0af""><b>moon</b></font>s on either side, holding the tree up in a horizontal angle, is a <font color=""#f0a""><b>shelf</b></font>.&nbsp;</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: So, your shelf is made up of a tree and two moons. Imagine this shelf and put things on it. The moons are kind of rolling around, making it hard to build your shelf.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>叫<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>shout</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Mouth, Four</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Take a <font color=""#0af""><b>mouth</b></font>, now multiply it by <font color=""#0af""><b>four</b></font>. Four mouths are so loud, and with four mouths you can really <font color=""#f0a""><b>shout</b></font>.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine four mouths shouting at you, all at once. HEY YOU. Also, this is different from the 'seven mouths' of scold (叱), because you need more mouths to scold someone, since the whole goal is to make them feel bad. Four is enough for a shout, though.</span></i></span><p> "

"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>芽<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>sprout</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Fang, Flowers</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>flowers</b></font> <font color=""#0af""><b>fang</b></font> is the bud that comes out of the ground. It's like a little fang, coming from the earth, and it will become a flower someday. "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>嵐<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>storm</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Mountain, Wind</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The <font color=""#0af""><b>mountain</b></font> <font color=""#0af""><b>wind</b></font> coming down from the mountains is very fierce. It is so fierce it's a lot like a <font color=""#f0a""><b>storm</b></font>. Well, it is a storm, really.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: If you think about it makes sense. Those mountain winds that come down from the mountain are cold and windy and nasty. When they mix with warmer air down below, it creates a nasty <font color=""#f0a""><b>storm</b></font>.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>涙<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>teardrop</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Big, Door, Tsunami</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>tsunami</b></font> goes through a little <font color=""#0af""><b>door</b></font>, and plops down a <font color=""#0af""><b>big</b></font> drop on your face. This tsunami is your tears inside your eye area. The door is your tear duct. The big drop is the <font color=""#f0a""><b>teardrop</b></font> coming down your eye.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine a teardrop going through this process to get out of your eye, though in a more miniature teardrop size.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>雷<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>thunder</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Rice Paddy, Rain</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text""><font color=""#0af""><b>Rain</b></font> on a <font color=""#0af""><b>rice paddy</b></font> means only one thing... <font color=""#f0a""><b>thunder</b></font>! Get off the rice paddy! There's nothing but you to attract the thunder!</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine hearing the thunder as you run. It is getting closer.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>缶<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>tin can</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Can</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">While the radical is <font color=""#0af""><b>can</b></font>, it refers to a <font color=""#f0a""><b>tin can</b></font>, which is almost the same thing.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: I'll also allow <font color=""#f0a""><b>can</b></font>, though I really prefer it if you answer <font color=""#f0a""><b>tin can</b></font>, because that's a better thing to have in your mind.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>塔<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>tower</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Grave, Suit, Flowers</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The <font color=""#0af""><b>grave</b></font> of <font color=""#0af""><b>flowers</b></font> really <font color=""#0af""><b>suit</b></font>s this spot. The flowers have replaced a <font color=""#f0a""><b>tower</b></font> which was here long ago, and the flowers look way better than the old tower that was once here.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine the tower that used to be here. Now imagine the flowers, looking much better. The grave for this tower is flowers, and it is nice.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>朱<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>vermillion</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Slide, Jet</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <b><font color=""#0af"">slide</font></b> to get off the <b><font color=""#0af"">jet</font></b>. It's so beautiful. It's a brilliant <font color=""#f0a""><b>vermillion</b></font> color.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Just imagine it this beautiful color. Look up the color in Google Image search if you don't know what it is.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>翼<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>wing</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Rice Paddy, Feathers, Together</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>feather</b></font> is on a <font color=""#0af""><b>rice paddy</b></font>, and they are attached <font color=""#0af""><b>together</b></font>. You put a feather on a rice paddy to create a giant airplane. Flawed, sure. But, this rice paddy + feather is going to be one <font color=""#f0a""><b>wing</b></font> of your amazing aircraft.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine a <font color=""#f0a""><b>wing</b></font> that is made of a rice paddy and a feather put together. Doesn't make sense, looks ugly, and probably will not fly. Imagine it anyways. It is your wing.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>頃<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>approximate</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Spoon, Geoduck</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>spoon</b></font> to measure a <font color=""#0af""><b>geoduck</b></font> is a very <font color=""#f0a""><b>approximate</b></font> measurement. Geoducks are big, spoons are small. Still, we'll get the approximation going, right?</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Do the comparison. A spoonful of geoduck aka a whole geoduck on a spoon. This is a spoonful, right? This is what the recipe wanted, I think...</i></span><p> "

It's so beautiful! You inspect it closer, though. It chimes. "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>暦<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>calendar</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Sun, Tree, Cliff</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Looking up to the <font color=""#0af""><b>cliff</b></font>, you see the <font color=""#0af""><b>tree</b></font>s, and the <font color=""#0af""><b>sun</b></font> shining down on them. Using the sun and the trees (up there on the cliff), you've devised a method to tell what time of the year it is, based on where the shadow from the trees fall. After a while, you develop a bigger system. This system is a whole <font color=""#f0a""><b>calendar</b></font>.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Look at the different shadow patterns. "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>陰<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>shade</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Boobs, Now, Butcher</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The <font color=""#0af""><b>butcher</b></font> <font color=""#0af""><b>now</b></font> needs <font color=""#0af""><b>boobs</b></font>, specifically cow boobs, to fill his next order. He has them, but he needs to keep them cool, but there's no room in the freezer. So, he puts them in the <font color=""#f0a""><b>shade</b></font> where they're (hopefully) stay cool enough.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Look at the cow boob meat in the shade and wonder if it will stay good long enough there. It's pretty warm today, and the shade isn't all that cool.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>肌<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>skin</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Moon, Table</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The <font color=""#0af""><b>moon</b></font> <font color=""#0af""><b>table</b></font> is a table that's made entirely of <font color=""#f0a""><b>skin</b></font>. You thought the table was made of moon, with all those pours and such, but when you look more closely, you realize it's skin. Disgusting, porey, skin.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Touch it and feel the 'moon table.' You know it's not made of moon. How ridiculous.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>魂<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>soul, spirit</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Boobs, Demon</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The <font color=""#0af""><b>boobs</b></font> <font color=""#0af""><b>demon</b></font> (imagine a demon covered in boobs, or something) is a <font color=""#f0a""><b>soul</b></font> / <font color=""#f0a""><b>spirit</b></font> from another world who comes to this world to surprise people with all the boobs he's covered with. Weird dude, this one.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine being visited by this <font color=""#f0a""><b>spirit</b></font>. It's not a great experience, to say the least.</i></span><p> "

If your body is feeling like a stone all the time, every time you touch it, you're probably feeling quite <font color=""#f0a""><b>stiff</b></font>.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Touch your body again and again. "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>鍵<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>key</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Gold, Brush, Big Bird</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>gold</b></font> loving <font color=""#0af""><b>Big Bird</b></font> uses a <font color=""#0af""><b>brush</b></font> to polish his <font color=""#f0a""><b>key</b></font>. The key leads to the vault where Big Bird keeps all his gold. Big Bird also likes to keep the key (which is also gold) nice and shiny so he uses the brush to keep it nice and clean and shiny.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Look at Big Bird brushing the gold key with his brush. He is very focused. See the light glint off the gold key because of how clean and shiny it is.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>盆<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>lantern festival</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Plate, Part</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">I found <font color=""#0af""><b>part</b></font> of a <font color=""#0af""><b>plate</b></font> at the <font color=""#f0a""><b>lantern festival</b></font>. There is a legendary plate broken into three parts. One part of the plate I found was at the lantern festival. The lantern festival was pretty cool, but I’m really glad I found the part of that plate I was looking for.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine holding this part of the plate in your hands as the light from the lanterns glitters off it and dances around, illuminating the background. It’s enchanting.</i></span><p> "

Now that you own a manor, you’ve decided to cut your mullet in an attempt to look more respectable. You dig a grave for your mullet though as it means a lot to you. Put your mullet in the grave that you just dug behind your manor.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine yourself cutting off your prize mullet and dropping it into the grave you just dug behind your manor. "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>墜<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>crash</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Grave, Pig, Horns, Butcher</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>butcher</b></font> uses <font color=""#0af""><b>horns</b></font> to skin a <font color=""#0af""><b>pig</b></font> before he throws it into a <font color=""#0af""><b>grave</b></font>, hearing it <font color=""#f0a""><b>crash</b></font> into the earth. The horns the butcher has are very sharp. They cut through pig flesh with ease. The butcher just wants the pig skin, so he tosses the rest of the pig into a mass grave where they crash into the other pig carcasses there. What a waste of bacon.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Listen to the sickening crash of pig meat and bones as the butcher tosses them into the grave. CRASH CRASH CRASH.</i></span><p> "

He uses this notebook to record all the debts people owe him. The notebook is so long because a lot of people owe Two Face money.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: See Two Face studying this long notebook. Hear the long pages flip as he looks through all of the names written there.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>塗<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>paint</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Grave, Surplus, Tsunami</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>tsunami</b></font> <font color=""#0af""><b>surplus</b></font> covers every <font color=""#0af""><b>grave</b></font> with <font color=""#f0a""><b>paint</b></font>. The surplus of tsunamis first strike a paint factory which causes paint to spread everywhere. Then the tsunamis run into a graveyard and the every grave there gets coated with paint from the paint factory.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine this multicolored tsunami washing over every grave in the cemetery. After the tsunami subsides, every grave there looks like a rainbow.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>貼<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>paste</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Clam, Fortune</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">This <font color=""#0af""><b>clam</b></font> made a <font color=""#0af""><b>fortune</b></font> when he decided to <font color=""#f0a""><b>paste</b></font> himself to a banana. The clam made a fortune because many people viewed as daring modern art and paid him a lot. The clam just never wanted to be separated from his favorite fruit, so that’s why he decided to paste himself to it.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine you are this clam. Paste yourself to the banana. Feel the paste on your hands as you paste yourself to this yellow fruit.</i></span><p> "

The car you are in is a convertible, so the sunlight shines right onto your big bald forehead. The sun has a pretty powerful radiance as it is, but the sheen from the sunlight hitting your forehead is the most powerful radiance ever witnessed by man.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine this radiance emanating from your shiny dome. The radiance is blinding!</i></span><p> "

Your ego is preventing you from accepting help from anyone.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine being so proud and egotistical that you would rather starve than accept help from others. "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>衰<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>decline</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Lid, Sun, Kick</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">You take a <font color=""#0af""><b>lid</b></font>, and aiming it at the <font color=""#0af""><b>sun</b></font> you <font color=""#0af""><b>kick</b></font> it into the air and eventually it begins to <font color=""#f0a""><b>decline</b></font> and crashes into the sun, causing it to supernova. Imagine kicking this lid so hard that it flies into space. See it fly up to the peak of its arch, then watch as it begins the decline until it finally collides with the sun.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: As you watch the lid decline, keep in mind that the sun radical its middle line extending outside the box on both sides. This is because the sun is going supernova. Pew!</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>奨<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>encourage</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Big, Measurement, Nailbat, Cleat</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">You step on a <font color=""#0af""><b>nailbat</b></font> with your <font color=""#0af""><b>cleat</b></font>, whose <font color=""#0af""><b>measurement</b></font> is pretty <font color=""#0af""><b>big</b></font>, which is what <font color=""#f0a""><b>encourage</b></font>s you to get new shoes. The nailbat’s nails go right through your cleat and into the soft flesh within. Even though your cleats are pretty big, the nailbat goes right in. This encourages you to get some new shoes because these cleats have been ruined by the nailbat.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: The nailbat’s nails are only sticking out one side in this radical, but that’s because the nails on the other side are stuck in your foot. I encourage you to remember this and the endless pain it provides.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>淡<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>faint</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Fire, Tsunami</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>tsunami</b></font> and a couple <font color=""#0af""><b>fire</b></font>s run into each other. They cancel each other out completely, and the remainder left behind is a <font color=""#f0a""><b>faint</b></font> remnant of what was once there.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: You go to see if you can find any remainder of the fire + tsunami battle. You can, but it's so faint.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>礎<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>foundation</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Tree, Stone, Coat Rack</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">There’s a&nbsp;<b><font color=""#0af"">stone</font></b>, a&nbsp;<b><font color=""#0af"">tree</font></b>, another&nbsp;<b><font color=""#0af"">tree</font></b>, and a&nbsp;<b><font color=""#0af"">coat rack</font></b>. That stone and two trees will make the perfect&nbsp;<b style=""color: rgb(226, 0, 150);"">foundation</b>&nbsp;for a house to put that coat rack in! This stone is flat and heavy and both of the trees are flexible and durable.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine making a foundation with the stone and the two trees so you’ll have somewhere for your coat rack. Feel the wood grain and cold stone against your skin as you move them around to form the foundation.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>陛<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>highness</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Grave, Compare, Butcher</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>butcher</b></font> decides to <font color=""#0af""><b>compare</b></font> a <font color=""#0af""><b>grave</b></font> to his <font color=""#f0a""><b>highness</b></font>. The butcher says that both a grave and his highness are cold and deep, and if you fall into one, you’re already dead.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine how your highness would feel about this comparison. Imagine telling it to her face. Do you think your highness would think this comparison was amusing at all?</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>浸<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>immersed</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Stool, Forehead, Wolverine, Tsunami</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">In the event of a <font color=""#0af""><b>tsunami</b></font>, <font color=""#0af""><b>Wolverine</b></font>, your <font color=""#0af""><b>forehead</b></font>, and a <font color=""#0af""><b>stool</b></font> will all be <font color=""#f0a""><b>immersed</b></font> in it. You will become immersed in the tsunami after it hits because tsunamis are gigantic and bring a lot of water. Now you and your forehead are immersed in the tsunami along with Wolverine and a stool.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Feel the water all around you as you become immersed in this tsunami. See Wolverine trying to swim his way to the top as you watch the stool floating about in the water.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>劣<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>inferiority</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Power, Few</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The <font color=""#0af""><b>few</b></font> members of society without <font color=""#0af""><b>power</b></font> suffer from severe <font color=""#f0a""><b>inferiority</b></font> complexes. Most people in this world have lots of power, so the few that do not feel quite inferior. It is this feeling of inferiority that fuels their inferiority complexes.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine you are one of the few without power. Feel the inferiority crushing down on you. It feels terrible and there is nothing you can do about it.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>勘<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>intuition</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Power, Crab Trap</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">This <font color=""#0af""><b>crab trap</b></font> has the <font color=""#0af""><b>power</b></font> of <font color=""#f0a""><b>intuition</b></font>. By the power of intuition, this crab trap can trap like, every crab. Through intuition, it knows where the crabs will go and how they will react, so it is much easier to trap them.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Look at this crab trap and see it visibly glowing with intuition. Its powers of intuition are so strong that you can actually see it shimmering with intuition as it expertly traps all those crabs.</i></span><p> "

"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>壇<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>podium</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Lid, Grave, Sunrise, Times</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">On your <font color=""#0af""><b>grave</b></font> there is a <font color=""#0af""><b>lid</b></font> designed to prevent you from knowing how many <font color=""#0af""><b>times</b></font> the <font color=""#0af""><b>sunrise</b></font> crests over the <font color=""#f0a""><b>podium</b></font>. Someone buried you in this grave and put a lid over it. They didn’t want you to know how many days had passed since you were put in the grave. With the lid over the grave, you can’t see the sunrise and don’t know how many days have passed. Your captor is giving a speech from that nearby podium, but with the lid over you, you can’t quite make out what’s being said.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Try to visualize this podium in your head from your location. See through the grave lid with your mind’s eye.</i></span><p> "

"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>駄<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>burdensome</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Horse, Fat</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>horse</b></font> that is <font color=""#0af""><b>fat</b></font> is a <font color=""#f0a""><b>burdensome</b></font> animal.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: A fat horse. So burdensome. Not to mention the burden on the horse on top of the fatness.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>洞<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>cave</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Same, Tsunami</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>tsunami</b></font> is the <font color=""#0af""><b>same</b></font> as a <font color=""#f0a""><b>cave</b></font>. Because, if a wave is big enough, it will curl over on itself, creating a sort of cave within the wave. That's why it's the same as a cave!</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Also, imagine a tsunami hitting a cave, becoming the same as the cave (since a cave will shape it).</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>伯<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>chief</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">White, Leader</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The <font color=""#0af""><b>leader</b></font> all in <font color=""#0af""><b>white</b></font> is the <font color=""#f0a""><b>chief</b></font>. All the other leaders are wearing some other color, but that's who you tell the chief apart from the other leaders.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine all the leaders standing around, then the chief person standing there all in white.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>諮<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>consult</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Mouth, Say, Next</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The <font color=""#0af""><b>say</b></font> <font color=""#0af""><b>next</b></font> <font color=""#0af""><b>mouth</b></font> is the next mouth next to you, that says things on your behalf. Who is this mouth? This mouth is your <font color=""#f0a""><b>consult</b></font>. It is your second mouth that tells you what to do.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine it as a floating mouth whispering in your ear, right next to you, saying the things you should say.</i></span><p> "

"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>峰<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>summit</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Mountain, Winter, Signpost</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">On the <font color=""#0af""><b>mountain</b></font> it is <font color=""#0af""><b>winter</b></font> so there is a <font color=""#0af""><b>signpost</b></font> to tell you that you have reached the <font color=""#f0a""><b>summit</b></font>.&nbsp;</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: If the signpost wasn't there, you'd have no idea, due to the terrible conditions and the snow. But, the signpost tells you you're there, even though you can't see the view around the mountain.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>墳<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>tomb</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Cross, Grave, Clam, Flowers</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>grave</b></font> with a <font color=""#0af""><b>cross</b></font> and <font color=""#0af""><b>flowers</b></font> over it that opens up like a <font color=""#0af""><b>clam</b></font>. That's no normal grave, this is fancier. This is a <font color=""#f0a""><b>tomb</b></font>.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine the tomb door to be shaped like a clam, even, if it helps.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>搬<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>transport</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Sail, Ikea, Nailbat</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>nailbat</b></font> with a <font color=""#0af""><b>sail</b></font> attached to it with <font color=""#0af""><b>Ikea</b></font> furniture are the base. It's a boat made out of the weirdest things, but it's still a form of <font color=""#f0a""><b>transport</b></font>.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine your weird transport. You jump onto it and sail off.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>邪<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>wicked</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Fang, Butcher</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#0af""><b>fang</b></font> <font color=""#0af""><b>butcher</b></font> is a butcher who uses their fangs to butcher everyone. A person who does this is <font color=""#f0a""><b>wicked</b></font>.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine him running up to you and tearing you apart with his fangs. If you don’t have a mouth, you can’t <b><font color=""#f0a"">call</font></b> for peace. So use your mouth and call for peace when you can. Peace is great.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Call for peace. Say it aloud. I’m using my mouth to call for peace!</i></span><p> "

You’re wearing a lip ring because you’re a cool and edgy guy who likes to climb big mountains. From the top of the big mountain, you see a cape.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: You’re tired from just climbing up the big mountain but the view is worth it. "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>施<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>carry out</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Gun, Direction, Alligator</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Moving in the <b><font color=""#0af"">direction</font></b> of a <b><font color=""#0af"">gun</font></b>, an <b><font color=""#0af"">alligator</font></b> can <b><font color=""#f0a"">carry out</font></b> a murder once it reaches it. This alligator wants to kill someone. The alligator wants to carry out their execution. The gun is across the room so the alligator has to move in its direction to obtain it.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: See the alligator shuffle across the floor in the direction of the gun. "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>割<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>divide</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Mouth, Helmet, Master, Ribs</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Wearing a <b><font color=""#0af"">helmet</font></b> for safety, a <b><font color=""#0af"">master</font></b> of the <b><font color=""#0af"">mouth</font></b> and <b><font color=""#0af"">ribs</font></b> begins to <b><font color=""#f0a"">divide</font></b> your body into pieces. This master of the mouth and ribs is a demented surgeon. He’s dividing your body into pieces, starting by removing your mouth and your ribs.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Feel this master surgeon divide your body into multiple pieces. Feel him divide your mouth from your face and each of your ribs from your body. Hear the bones crack and flesh rip as he continues to divide you.</i></span><p> "

"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>贅<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>luxury</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Grave, Direction, Winter, Clam</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <b><font color=""#0af"">grave</font></b> digger heading in the <b><font color=""#0af"">direction</font></b> of a <font color=""#0af""><b>winter</b> <b>clam</b></font> cannot afford the <b><font color=""#f0a"">luxury</font></b> of stopping for coffee. The grave digger is hunting the elusive winter clam and has finally caught its scent so the grave digger is moving in the winter clam’s direction. Since the winter clam is so elusive, the grave digger cannot afford the luxury of stopping for anything or else the winter clam will escape.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: See yourself as this grave digger, tracking the winter clam. Moving in its direction, you catch its scent. Smell the frigid clammy smell on the wind. Let it fill your nostrils as you move closer and closer to your prey.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>乳<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>milk</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Child, Umbrella, Cleat</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Giving <b><font color=""#0af"">cleats</font></b> to a <b><font color=""#0af"">child</font></b> carrying an <b><font color=""#0af"">umbrella</font></b> is the best way to gather <b><font color=""#f0a"">milk</font></b>. You don’t have any containers, so the child has to hold milk in the upside-down umbrella. "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>演<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>perform</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Fins, Helmet, Tsunami, Corn</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Wearing a <b><font color=""#0af"">tsunami</font></b> proof <b><font color=""#0af"">helmet</font></b> while in a <b><font color=""#0af"">corn</font></b> field wearing <b><font color=""#0af"">fins</font></b> will allow you to <b><font color=""#f0a"">perform</font></b> a great show. There’s a tsunami coming in that will soon cover all of the corn, but that’s okay because you’ve got your tsunami proof helmet and fins, so you’re perfectly fine in the water. Now you can perform your underwater tsunami show with ease.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: What kind of show will you perform? Imagine yourself in the tsunami water, wearing your helmet and fins. Feel the water all around you as you perform tricks for your audience.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>現<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>present time</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">King, See</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <b><font color=""#0af"">king</font></b> can <b><font color=""#0af"">see</font></b> that the <b><font color=""#f0a"">present time</font></b> is what’s most important. There’s no time or point to think about the future. A king can see that the present time is the only time worth worrying about.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Pretend that you are this king with no foresight or consideration for the future. You live in the moment, in the present time. No regrets. See yourself as this king.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>備<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>provide</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Elephant, Cliff, Flowers, Leader</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <b><font color=""#0af"">leader</font></b> holding <b><font color=""#0af"">flowers</font></b> atop a <b><font color=""#0af"">cliff</font></b> riding an <b><font color=""#0af"">elephant</font></b> can easily <b><font color=""#f0a"">provide</font></b> for his people. He has strength (the elephant), compassion (the flowers), and foresight (being atop a cliff). This leader can provide everything his people need.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: See this majestic leader on top of the cliff, riding an elephant with flowers in his hand. Hear the elephant trumpet as the leader throws down from the cliff everything his people need. He sure knows how to provide.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>則<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>rule</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Clam, Ribs</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">You shouldn’t eat <font color=""#0af""><b>clam</b> <b>ribs</b></font> as a general <b><font color=""#f0a"">rule</font></b>. Clam ribs aren’t good for you, so it should be a rule not to eat clam ribs.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Do clams even have ribs? Well imagine they do. You wouldn’t want to eat them. They’re sharp and pointy and dangerous to your health. Imagine trying to eat these small spikey ribs. Feel them puncturing your insides as you ingest them. Now you see why it should be a rule not to eat clam ribs.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>規<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>standard</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">See, Husband</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A man who is <b><font color=""#0af"">husband</font></b> material can <b><font color=""#0af"">see</font></b> a <b><font color=""#f0a"">standard</font></b> woman and think she’s the greatest thing ever. This man will make a great husband. Even though the lady is pretty standard, the husband treats her like she’s anything but.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: This husband sets a new standard for what it means to be a husband. He’s pretty great. Imagine yourself shaking this husband’s hand because he’s so awesome.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>準<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>standard</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Cross, Tsunami, Turkey</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Riding a <b><font color=""#0af"">tsunami</font></b> you see a <b><font color=""#0af"">turkey</font></b> carrying a <b><font color=""#0af"">cross</font></b>, but that’s pretty <b><font color=""#f0a"">standard</font></b> here. This is your dreamland. You always dream about tsunamis and the turkeys carrying crosses that ride them. This might be strange for other people, but for you it’s pretty normal.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: See this tsunami riding turkey in your mind. Hear it gobble loudly as it waves its cross around. Remember, this is standard fare for you. Nothing unusual here.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>張<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>stretch</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Spring, Long</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <b><font color=""#0af"">spring</font></b> is <b><font color=""#0af"">long</font></b> and can <b><font color=""#f0a"">stretch</font></b> out. Springs are usually compressed, but you can stretch them out to make them good and long.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Hold this spring in your hands. Now stretch it out. It’s pretty long now, isn’t it? Feel the spring wobble and start to give resistance as you continue to stretch it taut.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>優<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>superior, gentle</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Heart, Winter, Forehead, Leader, Hundred</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The <b><font color=""#0af"">leader</font></b> of a <font color=""#0af""><b>hundred</b> <b>forehead</b></font>s in the <b><font color=""#0af"">heart</font></b> of <b><font color=""#0af"">winter</font></b> is <b><font color=""#f0a"">superior</font></b> at being <b><font color=""#f0a"">gentle</font></b>. These hundred foreheads are sensitive, especially in the heart of winter, so the leader must be very gentle. Not just any kind of gentle though – the gentle that these hundred foreheads need is superior.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: As a leader, you are superior. You’re so gentle to these foreheads. See yourself caring for them in the winter. Feel the chill in the air as you wrap the foreheads in blankets and prepare heating pads for them.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>沢<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>swamp</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Tsunami, Shrimp</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <b><font color=""#0af"">tsunami</font></b> of <b><font color=""#0af"">shrimp</font></b> crashes into a <b><font color=""#0af"">swamp</font></b>. Now the swamp is filled with shrimp. They used to live in the ocean, but the tsunami has carried them to their new home in the swamp.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine yourself in the swamp when the tsunami hits. Feel the water crash into you along with the shrimp. You’re all wet and shrimpy now.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>師<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>teacher, expert</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Drop, Ground, Two Face, Bear</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">To <b><font color=""#0af"">drop</font></b> a <b><font color=""#0af"">bear</font></b> to the <b><font color=""#0af"">ground</font></b> on top of <b><font color=""#0af"">Two Face</font></b> is something only a <b><font color=""#f0a"">teacher</font></b> or an <b><font color=""#f0a"">expert</font></b> could get away with. This expert teacher is Two Face’s personal teacher. The teacher is taking Two Face through a training course and part of that course involves a bear drop. Don’t question the teacher, he’s an expert.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine if this expert teacher dropped a bear on you. Feel the fuzzy and heavy animal slam on top of you, squishing you between it and the ground. What lesson do you think the teacher is trying to teach you?</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>幹<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>tree trunk</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Cross, Sun, Antenna, Hat</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <b><font color=""#0af"">cross</font></b> sits in the <b><font color=""#0af"">sun</font></b> with a <b><font color=""#0af"">hat</font></b> hanging from an <b><font color=""#0af"">antenna</font></b>. This sits atop a <b><font color=""#f0a"">tree trunk</font></b> that you have chopped down just for this purpose.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Kind of a lot of work right? "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>看<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>watch over</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Eye, Hand</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Your <b><font color=""#0af"">hand</font></b> has an <b><font color=""#0af"">eye</font></b> on it and you use it to <b><font color=""#f0a"">watch over</font></b> others. It’s not normal to have an eye on one’s hand, but your hand has been surgically modified to have an eye on it. Since you can raise your hand way up above your head, the eye on it makes it easy to watch over others.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine having an eye on your hand. How would you use it? Think of all the different perspectives you could have using this hand-eye. Be sure to remember the hand radical is modified in this kanji, since there’s an eye grafted onto the hand and all.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>肯<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>agreement, consent</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Moon, Stop</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">If you want to&nbsp;<b><font color=""#0af"">stop</font></b>&nbsp;the&nbsp;<b><font color=""#0af"">moon</font></b>&nbsp;you need to get everyone to be in&nbsp;<b><font color=""#f0a"">agreement</font></b>&nbsp;about it first. "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>浦<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>bay</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Tsunami, Wedding</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">If you want to have a&nbsp;<b>tsunami</b>&nbsp;at your&nbsp;<b>wedding</b>, you need to make sure you have it at the&nbsp;<b><font color=""#f0a"">bay</font></b>. Ouch! ""Open up clam!"" You say, picking it up angrily. But the clam won't open up. It's made a vow of&nbsp;<b><font color=""#f0a"">chastity</font></b>, so it won't open for anyone. Even your toe.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine kicking your toe into the clam a few more times and realizing it must really be serious about this chastity thing since it still won't open.</i></span><p> "

"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>襟<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>collar</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Tree, Pelican, Jackhammer</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">If you want to keep a&nbsp;<b>pelican</b>&nbsp;next to some&nbsp;<b>tree</b>s while you&nbsp;<b>jackhammer</b>&nbsp;under them, you have to find a&nbsp;<b><font color=""#f0a"">collar</font></b>&nbsp;to tie it there. "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>蓮<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>lotus</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Car, Flowers, Water Slide</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">There is only one type of&nbsp;<b>flower</b>&nbsp;that will grow out of your&nbsp;<b>car</b>&nbsp;after you push it down a&nbsp;<b>water slide</b>&nbsp;into water and that's a&nbsp;<b><font color=""#f0a"">lotus</font></b>. "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>慈<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>mercy</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Ground, Heart, Poop, Horns</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A person with&nbsp;<b>horns</b>&nbsp;has you on the&nbsp;<b>ground</b>&nbsp;and lets loose two&nbsp;<b>poop</b>s&nbsp;over your&nbsp;<b>heart</b>. ""<b><font color=""#f0a"">Mercy</font></b>! Mercy!"" You cry, but the horned dude doesn't stop until there are two gross poops sitting your heart. "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>塚<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>mound</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Grave, Forehead, Pig</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">You bury the&nbsp;<b>forehead</b>&nbsp;of a&nbsp;<b>pig</b>&nbsp;into a shallow&nbsp;<b>grave</b>&nbsp;and it makes a small&nbsp;<b><font color=""#f0a"">mound</font></b>&nbsp;of earth. You didn't bury it very well. Someone might trip on this mound!</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine the mound you made by burying the forehead of a pig in a little grave. Is it a pig shaped mound?</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>玄<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>mysterious</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Mysterious</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The&nbsp;<b>mysterious</b>&nbsp;radical and the&nbsp;<b><font color=""#f0a"">mysterious</font></b>&nbsp;kanji are exactly the same! Hooray!</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Make sure you remember this radical means mysterious and you'll remember the kanji meaning too!</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>肪<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>obese, fat</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Moon, Direction</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">When the&nbsp;<b>moon</b>&nbsp;faces the right&nbsp;<b>direction</b>, everyone on earth becomes&nbsp;<b><font color=""#f0a"">obese</font></b>. The pull of the moon moves all the water on earth and inside us, so when it faces the right way, we all get super&nbsp;<b><font color=""#f0a"">fat</font></b>.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture the moon turning to face a different direction. Feel you body start to become really obese. You get huge and round just like the moon.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>耕<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>plow</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Well, Redwood</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">When a giant&nbsp;<b>redwood</b>&nbsp;grows next to your&nbsp;<b>well</b>&nbsp;you'll have to find a new place to&nbsp;<b><font color=""#f0a"">plow</font></b>. The redwood is so big that you can't get in the well anymore, and you can't plow your fields without a well. You're going to have to plow new land for the rest of the year to make up for this.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture yourself plowing a new plot of land. Digging into the soil with your plough, glaring up at the redwood that overtook your well.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>媛<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>princess</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Woman, Football</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Everyone knows that when a&nbsp;<b>woman</b>&nbsp;plays&nbsp;<b>football</b>&nbsp;she becomes a&nbsp;<b><font color=""#f0a"">princess</font></b>. Thats how princesses are made.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture the awesome princess, kicking butt and taking names, out on the football field.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>邸<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>residence</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Ground, Duck, Butcher</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">If you see a bunch of&nbsp;<b>duck</b>s on the&nbsp;<b>ground</b>&nbsp;around a&nbsp;<b>butcher</b>, you've found his&nbsp;<b><font color=""#f0a"">residence</font></b>. Butchers like to chop up ducks right on their front lawns because it makes them feel at home.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture all the dead ducks on the ground by the butcher's feet. This may be the ideal residence for him, but it's not where you'd choose to live.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>喚<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>scream</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Big, Enclosure, Mouth, Legs</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">There is an&nbsp;<b>enclosure</b>&nbsp;with a&nbsp;<b>big</b>&nbsp;<b>mouth</b>&nbsp;full of&nbsp;<b>legs</b>&nbsp;coming really really close to your mouth so you&nbsp;<b><font color=""#f0a"">scream</font></b>! Scream because that's terrifying! Get it away from your mouth!</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine an enclosure with a big mouth with legs sticking out of it inching closer and closer to your own mouth. Imagine opening your mouth as wide as you can before they mouth presses against yours and scream as loud as you possibly can.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>苗<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>seedling</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Rice Paddy, Flowers</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Flowers</b>&nbsp;that grow in a&nbsp;<b>rice paddy</b>&nbsp;only live to be&nbsp;<b><font color=""#f0a"">seedling</font></b>s. Once they sprout, they're plucked away to make room for more rice. Poor little seedlings.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture the seedlings growing among the rice plants. Once they bloom they'll be picked, so let's hope they stay small as long as they can.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>隻<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>ship counter</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Stool, Turkey</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A&nbsp;<b>turkey</b>&nbsp;sitting on a&nbsp;<b>stool</b>&nbsp;is something every ship has in its crow's nest. That's why the universal&nbsp;<b><font color=""#f0a"">ship counter</font></b>&nbsp;is a turkey on a stool. Not a crow.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture yourself counting ships by pointing your finger from one turkey propped up on a stool to the next. You'll be the best ship counter in the world at this rate!</i></span><p> "

It's really gross but what else did you think you'd find? Everyone knows tigers can't digest the skin of the things it eats.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine yourself opening a tigers mouth and looking all the way down into its stomach and seeing a bunch of skin. Why would you imagine that? Eww.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>軟<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>soft</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Car, Lack</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A&nbsp;<b>car</b>&nbsp;that's&nbsp;<b>lack</b>ing is really&nbsp;<b><font color=""#f0a"">soft</font></b>. Cars need to be hard so that things like bugs and other cars wont hurt the people inside when you hit them. But if your car is lacking the hardness it needs, you'll have a really soft, useless car.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture a soft car lacking what it needs to drive down the road. It's so soft it just flops down and won't move.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>郊<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>suburbs</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Butcher, Mix</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">If you <b>mix</b> a bunch of <b>butcher</b>s together, they'll want to live together too. The only place for this many butchers is the <b><font color=""#f0a"">suburbs</font></b>.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture lots of butchers mixed together in the suburbs. They wave their butcher's knifes at each other to say hello from their identical houses every morning.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>頂<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>summit, humbly</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Nail, Geoduck</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">You're climbing a mountain and you notice that someone is <b>nail</b>ing a <b>geoduck</b> to the <b><font color=""#f0a"">summit</font></b>. You try to <b><font color=""#f0a"">humbly</font></b> mind your own business but it's hard to ignore something like that.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture the geoduck nailed to the summit of the mountain. It looks pretty gross. Maybe you shouldn't keep climbing.</i></span><p> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>濯<br><br><br><br></div>  Meaning:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>wash</b></font></span><p>  <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Tsunami, Wolverine, Turkey</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Meaning Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">You need to throw your two <b>wolverine</b>s and your <b>turkey</b> into the oncoming <b>tsunami</b> if you want to <b><font color=""#f0a"">wash</font></b> them at the same time. It's the only way you can get them clean at once without the wolverines fighting over the turkey and somebody getting hurt. The tsunami is big enough to wash them all before anything bad happens.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine the tsunami coming toward you. Two wolverines in one hand and a turkey in the other. You're gonna wash them so good they'll never get dirty again.</i></span><p> "

Mustaches are pretty gross, so I don't blame the tsunami for avoiding them.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture the tsunami spinning in a circle, trying not to hit the mustaches until it spins itself into a giant whirlpool.</i></span><p> "

You can understand everything the people want, and you know how to give it to them, because you listen to their desires so well.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Watch the wise woman close her eyes and listen to the public's desires. Light shines out of it and the whole world weeps at its beauty. Look at its pelican head and fluffy sheep body. Nothing could be more auspicious and glorious than this thing.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture this auspicious pelican sheep hybrid. Blessing the children with its fluffy wings.</i></span><p> "
