What an amazing magician, able to disappear like that. Oh wait, that's because you shot him out of the cannon.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>笠<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>conical hat</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">-</font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>かさ</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Stand, Bamboo</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#f0a""><b>conical hat</b></font> is kind of like an umbrella on your head. What's the reading for 'umbrella' in Japanese? Why, it's <font><b>kasa</b></font> (かさ)!</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Think about a bamboo umbrella on your head. They're pretty similar in shape, after all.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>竜<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>dragon</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>りゅう</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">たつ</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Dragon</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Imagine a <font color=""#f0a""><b>dragon</b></font>. You are talking to it, which is already pretty strange, but as you're talking, he turns into the Street Fighter Character <font><b>Ryuu</b></font> (りゅう).</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Then imagine after his transformation he attacks you using his Street Fighter moves. 'Hadouken!'</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>縁<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>edge</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>えん</b>, ねん</font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">ふち</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Thread, Wolverine, Pig</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The thread is on a spool, too, which makes it even worse, because as they run off towards the <font color=""#f0a""><b>edge</b></font>, they'll eventually reach the <font><b>en</b></font>d of the spool, which means it won't be holding them anywhere.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: As they're running towards the cliff, yell to them: 'NO! You will reach the <font><b>en</b></font>d of your spool! Stopppppp!' Then watch them reach the end of their spool and fly off the edge.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>忍<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>endure</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>にん</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">しの</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Heart, Blade</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">This is all a part of your&nbsp;<b>nin</b>ja (にん) training. You must learn to stay totally still, without breathing. This is how they train you. If you can&nbsp;<b style=""color: rgb(226, 0, 150);"">endure</b>&nbsp;this you can endure anything, plus you can stay really still, which is good for ninjas.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Just think about how much you want to become a ninja. You'll do anything, even endure this.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>釣<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>fishing</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">ちょう</font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>つ</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Gold, Pool</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">You caught a couple of gold fish. <font><b>Two</b></font> (つ) gold fish, actually!</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Count your golden fish. They're so nice! They're also worth their weight in gold, because, well, they are gold.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>吉<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>good luck</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>きつ, きち</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">よし</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Longcat</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">This whole long cat for <font color=""#f0a""><b>good luck</b></font> thing is working so well for you! You decide to make some do it yourself <font><b>kits</b></font> (きつ) to make a good luck long cat and sell them to other people. It's so easy to make, you can make it in your <font><b>kitch</b></font>en (きち).</span></span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Put together these kits in your kitchen in your head. What would they include? Cats? Stretchers to stretch out not-long cats so that they become long? Imagine making one yourself, using a kit in your kitchen.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>粒<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>grains</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>りゅう</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">つぶ</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Stand, Rice</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">You have a box of <font color=""#f0a""><b>grains</b></font>. <font><b>Ryuu</b></font> (りゅう) from Street Fighter is doing training by punching the grains to strengthen his fingers.</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: He has his hands flat, and stabs his hands into the grains. Yah! Yah! Yah!</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>髪<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>hair</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">はつ</font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>かみ</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Hair, Long, Friend</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Who gave you this hair? Probably the great <font><b>神</b></font> (かみ) of hair. You deserve this great hair.</span></span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Pretend to pray to the great hair 神. What is his reply? Does he give you more hair?</span></i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>丘<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>hill</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>きゅう</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">おか</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Ground, Axe</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Also up there is the <font><b>cute</b></font>st (きゅう) little animal you've ever seen. It scampers around on the hill, then runs into the axe, cutting itself in half.</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: The cutest thing in the world! What have you done!!? Why did you leave your very sharp axe there?</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>俺<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>i</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">-</font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>おれ</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Big, Rice Paddy, Leader, Umbrella</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Why am <font color=""#f0a""><b>I</b></font> standing in the middle of this rice paddy with an umbrella? I'm digging for <font><b>ore</b></font> (おれ).</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: More acurately, I'm standing here with an umbrella so I don't get wet. My minions are doing the ore digging, but I am watching to make sure they don't slack off.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>僕<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>i</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>ぼく</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">-</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Leader, Business</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text""><font><b>ぼく</span></b></font> is one of the more common ways to say 'I' in Japanese. If you're on level 44 of WaniKani, you probably already know that, so you know the reading for this as well.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Hopefully my assumption is correct. If it's not, learn it on your own! Good luck!</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>寸<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>measurement</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>すん</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">-</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Measurement</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">You want to <font color=""#f0a""><b>measure</b></font> something... something that will make you famous. You decide you'll measure the biggest mass in our solar system. We're talking about the <font><b>sun</b></font> (すん).</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine yourself deciding to do this. First step is to get a ridiculously long measuring tape. Then, you go up to the <font><b>sun</b></font> and start measuring. You immediately start getting burned. Feel the pain of the heat from the <font><b>sun</b></font>. Think about how this really probably wasn't a good idea. You still go forward, though, doing your best to <font color=""#f0a""><b>measure</b></font> the sun. Ouch, ouch, ouch.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>桃<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>peach</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">とう</font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>もも</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Tree, Omen</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">If <font><b>momo</b></font>taro (もも) wasn't enough, think about the <font color=""#f0a""><b>peach</b></font> growing larger and larger. You want it to grow bigger, so you yell at it: '<font><b>MO</b></font>RE! MO<font><b>RE!' (も</span></b></font>).</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: It grows bigger everytime you say 'MORE MORE' twice. If you say it just once, it stays the same.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>梨<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>pear</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">-</font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>なし</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Tree, Pine, Ribs</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">It's so good. Sooo sooo good you <font><b>gnash</b></font> (なし) your teeth at the tree.&nbsp;</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: I want more pear hearts, you yell! So you go around pulling the ribs back from the trees all around you, taking their pear hearts and eating them raw.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>姫<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>princess</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">-</font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>ひめ</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Woman, Servant</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The <font color=""#f0a""><b>princess</b></font> goes on to do whatever she wants. She tells the real servants: 'don't tell my daddy the king I did this. <font><b>He may</b></font> (ひめ) not like it.'</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: The servants all know they should tell the king, because the princess is a servant to the king, just as they are, plus they don't want to lose their heads.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>娯<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>recreation</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>ご</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">-</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Woman, Catapult</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Her favorite thing to shoot at with her catapult for <font color=""#f0a""><b>recreation</b></font> is <font><b>Go</b></font>dzilla (ご).</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Get out of here, Godzilla! I'm gonna shoot you.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>謎<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>riddle</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">-</font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>なぞ</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Rice, Say, Water Slide</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The only person who can answer this riddle are the <font><b>Nazo</b></font> (なぞ).</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Go seek out the Nazo and see if you can figure out the answer of this riddle.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>侍<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>samurai</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">-</font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>さむらい</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Leader, Temple</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The reading is <font><b>samurai</b></font>, which should be easy enough to remember.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: If you know the meaning you know the reading as well! That doesn't happen too often with kanji, so consider yourself lucky!</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>叱<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>scold</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">-</font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>しか</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Mouth, Seven</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">What were you doing wrong that caused me to <font color=""#f0a""><b>scold</b></font> you? You were feeding the <font><b>鹿</span></b></font> (しか). If you feed them they'll never be able to feed themselves!</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine yourself feeding the deer, then getting scolded (or you doing the scolding to someone else feeding the deer, whichever works best).</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>棚<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>shelf</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">ほう</font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>たな</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Tree, Moon</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Your moon shelf is great. It's also huge, because moons are really big. That means you can store a <font><b>ton-a</b></font>-stuff (たな) on it.</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Think about the ton-a-stuff you're going to put on there. Like, literally, measure out a ton of things and put them on there. It can hold it!</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>叫<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>shout</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>きょう</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">さけ</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Mouth, Four</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">They are shouting the word '<font><b>今日</span></b></font>!' (きょう). Why? Because they want something happening today.</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: If you imagine them as being irritating enough and loud enough, you'll probably remember the 今日 part too. Why are they yelling 今日 over and over again with their four mouths?</span></span></i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>匹<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>small animal</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>-</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>ひき</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Legs, Cage</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">You look up through the cloth, and see a hairless cat. This <font color=""#f0a""><b>small animal</b></font> is hairless, but most surprisingly is covered in <font><b>hickie</b></font>s (ひき).</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Who is giving this cat all those hickies? Pretty gross, if you ask me.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>辛<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>spicy</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>しん</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">から, つら</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Spicy</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Imagine eating this <font color=""#f0a""><b>spicy</b></font> food, becoming blinded by the spicy heat, and knocking your <font><b>shin</b></font> (しん) on something while you bumble around.</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: It's bleeding profusely and really hurts a lot. Plus your mouth is still burning from that spicy food you ate. It's pure agony.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>芽<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>sprout</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">が</font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>め</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Fang, Flowers</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">When the <font color=""#f0a""><b>sprout</b></font> gets out of the ground and opens up, instead of a flower there is a human-looking <font><b>目</b></font>, looking right at you.</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: You look at all the sprouts. They have all turned into 目s, looking straight at you. You're terrified.</span></i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>嵐<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>storm</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">-</font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>あらし</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Mountain, Wind</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#f0a""><b>storm</b></font> is nothing to scoff at. If you get hit by the storm and get all wet and nasty and electrocuted, you're bound to get <font><b>a rash</b></font> (あらし).</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: The rash comes from being wet and not drying off when you get home. Your skin gets irritated by this moisture.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>涙<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>teardrop</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>るい</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">なみだ</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Big, Door, Tsunami</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Your <font color=""#f0a""><b>teardrop</b></font>s always come at the worst times, <font><b>rui</b></font>ning (るい) serious and/or happy moments. You can't stop crying. it is ruining your life!</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Think of several inappropriate situations to cry in. Put yourself in them. Think about how all this crying is ruining things, for real!</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>雷<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>thunder</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>らい</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">かみなり</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Rice Paddy, Rain</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">You can't run fast enough to escape the <font color=""#f0a""><b>thunder</b></font> so you hitch a <font><b>ri</b></font>de (らい) from someone driving by.</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Thank goodness, that was a close one. The guy who picks you up is named Ryan, though he likes it if you call him <font><b>Ry</b></font> (らい).</span></i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>缶<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>tin can</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>かん</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">-</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Can</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The reading is unbelievably easy. A <font color=""#f0a""><b>tin can</b></font> is a <font><b>can</b></font> (かん).</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: I can't make this stuff up. It's too easy to remember, almost.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>塔<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>tower</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>とう</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">-</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Grave, Suit, Flowers</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#f0a""><b>tower</b></font> starts with a <font><b>とう</span></b></font>, or at least kind of.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine the long vowel sound for tower. TOoooower.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>朱<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>vermillion</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>しゅ</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">あけ</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Slide, Jet</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The <font color=""#f0a""><b>vermillion</b></font> slide also matches your <font><b>shoe</b></font> (しゅ), though only one of them.</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Look down at your vermillion shoe. Looks so good.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>翼<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>wing</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>よく</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">つばさ</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Rice Paddy, Feathers, Together</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">To make the feather and rice paddy stick together you need some kind of sticking agent. This time we find the original bird that the feather came from and grab its eggs. We break the eggs open and use the <font><b>yolk</b></font> (よく). It's pretty sticky, but still probably not aircraft safe.&nbsp;</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine using the yolks to stick everything together. It's all over your hands, and things are pretty nasty.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>頃<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>approximate</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">-</font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>ころ, ごろ</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Spoon, Geoduck</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Maybe this is too much geoduck, even if we're going for an <font color=""#f0a""><b>approximate</b></font>. So, you take the <font><b>core</b></font> (ころ) of the geoduck and measure that instead.&nbsp;</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: That's a little better. Not too much geoduck. Still a lot, but more like an approximate.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>菌<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>bacteria</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>きん</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">-</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Mouth, Pine, Flowers</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">You learned this <font color=""#f0a""><b>bacteria</b></font> killing trick from your <font><b>kin</b></font> (きん).</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Sure, your kin is a bunch of hicks, but they sure know what flowers and such to chew on to get rid of the mouth <font color=""#f0a""><b>bacteria</b></font>.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>鐘<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>bell</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>しょう</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">かね</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Stand, Gold, Sunflower</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Ah, this makes sense. This fancy <font color=""#f0a""><b>bell</b></font> is a part of a fancy bell <font><b>show</b></font> (しょう). For some reason you're standing on the stage where it's being shown off, too, during this <font><b>show</b></font>.</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Get off the stage, someone yells. You're blocking our view of that bell!</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>舟<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>boat</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">しゅう</font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>ふね, ふな</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Sail</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The reading is the same as the kanji 船, though there's an extra reading there as well, ふな. They're close, so you should be able to remember it based off of ふね.</span></span></span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Try to answer ふな a couple times when doing your reviews. It'll help when we get to the vocab part.</span></i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>嫁<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>bride</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">か</font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>よめ, とつ</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Woman, House</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Now that you have a <font color=""#f0a""><b>bride</b></font> in your house, you can get rid of <font><b>yo</b></font>ur <font><b>mai</b></font>d (よめ), since your bride will do all the cleaning.</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Your bride is very upset at how sexist you're being right now, and makes you do all the cleaning instead. The maid still gets fired.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>暦<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>calendar</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>れき</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">こよみ</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Sun, Tree, Cliff</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Remember the word 歴史, which means 'history'? Using a <font color=""#f0a""><b>calendar</b></font>, you too can remember history (otherwise, who knows when these things happened). So, the reading for this kanji is the same as the reading for 歴史's beginning, because they're related.</span></span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Make sure you make the connection between the word 歴史 and this kanji. If you do, it'll be much easier to remember the reading of this kanji.</span></i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>曇<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>cloudy</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">-</font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>くも</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Sun, Rain, Boobs</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Remember 雲? It means 'cloud' and has the same reading as 'cloudy,' making them both <font><b>くも</span></b></font>.</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Make sure you know both cloud words and you'll know their readings too.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>也<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>considerably</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">や</font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>なり</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Alligator</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Speaking of <font color=""#f0a""><b>considerably</b></font> terrifying, that place known as <font><b>Nar</b></font>nia (なり) is pretty terrifying. Not sure why children want to go there.</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Also, things that are 'considerably' anything start somewhere. They <font><b>become</b></font> (なり) whatever 'considerable' thing they are now from something smaller before.</span></i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>塾<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>cram school</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>じゅく</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">-</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Grave, Circle, Sock</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The sock circle around the grave moves around though, and tries to pull you in. So, to get to <font color=""#f0a""><b>cram school</b></font> you have to <font><b>juke</b></font> (じゅく) this thing and run past it.</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine yourself doing a juke to get past this weird monster of a grave. You've gotten pretty good at it, though you don't want to be careless. Looks like Carly was the latest victim. Poor Carly, didn't juke well enough.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>呪<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>curse</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">-</font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>のろ</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Mouth, Older Brother</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Turns out, he put the <font><b>no ro</b></font>ad (のろ) curse on you, meaning you can never walk on roads.</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: In your mind, walk around the area where you live. Think about the places you can go that aren't roads. If you try to walk on a road, you can't. This is the <font><b>no ro</b></font>ad curse, after all.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>湿<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>damp</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>しつ</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">しめ</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Sun, Spikes, Tsunami</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">As you're watching the spikes to see if they'll ever stop being <font color=""#f0a""><b>damp</b></font>, a <font><b>shitzu</b></font> (しつ) dog walks right into the spike trap.</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Now they're even more damp compared to before. Feel the horror of accidentally killing that poor little puppy. How did you let this happen? You were right there, watching!</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>稼<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>earnings</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>か</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">かせ</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Pine, House</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Along with this nice pine house you bought a nice new <font><b>ca</b></font>r (か) as well.</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine your new car in front of your new pine house. They look good together! Also, this has the same reading as 家, and includes it on the side. Good little way to cheat and remember the reading, that is.</span></i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>疲<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>exhausted</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>ひ</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">つか</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Skin, Sick</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">When you're <font color=""#f0a""><b>exhausted</b></font>, your muscles are all probably worn out. Being this worn out, you can probably imagine that your body is all <font><b>hea</b></font>ted (ひ) up, from all the exercising.</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine exercising so much that your body gets all <font color=""#f0a""><b>exhausted</b></font> and <font><b>hea</b></font>ted (ひ) up.</span></i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>翔<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>fly</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">しょう</font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>かけ</b>, と</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Feathers, Sheep</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Using this sheep that can <font color=""#f0a""><b>fly</b></font>, you're going to get rich! But there's a problem... you have to catch the sheep. So, you get some <font><b>cake</b></font> (かけ) and use it to lure the sheep to your trap, where you catch it!</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Ha HA! Everyone knows sheep love cake. Works every time. Now this flying sheep is yours!</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>賭<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>gamble</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">-</font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>か</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Clam, Someone</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Best part is, if you win this <font color=""#f0a""><b>gamble</b></font>, you're going to take all your money and spend it on a new <font><b>ca</b></font>r (か).</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: You won! Be excited about that. Then, take all the money you won and think about what car you can buy. What would you get?</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>霊<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>ghost</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>れい, りょう</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">-</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Two, Rain, Spikes</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">When you turn into a <font color=""#f0a""><b>ghost</b></font>, you discover a couple of new powers. First, you can shoot <font><b>ray</b></font>s (れい) out of your eyes (awesome!). Also, you can <font><b>row</b></font> (りょう) a boat really fast. That one's not as cool, but still useful for going across rivers and lakes and such.</span></span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine yourself using your two new powers, as a <font color=""#f0a""><b>ghost</b></font>.</i></span><br> "

He's controlling the water pressure and all that, sending people through the gutter and down to the ground, where there's another gutter to shoot them outside the tent.</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: You'll just want to imagine out this whole scene the best you can. Focus on the gutter and the ringleader.</i></span><br> "

It says 'MOOOO' as it gets stabbed.</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: This soldier will be eating well tonight. Yum yum cow.</i></span><br> "

"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>澄<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>lucidity</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>ちょう</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">す</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Tent, Beans, Tsunami</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">But, the thing that is not lucid... the thing you don't understand... is who would do such a thing. Who would destroy my tent and bean collection using a tsunami? Who is that evil? Of course, you know the answer, which is Mrs. <font><b>Chou</b></font> (ちょう).</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: If there's something evil going on, it's definitely Mrs. Chou.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>塊<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>lump</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">かい</font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>かたまり</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Grave, Demon</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Have you ever heard of the game 'Katamari Damacy'? That game is about a little guy who rolls a ball around, turning it into a bigger and bigger lump. What do you think the <font><b>Katamari</b></font> (かたまり) part means? It of course means <font color=""#f0a""><b>lump</b></font>.</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: If you don't know the game and have never heard the music (especially) it's great stuff! If you have, this word will be really easy for you. If you haven't, look it up!</i></span><br> "

'WHAT IS <font><b>TODAY</b></font> (きょう)?' he yells.</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: WHAT IS TODAY WHAT IS TODAY? Even&nbsp;<b>Jo</b>seph (じょう) Stalin, who happens to be in the bed next to yours. In fact, that's all he'll call her. ""Miss would you come over here and fluff my pillow?"" "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>磨<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>polish</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">ま</font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>みが</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Tree, Stone, Mullet</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">A <font color=""#f0a""><b>polish</b></font>ed stone isn't just for looks, though. You're eating these stones, because there's nothing else to eat. It's a <font><b>meager</b></font> (みが) living, but it's way better than a rough stone, that's for sure.</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine eating smooth polished stones. Then, rough ones. They're both meager, but at least one goes down easier.</i></span><br> "

So what? <font><b>Sue me</b></font> (すみ). Yeah, go ahead and sue me! "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>瞬<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>blink</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>しゅん</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">またた</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Eye, Forehead, Cleat, Protester</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">You&nbsp;<b style=""color: rgb(226, 0, 150);"">blink</b>&nbsp;and blink and&nbsp;<b>soon</b>&nbsp;(しゅん) there are tears coming out of them too. You try to blink them away but it's not working. Soon you're crying and blinking and crying some more.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: How soon do you think you would cry through your blinking after getting kicked in the head? I would cry pretty soon after.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>泡<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>bubbles</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>ほう</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">あわ</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Wrap, Tsunami</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Normally this tsunami and the resulting <font color=""#f0a""><b>bubbles</b></font> would spell death, but luckily you are the great <font><b>Hou</b></font>-dini (ほう)! Since you are Hou-dini, you use the bubbles to your advantage and float atop them, escaping a death by drowning. Magical!</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: You’re Hou-dini so you’re always capable of death defying feats like this one. Imagine being Hou-dini and surfing along on the bubbles created by the tsunami. Pretty cool.</i></span><br> "

"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>棟<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>pillar</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>とう</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">-</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Tree, East</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Actually, this <font color=""#f0a""><b>pillar</b></font> is in <font><b>To</b></font>kyo (とう). You know, in Japan – the Land of the Rising Sun? This pillar is an ancient relic that is held very dear to all the people living in Tokyo.</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: The sun rises in the east and Tokyo is in the Land of the Rising sun, so just keep that in mind as you watch the sun come up behind this majestic pillar in Tokyo.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>誇<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>pride</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>こ</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">ほこ</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Big, Ground, Say, Beggar</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">This big beggar has had an overabundance of <font color=""#f0a""><b>pride</b></font> ever since he was a <font><b>子</span></b></font>. He wouldn’t even let his parents make him lunches for school and he never accepted any allowance. It makes you wonder how a 子 with so much pride would end up on the streets as a beggar.</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Look at this 子 compared to this beggar. What could have happened to this 子 in order for him to be brought to this point in his life? You feel bad and you want to help him, but his pride is preventing you from doing anything to help.</span></span></i></span><br> "

"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>墜<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>crash</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>つい</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">-</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Grave, Pig, Horns, Butcher</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Before they <font color=""#f0a""><b>crash</b></font> into the mass pig grave, the butcher has to call them over by yelling “<font><b>SOOEY</b></font>! (つい) Here pig pig pig. SOOEEEYYY!!” You are familiar with this pig call, no? Sooey!</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine you are calling these pigs and they all come at you at once and crash into you. Sooey! CRASH.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>欺<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>deceit</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>ぎ</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">あざむ</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Lack, Crab</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The crab presents you with a <font><b>gui</b></font>tar (ぎ).  But it’s actually a lute. <font color=""#f0a""><b>Deceit</b></font>! The crab has fooled you again! HAHAHA! That’s not a guitar at all!</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: You thought you were getting a guitar, but it’s actually a lute. Man, you really wanted a guitar, too. Dang crab and all his deceit. Lousy.</i></span><br> "

But why did the KKK show up after you stopped expressing your feelings to give your heart some time to rest? It’s a mystery. Just imagine yourself running away from torch wielding KKK members. Scary.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>尺<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>shaku</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>しゃく</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">-</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Shrimp</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">How is <font color=""#f0a""><b>shaku</b></font>, the <font color=""#f0a""><b>Japanese foot</b></font>, pronounced by <font><b>Shaq</b></font> (しゃく) in Japanese? Why Shaq pronounces it shaku. It’s pronounced shaku both in English and Japanese.</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine Shaq dribbling the shrimp like a basketball, saying “shaku, shaku, shaku” every time he bounces the shrimp.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>砕<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>smash</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>さい</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">くだ</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Cross, Nine, Stone</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The stone where you <font color=""#f0a""><b>smash</b></font> this cross is to commemorate all your ancestors who were killed by a <font><b>cy</b></font>clops (さい), the vampire’s mortal enemy. The cyclops would take a cross and smash it into the vampire’s heart, killing them dead.</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine being a vampire and having a cyclops smash a cross into your heart, killing you. Exhausting the shrimp exhausted you as well, and you’re really warm from all that work you just did so you put some ice in and on your jeans to cool down a bit.</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine putting ice in your jeans. Dang, that’s cold. You can still smell the fishy smell of shrimp in the air though.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>霜<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>frost</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">-</font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>しも</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Tree, Eye, Rain</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">This whole description is pretty emo. You came up with this whole emo&nbsp;<b style=""color: rgb(226, 0, 150);"">frost</b>&nbsp;idea because you are a&nbsp;<b>shemo</b>&nbsp;(しも). An emo who goes by she pronouns.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture yourself walking proudly, casting your frost gaze at all who you pass. ""Wow look at that frosty, cool shemo. She's sooooo cool!"" you hear them whisper. (Haha cool, get it? Because you're frosty and also a little sad, which is totally in when you're a teen.)</i></span><br> "

This male rooster doesn’t want the turkey to harvest the pines or the flowers. The cock asserts that those things belong to him! The cock and the turkey begin to fight.</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine the turkey smashing the stool over the cock’s back. A brawl breaks out. Pine tree sap is knocked over and flowers are crushed. It’s brutal.</i></span><br> "

"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>盾<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>shield</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>じゅん</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">たて</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Cliff, Pope</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The light of the pope's&nbsp;<b style=""color: rgb(226, 0, 150);"">shield</b>&nbsp;begins to fade. The shield's holy power is waning! Just as the demons are about to push him off the cliff, the sun begins to rise. That's right! It's&nbsp;<b>June</b>&nbsp;(じゅん) and summer has just begun. The pope's shield reflects the power of June's bright sun into the eyes of the demons, casting them off the cliff behind him and back into hell!</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: This pope would have been in a lot of trouble if June's summer sun hadn't risen at just the right moment. "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>飢<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>starve</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>き</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">う</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Eat, Table</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">After you finish the table, you still feel like you might <font color=""#f0a""><b>starve</b></font> so you decide to eat every <font><b>key</b></font> (き) off your key ring. "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>餓<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>starve</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>が</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">う</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Eat, Ego</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">You continue to <font color=""#f0a""><b>starve</b></font> and when no one is around, you cry “goo-goo <font><b>ga</b></font>-ga” (が) like a little baby. Your ego is preventing you from accepting food from others, but it’s not preventing you from crying goo-goo ga-ga like a whiny little whiner.</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Now you’re starving and you’re crying. Feel the hot tears on your face and the gurgling in your stomach as you continue to cry out your goo-goo ga-gas.</i></span><br> "

A mulberry is the cure-all of nature.</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Have something you need to cure? Eat a mulberry. Taste the mulberry taste on your tongue as you become cured. Ahh, nice.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>尼<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>nun</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>に</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">あま</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Flag, Spoon</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">You’re getting down on one <font><b>knee</b></font> (に) as you present the flag and the spoon to the <font color=""#f0a""><b>nun</b></font>. The nun accepts your offer and takes your flag and spoon from you. Your soul is saved!</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Feel your knee digging into the cold floor as you present your offerings to the nun. You feel slightly sad as she takes your precious belongings from you.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>珠<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>pearl</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>しゅ</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">たま</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Slide, King, Jet</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">You were carrying the <font color=""#f0a""><b>pearl</b></font> in your <font><b>shoe</b></font> (しゅ) before. You didn’t want to lose it, so you transported it in your shoe. That way the constant pain from it rubbing on your foot would assure you that it had not been lost. Hopefully the pearl doesn’t smell like a shoe.</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine walking around with the pearl in your shoe. That hurts a lot. It really agitates your foot. Ow. Ow. Ow.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>抽<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>pluck</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>ちゅう</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">-</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Reason, Nailbat</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">You can’t <font color=""#f0a""><b>pluck</b></font> another nail so you get your friend <font><b>Chew</b></font>bacca (ちゅう) to pluck them out for you. Chewbacca is very brave and strong, so he begins to pluck the rest of the nails out of you like a good friend.</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine Chewbacca plucking the rest of the nails out of you. "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>壇<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>podium</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>だん</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">-</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Lid, Grave, Sunrise, Times</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The guy on the <font color=""#f0a""><b>podium</b></font>’s name is <font><b>Dan</b></font> (だん). "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>陶<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>pottery</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>とう</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">-</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Enclosure, Can, Butcher</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The butcher sells this <font color=""#f0a""><b>pottery</b></font> in <font><b>To</b></font>kyo (とう). The pottery looks so realistic that nobody can tell the difference!</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine seeing this pottery in Tokyo. You are sweating and you feel like you’re gonna die.</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Hear the princess laughing as the cobra continues to hiss at you while the heat from the venom spreads throughout your body. "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>唯<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>solely</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>ゆい</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">ただ</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Mouth, Turkey</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">You traveled a long way to see this turkey and the mouth that is <font color=""#f0a""><b>solely</b></font> his but you missed your exit on the high way and you have to hang a <font><b>U-ey</b></font> (ゆい). You know what hand a U-ey means, right? It’s making a U-turn. Well, you have to hang a U-ey on the highway so you can get off at the right spot to see this turkey and the mouth that is solely his.</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine hanging a U-ey on the highway. Hear your tires screech as you turn around and get off where you’re supposed to.</i></span><br> "

He sure is sturdy for such an old dude. The impact is quite jarring.</span></i></span><br> "

"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>把<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>bundle</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>わ, は</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">-</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Bed, Nailbat</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text""><font><b>Wha</b></font>t (わ)? "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>駄<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>burdensome</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>だ, た</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">-</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Horse, Fat</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">But you have to be nice to the <font color=""#f0a""><b>burdensome</b></font> horse because this horse is your <font><b>da</b></font>d (だ).</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Go visit your dad the burdensome horse because you have to visit your dad.
