"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>洞<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>cave</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>どう</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">ほら</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Same, Tsunami</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Best way to remember the reading for this kanji is to think about how the shape of a cave is the shape of a <font><b>dou</b></font>ghnut (どう).</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Also note that the 同 part of this kanji gives away the reading as well. 同 and 洞 have the same readings!</span></span></span></i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>伯<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>chief</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>はく, お</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">-</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">White, Leader</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The reading is the same as 白, which is included in this kanji. The other reading is お, and it's like the honorific 御, in a way. You'd want to be polite to someone who is the chief ______, right? That's why it could be お, too.</span></span></span></span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: You'll learn more about which reading to use when the vocabulary roll around. In the meantime, try to remember both of them the best you can!</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>諮<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>consult</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>し</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">はか</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Mouth, Say, Next</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">This is the mouth (and maybe whole body, if you want) of Charlie <font><b>Shee</b></font>n (shi). His <font color=""#f0a""><b>consult</b></font> for you is that you should drink tiger blood.</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: If it helps imagine the whole of Charlie Sheen giving you consultation instead of just a mouth. Focus on the mouth part, though.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>廷<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>courts</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>てい</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">-</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">King, Big Bird</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">At all of Big Bird's King <font color=""#f0a""><b>courts</b></font> he serves <font><b>ta</b></font>tor (てい) tots to all his people.</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Eat the tator tots being offered to you. This is a great king's court.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>蟹<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>crab</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">-</font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>かに</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Cow, Sword, Insect, Angle</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The reading is the same as the <font><b>かに</span></b></font> in WaniKani.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: If you've used WaniKani before, you probably know this reading, hopefully. All praise the great allicrab!</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>晶<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>crystal</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>しょう</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">-</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Sun</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Who is hoarding all the <font color=""#f0a""><b>crystal</b></font>s, because he loves how they look? That would be the <font><b>shou</b></font>gun (しょう).</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine the Shogun laying in his bed of crystals. He's rolling around on them, laughing and having a great time. All the crystals are his!</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>堰<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>dam</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>せき</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">-</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Sun, Woman, Grave, Cage</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The sun's job is obvious (heat up the water and create steam), but the woman's job is just as important. She has to be all <font><b>sexy</b></font> (せき) for the sun so the sun heats up enough to cook the water.</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine a lady being sexy for the sun, then imagine the sun heating up to steam up the water to create power for the dam.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>漂<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>drift</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>ひょう</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">ただよ</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Jackhammer, Tsunami, Helicopter</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">As it&nbsp;<b style=""color: rgb(226, 0, 150);"">drift</b>s away you shout, ""<b>Heyooo</b>! (ひょう)."" You know the helicopter probably can't hear you (or understand you) but maybe it will turn on and stop drifting away if you shout it enough.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: ""Heyoooo stop drifting awaaaay!!""</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>淀<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>eddy</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">-</font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>よど</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Helmet, Correct, Tsunami</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The thing about the <font color=""#f0a""><b>eddy</b></font> is that it probably won't help much, but either way, <font><b>you do</b></font> (よど) something about the problem, at least.</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: <font><b>You do</b></font> what you can with what you have.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>堤<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>embankment</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>てい</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">つつみ</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Sun, Grave, Correct</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">You dig up the sun's grave to get it out of the <font color=""#f0a""><b>embankment</b></font>, but as you dig, all you find is <font><b>ta</b></font>ter (てい) tots. Where did the sun's body go? Who took it? Did it come back to life? Why are there tater tots in its stead?</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Try one of the tater tots... they taste vaguely sun-like.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>后<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>empress</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>こう, ご</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">きさき</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Ground, Mouth, Cliff</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">As you look at the <font color=""#f0a""><b>empress</b></font>, who is still stuck inside the cliff, you see far off a giant <font><b>こう</span></b></font>いち lumbering towards you. What is he doing here? you wonder. He spots you and the empress, then starts charging your position. When he gets there, he tears the cliff apart, throwing you off the cliff and sending you flying in the air. The last thing you see is Koichi devouring the empress (he is really that big).</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Before you hit the ground, yell '<font><b>こう</span></b></font>いち, NOOOOO!' See the last moments of the empress being devoured, unable to move because she's so tiny compared to Koichi, and also because she's stuck in the cliff.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>疫<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>epidemic</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>えき</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">-</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Ikea, Sick</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The sickness that caused the Ikea <font color=""#f0a""><b>epidemic</b></font> actually came from the <font><b>駅</span></b></font> (えき) right next to Ikea. Someone brought it in from the station there... that must be it. It's the only way to get to Ikea.</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine the person getting off the train from the station, looking sick and such. They give the sickness to everyone else, causing the epidemic.</i></span><br> "

You really need to practice and <font><b>hone</b></font> (ほん) your skills and get better.</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Or, maybe you get so good that you write a <font><b>本</span></b></font> (ほん) about doing a flip. "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>鬱<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>gloom</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>うつ</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">-</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Tree, Can, Psychopath</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Then the tree switches from <font color=""#f0a""><b>gloom</b></font> to being super excited (these moodswings!). The super excited tree starts doing dubstep. <font><b>Uts</b></font> (うつ) uts uts uts uts ♬.</span></span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Sing along with the moody tree. Gloom to dubstep. "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>銘<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>inscription</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>めい</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">-</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Gold, Name</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The inscription is a name written on something, right? Remember the kanji for 'name'? It is 名, and it shares the reading with this kanji as well, making both names <font><b>めい</b></font>.</span></span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: If you need to review 名 go ahead and do that. It will help you to remember this kanji.</span></i></span><br> "

"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>壮<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>robust</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>そう</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">-</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Samurai, Nailbat</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">When the <font color=""#f0a""><b>robust</b></font> samurai hits the other samurai in the face with his nailbat, the other samurai splits in half. Now someone has to <font><b>sew</b></font> (そう) that samurai back together.</span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: That's your job. You have to swe the broken samurai back together. Oh no, this is bad, it's enjoying being stirred up, now we'll never stop it.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>唐<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>china, sudden</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>とう</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">-</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Mouth, Mullet, Brush</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">And, believe it or not, you wear it outside and everyone sees it. Overnight, it's a huge fad in <font><b>とう</b></font>きょう (とう).&nbsp;</span></span></span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: All the kids in Tokyo are wearing their mullets like this now.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>峰<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>summit</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>ほう</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">みね</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Mountain, Winter, Signpost</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Why are you here on the <font color=""#f0a""><b>summit</b></font> of this mountain even though the conditions are so bad? You are <font><b>hou</b></font>dini, and today your 'trick' involves you escaping from deadly mountain summit weather.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine yourself trying to escape (and imagine yourself as houdini). Think about the advertisements everywhere for this trick too: 'Houdini! The great escape artist will escape from a... mountain summit!'</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>墳<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>tomb</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>ふん</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">-</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Cross, Grave, Clam, Flowers</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">When it comes to <font color=""#f0a""><b>tomb</b></font>s, it's really <font><b>fun</b></font> to go inside of them. That's my idea of fun, anyways. What about you?</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Try to convince yourself that tombs are fun and nothing else.</i></span><br> "

Him and Chewbacca are having a great time on there.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>邪<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>wicked</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>じゃ</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">よこし</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Fang, Butcher</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The reason he's so <font color=""#f0a""><b>wicked</b></font> and devouring you is because he's an animal. He's a <font><b>ja</b></font>guar, so of course he's doing it.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Now imagine the creature coming at you but this time it's a jaguar. A wicked jaguar.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>呼<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>call</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">こ</font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>よ</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Mouth, Peace</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">But before you <b><font color=""#f0a"">call</font></b> for peace, you must first placate the masses. To do so, you astound them with your <b>yo</b>-yo (よ) skills. Once they are so entranced by how talented you are with a yo-yo, you easily convince them to make peace.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine yourself whirling this yo-yo about while you call for peace. Imagine yourself doing a variety of tricks with it as you slowly convince the people to agree to peace.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>崎<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>cape</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">き</font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>さき</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Big, Mountain, Lip Ring</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Atop the big mountain overlooking the <b><font color=""#f0a"">cape</font></b>, you start to play what you call hacky <b>sacky</b> (さき). Most people say hacky sack, but you’re edgy and cool and have a lip ring so you say sacky instead.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: See yourself doing your hacky sacky thing on top of this big mountain. Concentrate to keep the hacky sacky in the air as it’s a long way down.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>施<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>carry out</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>し</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">ほどこ</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Gun, Direction, Alligator</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The alligator plans to murder Charlie <b>Shee</b>n (し) with that gun. The alligator has had just about enough of Charlie Sheen and all his antics and things. It’s time to <b><font color=""#f0a"">carry out</font></b> his demise.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture Charlie Sheen cowering in a corner as the alligator moves in his direction with the gun, ready to carry out his death at a moment’s notice. Hear Charlie Sheen scream and plead for mercy as the alligator approaches.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>城<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>castle</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">じょう</font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>しろ</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Grave, Become</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">And so you turned a grave into a <b><font color=""#f0a"">castle</font></b> and that’s all <b>she wro</b>te (しろ). That’s it, end of story. The grave became a castle and that’s all she wrote.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: When a grave turns into a castle, there’s really no turning back. So just remember that when a grave becomes a castle, that’s all she wrote.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>護<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>defend</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>ご</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">-</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Stool, Flowers, Say, Turkey</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The only thing this flower bearing turkey cannot <b><font color=""#f0a"">defend</font></b> against is <b>Go</b>dzilla (ご). Godzilla is pretty much undefeatable, especially for a turkey. The turkey is totally unable to defend anything from the mighty Godzilla.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine Godzilla approaching the flower turkey. Hear Godzilla roar as the turkey gobbles in fear before being crushed beneath the massive and scaly foot of Godzilla.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>鬼<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>demon</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>き</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">おに</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Demon</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">How do you keep a <b><font color=""#f0a"">demon</font></b> locked up? Use a <b>key</b> (き). Use a lock and key and keep that demon locked up safely behind bars so he can’t get out and do bad demon stuff.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture yourself locking up a demon with a special demon containing key. Hear the key click into the lock as the demon screams to be set free.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>割<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>divide</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">かつ</font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>わり, わ</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Mouth, Helmet, Master, Ribs</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">This master surgeon is actually <b>Wari</b>o (わり) from the Nintendo universe. Wario likes to <b><font color=""#f0a"">divide</font></b> people into pieces because he’s evil. An evil mastermind. And after he finishes dividing you, Wario likes to drink a gallon of <b>wa</b>ter (わ). Wario really likes water, so he drinks a lot of it.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: See Wario, all splattered with blood, guzzling down a whole gallon of water. Hear the water slosh about as Wario chugs it down.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>職<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>employment</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>しょく</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">-</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Ear, Drunkard, Sound</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Since this guy is such a pathetic drunkard, it comes as no <b>shock</b> (しょく) that he can’t find employment. If he did find <b><font color=""#f0a"">employment</font></b>, I would be filled with both shock and awe.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Actually you find out that he does have employment. He’s a garbage man. Feel the shock of making this shocking discovery. How can this drunkard possibly hold down his job like this?</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>秀<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>excel</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>しゅう</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">ひい</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Pine, Stairs</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">You’re a <b>shoo</b>ter (しゅう). You’re a shooter and you <b><font color=""#f0a"">excel</font></b> at your job. You're so good at being a shooter that you constructed these pine stairs just to get to a better sniping position. Now that's dedication.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine having a sniper rifle slung over your back as you work on building these stairs. Once they're finished, visualize yourself climbing them and looking through the sights of your gun, finding your next target to shoot.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>俳<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>haiku</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>はい</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">-</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Leader, Injustice</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">What are you writing? You’re writing a <b>hai</b>ku (はい). A <b><font color=""#f0a"">haiku</font></b> to end all injustice in the world!</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: The reading for this one is the same as the first syllable of the word. Haiku. Easy!</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>停<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>halt</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>てい</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">-</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Leader, Nailgun</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">To make matters worse, you drop the <b>ta</b>ter (てい) tots you were carrying. To cause you to come to a <b><font color=""#f0a"">halt</font></b>, the leader shot you right in the hand so you’ve dropped your tater tots to the ground. Your tater tots are ruined.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: See your tater tots rolling away from you on the ground. You were really looking forward to eating them. Nurse your wounded hand as you see your tater tots roll off into the distance.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>宅<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>house</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>たく</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">-</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Seven, Slide, Helmet</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">On your seventh trip down the stairs to make your <b><font color=""#f0a"">house</font></b> a <b><font color=""#f0a"">home</font></b>, you land on a <b>tack</b> (たく) on the way down. Like I said, you have nothing on to protect your butt, so the tack sticks right in you, piercing your bottom. The tack stings really bad. It hurts.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Feel the pain from the tack sticking out of your butt. It’s bad enough that your butt hurts from sliding down the stairs but now you have a tack stuck in it too. Imagine how painful all of this would be.</i></span><br> "

He pulls up his eyepatch to show you his cyclopsness. DON'T JUDGE CYCLOPS! he yells.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine the shock of seeing this, because his eye is right in the middle of his forehead, like a cyclops would be.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>律<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>law</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>りつ</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">-</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Loiter, Brush</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Where were you loitering with your brush, breaking the <b><font color=""#f0a"">law</font></b>? Right outside the <b>Ritz</b> (りつ) Hotel. "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>革<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>leather</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>かく</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">かわ</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Leather</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">One way to get <b><font color=""#f0a"">leather</font></b> is to skin a male chicken, a <b>cock</b> (かく). You won’t get much leather from a cock, but you can definitely skin one in a pinch, should you need a little extra leather.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine skinning a cock for its leather. See yourself cutting through the rooster’s skin as you pluck the feathers out so it can be tanned into leather.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>贅<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>luxury</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>ぜい</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">いぼ</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Grave, Direction, Winter, Clam</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Just when you think you’ve finally come to the hiding place of the winter clam, Hard Gay jumps out of the bushes and starts thrusting at you. But something is different. This isn't the Japanese Hard Gay you know and love. It's his German counterpart! He's shouting “<b>Zei</b> (ぜい), zei, zei~!” German Hard Gay is wearing a fancy <b><font color=""#f0a"">luxury</font></b> suit. That's how you know he's not Japanese Hard Gay.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: See the luxury in German Hard Gay’s attire. Everything from his shoes to his tie are encrusted with diamonds. “Zei, zei, zei!” But wait, so where is the winter clam’s scent coming from? Is it coming from German Hard Gay? Eww.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>乳<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>milk</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>にゅう</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">ちち</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Child, Umbrella, Cleat</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">But where is this child exactly? He’s in <b>New</b> (にゅう) York City. What’s he doing in New York City you ask? Well, he's milking a cow. Why is there a cow to be milked in New York City? Good question. It’s the end of the world and New York City is the last remaining civilization. This is how people live now. <b><font color=""#f0a"">Milk</font></b> is important.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine post-apocalyptic New York City. Milk is a hot commodity here so it’s important not to spill any of the milk. Imagine yourself carrying the milk in the umbrella and being careful not to spill any of it.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>収<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>obtain</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>しゅう</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">おさ</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Stool, Four</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">You are a <b>shoo</b>ter (しゅう), and you need to <b><font color=""#f0a"">obtain</font></b> these four stools to prop yourself and your gun upon. A good shooter knows how to set up his shooting area, and you are definitely a good shooter.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine yourself setting up these stools for the best shooting arrangement. You're sitting on one stool, resting each arm on two other stools, and resting the gun on the final, fourth stool. Now shoot something!</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>演<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>perform</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>えん</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">-</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Fins, Helmet, Tsunami, Corn</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Since you know how to <b><font color=""#f0a"">perform</font></b> and put on a good show, you’ve recruited some <b>en</b>ts (えん) to be in the performance with you. The ents perform tricks in the background and work the lights and music for you. Ents, so helpful.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: See the ents in the background while you perform. Watch them working the lights and changing the music as you continue on with your performance.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>現<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>present time</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>げん</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">あらわ</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">King, See</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">This king is kind of similar to the current <b>gen</b>eration (げん). The current generation only thinks of the <b><font color=""#f0a"">present time</font></b> and doesn’t plan for the future. People are under mountains of debt, not planning for retirement, and living on credit. The current generation is messed up.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Feel pity for this generation of the present time. Are you a contributing factor to this present time minded generation? Take some time to reflect on the issue.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>備<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>provide</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>び</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">そな</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Elephant, Cliff, Flowers, Leader</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">All this work to <b><font color=""#f0a"">provide</font></b> for his people starts to take a toll on this leader. He decides to chill out under a tree and slumps down against its trunk. The impact causes a <b>bee</b>hive (び) to fall out of the tree and many a bee start to swarm around the leader, stinging him all over.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: This poor leader. "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>準<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>standard</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>じゅん</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">-</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Cross, Tsunami, Turkey</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">These wacky dreams are only <b><font color=""#f0a"">standard</font></b> fare in <b>June</b> (じゅん) though. You don’t have them any other time of the year, just in June. You don’t know why June is the only time you have dreams about tsunami riding turkeys, but that’s just the way it is.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: It’s usually pretty toasty in the month of June (in the Northern Hemisphere, at least) so imagine going to bed in this heat. "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>優<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>superior, gentle</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>ゆう</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">やさ</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Heart, Winter, Forehead, Leader, Hundred</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Who’s a <b><font color=""#f0a"">superior</font></b> leader? A little voice finally responds, ""Well... maybe for a&nbsp;<b>ta</b>ter (てい) tot."" Luckily you have some tater tots jammed into your swimsuit. I guess some chastity vows can be broken! As long as you have some tater tots and a hungry clam.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture the clam giving up its vow of chastity to eat your delicious tater tots.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>亮<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>clear</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>りょう</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">あきらか</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Lid, Mouth, Legs, Forehead</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Your mind is as&nbsp;<b>clear</b>&nbsp;as a sparkling clear pond. On this pond you see yourself in a&nbsp;<b>row</b>&nbsp;(りょう) boat. A single row boat on the clear pond that is now your mind.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture the row boat on the clear pond in your mind. Watch the clear water flow over the row boat's oars.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>襟<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>collar</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">きん</font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>えり</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Tree, Pelican, Jackhammer</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Well, the&nbsp;<b><font color=""#f0a"">collar</font></b>&nbsp;snaps off and the pelican flies away as you yell, ""<b>ERI</b>C (えり)!"" Your pelican's name was Eric but now he's free. You look down at the collar with his name in sparkly letters spelling it out in your hand. Now this collar is all you have left of him.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Look down at the collar with Eric's name on it and cry. Maybe you shouldn't have brought him to work today.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>隅<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>corner</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">ぐう</font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>すみ</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Butcher, Splinter</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Splinter is stuck in the&nbsp;<b><font color=""#f0a"">corner</font></b>, there's no where for him to run. He says,""The turtles will get you for this!"" ""<b>Sue me</b>&nbsp;(すみ)!"" the butcher responds, and slashes.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture the bloody corner. Hear the last words Splinter heard. ""Sue Me."" Well he can't now, because he's dead.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>郡<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>county</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>ぐん</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">こおり</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Butcher, Buddy</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">As you stare at the next&nbsp;<b><font color=""#f0a"">county</font></b>&nbsp;on you map you take out your&nbsp;<b>gun</b>&nbsp;(ぐん) and shoot it. Take that buddy butcher's county! You stay over there where you belong or my gun will have something to say!</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture yourself pointing a gun at the outline of the county. See the word ""county"" and shoot through it with the gun.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>燥<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>dry up</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>そう</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">はしゃ</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Tree, Fire, Products</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Now that all your stuff has had a chance to&nbsp;<b><font color=""#f0a"">dry up</font></b>&nbsp;you'll have to find a way to get them from the burning tree. So you&nbsp;<b>sew</b>&nbsp;(そう) yourself some oven mits.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture yourself sewing oven mits so that you can read your dried up good in the tree fire. You probably should have done this beforehand.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>釈<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>explanation</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>しゃく</b>, せき</font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">す, とく, ゆる</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Sickle, Shrimp</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">In your&nbsp;<b><font color=""#f0a"">explanation</font></b>&nbsp;you blame everything on&nbsp;<b>Shaq</b>&nbsp;(しゃく). He told you to do it! It's all Shaq's fault, you explain.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture Shaq popping into your head as you struggle to come up with an explanation for me. Picture Shaq's face. This is payback for Shaq Fu, you think, as you finalize the rest of the explanation in your mind.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>脂<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>fat</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>し</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">あぶら</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Sun, Moon, Spoon</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Once you're nice and&nbsp;<b><font color=""#f0a"">fat</font></b>, you look in the mirror to admire your new girth. But that's not your face. It's Charlie&nbsp;<b>Shee</b>n's (し)! You're a fat, round Charlie Sheen now!</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture fat Charlie Sheen rolling around in space. There is no sun, no moon, only Sheen's fat body for the earth to orbit.</i></span><br> "

Just when you think you have to look away, a great&nbsp;<b>ea</b>gle&nbsp;(い) soars overhead, letting out a cry. He loves counting houses. That's what he does in his free time.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture Ken going from house to house, counting them all. He's an odd one.</i></span><br> "

If you bring the rental place back some beautiful lotuses maybe they won't care they you sunk their car?</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine youself smelling the lotuses growing on your sunken rental car. Now you laugh. You laugh because it wasn't your car and you don't care because you have lotuses. Lotuses everywhere!</i></span><br> "

Jesus snaps his fingers and the poop is gone and you're off the ground. Jesus signal? Sure.</i></span><br> "

He's convinced the mound is the site of alien activity. Oh Mr. Tsukalos.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture Mr. Tsukalos staring intently at the mound, then the sky, then the mound again, then the sky again, then the mound again (forever).</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>玄<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>mysterious</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>げん</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">くろ</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Mysterious</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The most mysterious thing in the world is the current&nbsp;<b>gen</b>eration (げん) of kids. Everything they do makes no sense to you and the people in your generation.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture this mysterious generation of kids. Then the moon will pop and everyone will go back to normal.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture yourself, as obese as the moon, trying to pull back the string of your bow. It's really hard because you're really round now.</i></span><br> "

He loves plowing. He's going to plow your whole new field for you. That's suspiciously nice of him!</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture&nbsp;こういち&nbsp;offering to plow your fields.</i></span><br> "

"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>邸<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>residence</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>てい</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">やしき</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Ground, Duck, Butcher</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">If you look at his actual&nbsp;<b><font color=""#f0a"">residence</font></b>, you'll see that it's made entirely of&nbsp;<b>ta</b>ter (てい) tots. That's how he gets the ducks to show up. They see a residence made of tater tots and try to eat it, then he butchers them.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture this residence made entirely of tater tots. They're pretty stale. You still wouldn't choose to live here.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>喚<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>scream</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>かん</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">わめ</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Big, Enclosure, Mouth, Legs</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">As you&nbsp;<b>scream</b>&nbsp;you feel something in your own mouth. You scream louder and a tin&nbsp;<b>can</b>&nbsp;(かん) comes flying out of your mouth and covers up the entire enclosure, saving you from the horrible thing that was making you scream in the first place!</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine screaming so loudly that a can came up your throat, out of your mouth, and stopped whatever was scaring you! That's a cool superpower. The power of canned screams!</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>苗<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>seedling</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>みょう</b>, びょう</font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">なえ, なわ</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Rice Paddy, Flowers</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The&nbsp;<b><font color=""#f0a"">seedling</font></b>s try their best to blend in by referring to themselves as&nbsp;<b>myou</b>&nbsp;(みょう), you know, me and you combined. "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>隻<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>ship counter</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>せき</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">-</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Stool, Turkey</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Once you become the best&nbsp;<b><font color=""#f0a"">ship counter</font></b>&nbsp;in the world everyone will think you are super&nbsp;<b>sexy</b>&nbsp;(せき)! "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>膚<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>skin</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>ふ</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">はだ</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Tiger, Stomach</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The only person who would try to take&nbsp;<b><font color=""#f0a"">skin</font></b>&nbsp;from a tiger's stomach is a&nbsp;<b>foo</b>l (ふ).
