"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>烏<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>crow</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">うお</font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>からす</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Bird</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">If you can't tell just from looking at it that it's a <b><font color=""#f0a"">crow</font></b> and not a bird, walk up to it and <b>caress</b> (からす) it with your hand! If it caresses you back, it's a crow! If it freaks out and flies away or pecks your face, it's a normal bird. Crows are really smart and like affection. "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>閲<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>inspection</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>えつ</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">けみ</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Gate, Guard</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">His <b><font color=""#f0a"">inspection</font></b> is complete, but it looks like he's used an <b>etch</b> (えつ) a sketch to record all the result. That's not really helpful. If you shake it all the inspection results will disappear!</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: If you hire a guard to stand at your gate and conduct an inspection of your neighborhood, make sure you tell him not to use an etch a sketch!</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>遮<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>intercept</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>しゃ</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">さえぎ</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Water Slide, Fish Tail, Hick</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">It's too late for your to <b><font color=""#f0a"">intercept</font></b> by normal means, he's about to jump down the slide, so you call over your <b>sha</b>man (しゃ) friend and she magically intercepts the fish tail from him.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Phew, that was close. If your shaman friend wasn't here to intercept that fish tail the hick would be very dead.</i></span><br> "

She'll jump out from behind the moon rocks, grab your floating intestines, and rip them out of you! Then she'll run away and use them for really gross things that I can't even stand to tell you.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine what it would feel like to have Mrs. Chou come moon bouncing up to you and ripping your intestines out through your mouth! You better keep an eye on them while you're on the moon if you don't want that to happen!</i></span><br> "

"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>喝<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>scold</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>かつ</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">-</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Enclosure, Mouth, Sun, Spoon</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">But you know who you can't <b><font color=""#f0a"">scold</font></b>? <b>Cats</b> (かつ). Cats don't care if you're yelling at them or being nice to them. If a cat tried to eat the sun no one would be able to stop them. That's why cats are so awesome.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine scolding some cats who are planning to eat the sun. "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>陪<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>accompany</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>ばい</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">-</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Butcher, Clown</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">You <b><font color=""#f0a"">accompany</font></b> the butcher and the clown like they asked and stop in front of a house. They turn slowly to you and say, ""<b>Bye</b> (ばい)!"" Then go in the house, leaving you outside.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine accompanying these two characters to their house and them saying bye and letting you to go. I guess this isn't a horror movie. Phew.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>扶<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>aid</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>ふ</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">たす</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Nailbat, Husband</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Your husband wouldn't need <b><font color=""#f0a"">aid</font></b> in the first place if he wasn't such a <b>foo</b>l (ふ). Then you wouldn't have hit him at least... Okay so maybe this is all your fault and you're a jerk. But if you want to say he wouldn't have needed aid if he wasn't a fool you can.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Keep sticking to your story that your husband is a fool and that's why you hit him with a nailbat causing him to get aid. You can tell that to the cops when they get here.</i></span><br> "

"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>嘱<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>request</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>しょく</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">しょく, たの</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Mouth, Flag, Mantis</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">After you <b><font color=""#f0a"">request</font></b> the mantis give you its flag it <b>shock</b>s (しょく) you by actually spitting it out of its mouth at your feet. You didn't think your request would work, or even if the mantis understood human speech, but it shocked you by doing exactly what you asked!</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine your shock at finding out the mantis not only understood your request, but agreed! This is great but also makes you wonder what other creatures can understand you...</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>肖<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>resemblance</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>しょう</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">あやか</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Moon, Triceratops</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The first person to see this <b><font color=""#f0a"">resemblance</font></b> was the <b>sho</b>gun (しょう). That's why he decided to put a triceratops head with the moon behind it on his mon (family crest). Now he's known as the full moon dinosaur shogun, and he's very famous.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine being this shogun and seeing the resemblance between a triceratops and the moon for the first time. You'd put that on all your stuff too, if you were him.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>憤<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>resent</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>ふん</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">いきどお</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Cross, Clam, Flowers, Fish Stick</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">You don't want to <b><font color=""#f0a"">resent</font></b> someone for nothing, so you run over to the clam and ask them why they did it and they say, ""Cause it's <b>fun</b> (ふん)."" UHG! Now you resent them even more!</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: What kind of jerk thinks stealing is fun??</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>漣<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>ripples</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>れん</b>, らん</font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">さざなみ</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Car, Tsunami, Water Slide</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">You used your car to make the <b><font color=""#f0a"">ripples</font></b> because it was just a <b>ren</b>tal (れん). The rental place can't blame you for losing their car in a tsunami! And they'll never find out you rented it just to make tsunami ripples!</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Laugh as you watch the cool ripples you made with your rental car!</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>朽<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>rot</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>きゅう</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">く</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Enclosure, Ground, Tree</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">As you stare at the poor <b><font color=""#f0a"">rot</font></b>ten tree a man comes up behind you and says, ""<b>Cu</b>te (きゅう), isn't it?"" Cute? What's cute about a pile of rot? But this weird guy apparently made the tree rot on purpose because he thought it was cute. What a messed up guy!</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Look at the rotted tree and try to see what's so cute about it. Look really closely and try to find anything that can be called ""cute"" about this situation.</i></span><br> "

Two face tries to sail faster, but his table has no actual sail, so he gets hit right in one side of his two faces and flops off into the water.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine watching Han Solo stop Two face from sailing. "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>侮<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>despise</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>ぶ</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">あなず, あなど</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Leader, Every</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Leader you <b><font color=""#f0a"">despise</font></b>s your followers so much that you kick them with your <b>boo</b>ts (ぶ)! It's not the most mature way to handle things, but kicking them over and over with your steel-toed boots sure makes YOU feel better. Every leader goes through this eventually.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Feel how much you despise your followers as you kick them with your boots. They probably despise you back now too.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>堪<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>endure</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">かん, たん</font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>た</b>, こた, こ</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Grave, Crab Trap</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The little crab <b><font color=""#f0a"">endure</font></b>s being stuck in the crab trap grave just to be turned into a seafood <b>ta</b>co (た)! It held out as long as it could, but then it was chopped up and turned into taco filling.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine eating a delicious seafood taco made with the meat of a crab who thought he endured hell and back, just to be eaten by you. This message brought to you by PETA.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>禍<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>evil</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>か</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">わざわい</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Pelican, Mustache</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">You're watching the <b><font color=""#f0a"">evil</font></b> pelican when he starts to fly away. You can't just let him mess things up somewhere so you run after him and see him pooping on your <b>ca</b>r (か)!</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine running, arms waving, up to the evil pelican to try to get it away from your car. It's nasty, white pelican poops are all over your windshield. Curse you evil pelican! Curse you!</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>雌<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>female</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">し</font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>めす</b>, め, めん</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Stop, Spoon, Turkey</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The <b><font color=""#f0a"">female</font></b> turkey then runs around making a <b>mess</b> (めす) of things trying to figure out what's wrong with you. She kicks around her hay, water bowl, and scratches at your pants, making more mess marks on them. But you don't move and she gets even more worried.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine watching a female turkey make a mess of her own cage because she thinks you need help. How sweet.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>睦<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>friendly</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>ぼく</b>, もく</font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">むつ</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Eye, Womb</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">This <b><font color=""#f0a"">friendly</font></b> guy comes up to you and start to introduce himself, ""<b>ぼく</b>-"" but you stop him. He's been getting way too friendly with your womb and you don't want to hear who he is. He can ぼく at someone else, you're out.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine only letting this guy start to introduce himself with ぼく before walking the heck outta there. Just because he was acting friendly doesn't mean he was actually your friend.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>胆<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>guts</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>たん</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">きも</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Moon, Sunrise</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">You were outside for so long, proving you had major <b><font color=""#f0a"">guts</font></b>, that you also got a sweet <b>tan</b> (たん) out of it! Its a really deep tan though, and you probably need more guts if you ever want to do all that again.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine having the guts to stay outside to watch the moon and the sun and then getting a really deep tan from it.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>擬<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>imitate</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>ぎ</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">まが, もど</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Arrow, Nailbat, Spoon, Mama, Coat Rack</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">If your mama ever finds out that you <b><font color=""#f0a"">imitate</font></b> her she's going to cut off your head with a <b>gui</b>llotine (ぎ). This isn't a simple, harmless imitation you're doing, you've got all these props and it's pretty mean.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine seeing your mama's face as she pulls out the guillotine she's going to kill you with for imitating her. Ahhhh! RUN!</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>漆<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>lacquer</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>しつ</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">うるし</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Tree, Water, Hat, Tsunami</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">You love this new <b><font color=""#f0a"">lacquer</font></b> because it protects your wooden furniture from your <b>shitzu</b> (しつ). Shitzus love munching on them. If something is wood a shitzu will gnaw at it, but if you cover it in lacquer the shitzus can't bite through it at all!</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Put lacquer on your furniture to protect it from your horrible shitzu dog!</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>閑<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>leisure</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>かん</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">-</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Tree, Gate</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">If someone tells you that you can't have time for your own <b><font color=""#f0a"">leisure</font></b>, think of this gate with the tree, look them right in the eye and say, ""Yes I <b>CAN</b> (かん)!"" Then throw a can of soda at their head for good measure, because they're a jerk and everyone needs a break every now and then.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine yelling ""YES I CAN YES I CAN"" and throwing cans at anyone who tells you that you can't have leisure time.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>憧<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>long for</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">しょう, とう, どう</font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>あこが</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Stand, Sunflower, Fish Stick</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">As you think about how much your <b><font color=""#f0a"">long for</font></b> summer <b>a cougar</b> (あこが) comes up and eats the fish stick, the sunflower and even the plate! Then it runs away. Now you long for a cougar to come back and give you your taste of summer back.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: If you long for something too strongly a cougar will come eat it. So don't long for people... really, don't.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>卑<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>lowly</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>ひ</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">いや</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Cross, Drop, Rice Paddy</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The only problem about being <b><font color=""#f0a"">lowly</font></b> is the <b>he</b>at (ひ). Everyone always told you that heat rises, but not here. The rice paddy is incredibly hot... unless oh no. Is that the heat of hell?</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: You tried to make yourself lowly in front of God but this heat is probably a sign that you didn't do it well enough.</i></span><br> "

Totally innocent. Please don't make me say it again.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Get your mind out of the gutter.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>曹<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>official</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>そう</b>, ぞう</font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">つかさ, ともがら, へや</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Ground, Sun, Music</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Once the music is deemed <b><font color=""#f0a"">official</font></b>, you're allowed to <b>sew</b> (そう) T-shirts for you band! If you aren't an official band, playing in the light of the sun, then the shirts you sew are illegal! So watch out.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Are the shirts you sew for bands with official music? You should check!</i></span><br> "

"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>礁<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>reef</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>しょう</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">-</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Stone, Fish Tail, Turkey</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">They wouldn't have to life in a <b><font color=""#f0a"">reef</font></b> if the <b>sho</b>gun (しょう) didn't tell everyone that half fish half turkeys are evil. But now they all have to hide in underwater reefs or they'll get beaten up thanks to that mean old shogun.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine being a turkey with a fish tail and hearing the shogun say you're an abomination. "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>峠<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>ridge</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">-</font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">とうげ</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Mountain, Above, Below</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">It's only on this type of mountain <b><font color=""#f0a"">ridge</font></b> that you'll be able to find the rare and adorable <b>To</b>kyo <b>ge</b>cko (とうげ). These tiny little critters can only be found on the ridges going above and below the mountains in Tokyo. There are like six mountains in Tokyo, so the next time you're scaling the ridges keep your eyes open for the Tokyo gecko!</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture yourself sitting on a mountain ridge in Tokyo and watching a little Tokyo gecko run up and down on them. It's adorable and totally worth the climb.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>沙<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>sand</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>さ</b>, しゃ</font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">すな, よなげる</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Tsunami, Few</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">How do I know there's <b><font color=""#f0a"">sand</font></b> in there? "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>蔑<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>scorn</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>べつ</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">さげす</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Drop, Slide, Flowers, Sauron, Drunkard</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The drunkard wobbles your way, somehow not feeling the <b><font color=""#f0a"">scorn</font></b> of Sauron's eye staring daggers at his back and <b>bets you</b> (べつ) that you can't do something like that. ""You don't have to bet me,"" you say. Because there is no way you're going to evoke the scorn of Sauron.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine how this guy bets you that you can't do what he did. Feel your own scorn for this idiot drunkard building.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>汰<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>select</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>た</b>, たい</font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">おご, にご, よな</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Tsunami, Fat</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">If you're having trouble <b><font color=""#f0a"">select</font></b>ing which one is the least fat just check to see which tsunamis are eating <b>ta</b>cos (た). "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>紡<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>spinning, spin</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>ぼう</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">つむ</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Direction, Thread</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">While you're <b><font color=""#f0a"">spinning</font></b> you realize that you've always wanted to make your own <b>bow</b> (ぼう). "<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>遷<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>transition</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>せん</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">うつ, みやこがえ</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Big, Water Slide, Cobra, Helicopter</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The only way that <b><font color=""#f0a"">transition</font></b> could have been cooler is if you turned into a <b>cen</b>taur (せん) at the end. Centaurs are kind of like half transitioned creatures themselves, actually. Half horse, half person.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine if after all those other stunts you had transitioned into a centaur too. Darn, that would have been better!</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>叔<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>uncle, aunt</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">しゅく</font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>お</b>*</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Small, Stool, Above</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">You ask your <b><font color=""#f0a"">aunt</font></b> and <b><font color=""#f0a"">uncle</font></b> to help you reach it and they don't seem to understand until you show them how you can't reach it, even with the help of your small stool. ""<b>Oh</b> (お)..."" they say, and get it for you. Oh?? They seem disappointed in your shortness... (This reading is an exception. It isn't really the nanori reading, but it's close. Just know it isn't the on'yomi or kun'yomi reading you're learning.)</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: What do you think that ""Oh"" meant? Do your aunt and uncle hate short people? Maybe they just don't like stools.<br>* this is a Nanori reading not Kun'yomi</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>甚<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>very</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>じん</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">はなは</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Crab Trap</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">You know what else is <b><font color=""#f0a"">very</font></b> something? <b>Jean</b>s (じん). Jeans are very expensive. Jeans are very tight. Jeans are very popular. Jeans are very a lot of things.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: How many sentences can you make with very and jeans? More than me I hope.</i></span><br> "

This is his pit, it's your table that decided to be on top of it.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>罷<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>quit</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>ひ</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">や</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Sauron, Ability</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">The only reason you wish you could <b><font color=""#f0a"">quit</font></b> in the first place is because of the immense <b>hea</b>t (ひ). Mount Doom is full of lava! Lava is hot!</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: The heat makes you want to quit. Why can't you?! Auhg damn you Sauron!</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>妄<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>reckless</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>もう</b>, ぼう</font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">みだ</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Woman, Death</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">As you watch the news about this <b><font color=""#f0a"">reckless</font></b> woman you find out that she died from <b>mow</b>ing (もう) her lawn. You're not sure how, but now you really believe that she had to be doing it really recklessly to die doing it.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Imagine what reckless thing that woman had to have done to die while mowing the lawn. It looks like it belongs there, so why not. It takes a lot of energy for a tsunami to crash onto the land so the water is really really hot, and it has to secrete that heat as it's going back out to sea.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: The next time someone asks you what does a tsunami secret? You'll say heat!</i></span><br> "

"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>寡<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>widow</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>か</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">-</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Ground, Sword, Helmet, Geoduck</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">Now your <b><font color=""#f0a"">widow</font></b>ed wife is too afraid to even drive the <b>ca</b>r (か). Every time she tries, she picture the geoduck jumping out of the ground and slashing your helmet-less face. Now the car is just sitting there, unused.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Picture your widow wife refusing to get in the car. Picture her clutching the helmet you didn't wear.</i></span><br> "
"<div class=""kanji""><br><br><br>慕<br><br><br><br></div>  Reading:  "	"<span class=""title""><font color=""#f0a""><b>yearn for, adore</b></font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>On'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000""><b>ぼ</b></font></span><br> <span class=""text""><b>Kun'yomi: </b></span> <span class=""hiragana""><font color=""#000000"">した</font></span><p> <span class=""text""><b>Radicals: </b></span> <span class=""text"">Drop, Small, Greenhouse</span><p>  <span class=""text""><b><u>Reading Mnemonic</u></b></span><br> <span class=""text"">As you <b><font color=""#f0a"">yearn for</font></b> that person from your past, you look back at the drop and see... <b>Bo</b>bo (ぼ) the clown?! Uhg. Apparently Bobo dropped that small drop of water.</span><p> <span class=""text""><i>Hint: Now you yearn for being somewhere Bobo is not.</i></span><br> "
